He likes to joke that he has a napkin fetish but he does entertain a lot and uses linen napkins at every dinner party.Anyway, the napkins are oversized and elegant, 100% cotton.  The deep blue color on the set I acquired was very nice and my friend said he would use them often.  Recommended!

I love placemats, but I have always steered clear of the vinyl variety because they are usually cheap looking and ugly.  Until now.  These new DII Woven Vinyl Double Placemats are a revelation.  They are elegant enough for a formal setting, and wipe clean easily and quickly with a damp sponge.  I really did not expect them to be this attractive until I took them out of the box.  They may just replace the three sets of fabric placements that I keep washing and ironing.  Definitely recommended!

These 3-ring binders are helpful in the extreme when organizing your life.  I admit to being a neatness freak, and I use binders for just about everything paper that accumulates on my desk - bank statements, mapqust directions, song lyrics, recipes, inventories of media, you name it, I find lots of uses for 3-ring binders.  They make my life a lot more organized and oh so simple.  These binders are dusable and colorful, as advertised, and really come in handy.  Recommended.

Sphere Gadget Technologies Lightphoria, 10,000 Lux Energy Light Lamp. I, (like many people around the world) have a vitamin D deficiency. Mine was so severe, in fact that it did not even register on a blood test a few months ago. I was given an Rx for a massive dose of vitamin D, to be taken once weekly. I was really uncomfortable with that after doing some research on possible side effects. Now, I take 2,000 IU daily. I have also been using this lamp, not only to possibly help with that but also to relieve my seasonal affective disorder. In the past, laying in a tanning bed had a significant positive result for me but I am not willing to do that to my body anymore. My most recent blood test showed a vitamin D level of 19, (around 100 is normal) so at least it is improving. I cannot say whether this light effectively raises vitamin D levels. I can only say that I enjoy using it & I am hopeful that it will help to keep me from becoming depressed in the winter months when there is so much less sunlight. I use it when I wake up, which I believe also helps my body to wake up & understand that it is time to become active. I like the light a lot & the compact size of it is great. It is super portable, so it would be easy to travel with. I keep mine on my vanity in my master bathroom but it would be quite simple to move to another location. It is easy to use & it has a timer that can be set. I believe that it doesn't hurt to try things such as this, that may improve my symptoms. It is supposed to stimulate the brain to release 'euphoric' hormones, making the body more energetic. If there is even a little bit of that going on, I am all for it! I purchased this product at a discount for testing & review. I am happy with it & I would recommend this product.

Purelux 100 Inch Extra Long Double Lock Stainless Steel Replacement Shower Hose. OK, everyone this shower hose is absolutely awesome! I have three showers in my house & all of them had hoses that were too short to adequately reach low enough tocomfortably bathe my dogs. Now, my fur kids are Mastiffs, so it's not like they are low to the ground! My husband & I were both thrilled at the opportunity to test this product complimentary in exchange for an honest review. We were able to attach a spray nozzle that has a trigger, so it can control the flow of water on & off without having to manually turn the water on & off each time we are shampooing & such. This means that we have a much more consistent water temperature & we are conserving water, too. This hose is very well made & was a breeze to install. It easily reaches the dogs from end to end & now they can take a nice bath while their royal washers are much more comfortable. No more stretching & straining to reach with a short hose! We are super happy with this product & I highly recommend it, along with the seller. They have fantastic customer service & are super friendly.

Glass Drinking Straws with Cleaning Brush Clear (4 Pack). These drinking straws are well made & come with a cleaning brush, which is extremely useful. They came in a nice box, so they are perfect for gift-giving, perhaps along with someone's favorite beverage as a hostess gift. I would much rather have re-usable straws that are better for the environment than plastic, disposable straws that wind up in a landfill after a single use. However, I didn't think it through all the way & since I drink out of glass containers, (usually mason jars with screw on lids with straw holes) I am nervous that the glass on glass will cause them to break. I am being careful, though & so far, so good. My lids have a piece that keeps the straws in place, so they aren't clanging around loosely in my glasses. If you like eco friendly products, I would recommend these for sure. I know that sometimes it seems like there isn't much that any one person can do but that's not true. Every little bit helps & you can make a difference. By using eco friendly products, reducing waste & recycling, every single person can make a difference. I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion.

Fruit of the Loom Women's Cotton Heather 6 Pack Low-Rise Hipster. I have been on a search for some time now, for the perfect fitting underwear. I purchased Victoria's Secret bikini panties for many years until about five or 6 years ago, when they drastically altered the cut & they no longer covered my backside properly. I am not a large person, maybe a size 6 or 8 but I do have normal female curves & I like my panties to cover my rear & stay in place. So, I have been buying dozens upon dozens of different styles & brands on a quest to find some comfortable panties. A lot of them are way too high waisted, even though they claim to be, 'bikini' style. Since I am already short waisted, these nearly come up to my under-boobs & are not comfortable or cute at all. The biggest problem that I have encountered though, (aside from consistently inconsistent sizing) is that nothing seems to cover my backside comfortably. Well, I do want something that is low rise but this product takes it to the extreme! They are indeed low rise, so much so that they nearly show too much. I don't find that particularly comfortable, especially when wearing them under jeans. I like my undies to ride just below my belly button, not several inches below it. I wish that there were clear indications of rise on each underwear package. I believe that brands like FOTL, (which I have spent a lot of money on, only to have piles that I don't wear because they either make me look like Steve Urkel, or they don't cover my cheeks) should have high, medium & low rise categories. These definitely fit extremely low rise. I took photos of them with a pair of FOTL bikini panties in a size 7, as well as with a pair of the new VS panties in a size L for comparison. I hope that these pics will help others to decide if these are right for them, without wasting money if they are not. I know that I rely heavily on other reviews when shopping for clothing online & photos with a point of reference, along with sizing info. is super helpful. As far as sizing, I ordered these in a size 6 & they seem to run a little smaller than the size charts suggest, as I feel most panties do. Colors are assorted & not exactly as pictured, although I don't mind.  (I received black, purple, turquoise, orange, pink, gray).  Also worth mentioning is that these are definitely not 100% cotton but rather a cotton poly mix & they are softer than my FOTL bikinis. They seem well made & are pretty soft. They do actually cover the backside, which makes it all the more frustrating to me that they are so very low rise because they would have been perfect if they were an inch or two higher.  If you are someone who likes super low rise panties, then I would recommend these.  If you found this review helpful, please click the, 'Yes' button below. Thanks & happy shopping!

aden + anais Classic Toddler Boys Bed in a Bag, Liam The Brave. This appears to be a top quality bed in a bag set. I had never heard of 'Liam The Brave' before but he is just too cute! The little dog with wings makes me think of an angel dog. This print is all over with soft blue clouds on the white background. The fabric is so soft, I think that kids will be begging for their naptime! If you've never felt cotton muslin, it reminds me a bit of the gauze bandaging wrap, except that it is much softer. It's kind of hard to explain. The softness is just yummy, much like the luxurious feel of bamboo washcloths. I do advise that this should be laundered with care. Otherwise, it seems to be a lovely set. I am giving it as a gift to a family member who has a baby, as well as another young child. I'm sure that this will be much appreciated. The fact that the sheets are attached at the bottom is really cool & will no doubt, save mom some time wrestling with making the bed each day. The package came wrapped in a plastic bag, in addition to the zippered bed in a bag pouch but I was able to open it & feel the amazingly soft fabric. I would love to receive something like this as a gift & I am more than a little picky when it comes to bedding. I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest review. I would recommend this product.

Purelux Hand Held Water Sprayer Nozzle. This is exactly what we needed to bathe our giant fur kids, while still being able to conserve water! The sprayer, (while good for other purposes such as kitchen or laundry room sinks) is the perfect solution for people like us who like to give our dogs baths in the shower but don't want to keep the water constantly running while lathering them up. Also, it is really nice to be able to keep an even water temperature & this sprayer allows us to do so because it is not necessary to turn the water off & on. You just press the trigger on the nozzle for water & release when you don't. It's so great! We had a similar one that was accidentally left at our old house when we moved. This is much more convenient than using the regular shower head, even if there is a handheld one in your shower because you would still have to stand up to turn it off & on. This works great & our fur kids are clean & happy! I received this product complimentary for testing & review. I would recommend it to anyone who has pets to bathe, as it is a real life saver!

Kids Vanity Set from Teamson Kids - Zebra (Aqua Blue/White). This is a dainty children's set with a vanity that has a three piece mirror that can be attached, (or hung on the wall if desired) & it also comes with a matching stool. It is little & is not recommended for people over 100 pounds. I chose the blue/white zebra color but it is actually much more of a pale, mint green than blue. It is still really cute, though. It has a functioning drawer for hair accessories, hairbrush, play makeup, etc. The design of this is absolutely adorable & I sure would love to have the matching jewelry armoire! The only reason that I didn't give it five stars is that mine arrived with damage. I try to keep that separate from the actual product review if possible but I contacted the manufacturer several days ago & have not received a response. The mirror is broken & there are other dents & such. I will add photos soon & I'll happily update if & when I receive a satisfactory response regarding the damage. I purchased this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review.

Catit Eco Terra Natural Cornhusk and Raffia Cat Toy, 2 Mice. My cats absolutely love these little mice! They are so durable & it's nice to purchase toys that ate more eco friendly. They are definitely small but they are really tough & stand up to a ton of rough play. Nearly a month later & there are really no signs of wear. The price point is fantastic & really, you can't find a cheap plastic toy at this value. Even if you could, I doubt that any plastic toy would hold up as well as these do. For many reasons, these cat toys are a winner in my house! I took lots of photos of the cats playing with these little mice but they go so fast, it's difficult to get everything in the frame. I will post a few that made the cut. You can tell that the cats love these by the photos. My boy wouldn't even wait until I removed them from the package before he pounced on them!

Secura 1.8 Quart Stainless Steel Electric Water Kettle. This electric kettle was exactly what I needed! We don't drink coffee in our house, (gasp)! so we don't have a coffee pot & whenever I want a hot cup of tea or hot chocolate, there is no easy way to go about making it, other than the microwave. Since I am not a fan of frequently using the microwave, (due to the health implications) I was super excited when I was given the opportunity to review this product at a reduced price. I had been looking for an electric kettle but they were all super expensive, (the ones that I liked which had stainless steel lining) or they were plastic where the water went. Well, This thing is perfect! No fuss & super easy to operate. You just plug in the base, fill the kettle & turn it on! I timed it & it takes just three minutes until the hot water is ready. When it's done, it turns off. That's it! Of course, you should unplug the base when not in use but this thing could not be more simple to operate. You can pour the water out just as it is, or you can push the button on the top of the handle to open the lid, if needed. To clean, it simply says to run two full loads of water through it. That's all. There is no plastic touching my water & I can enjoy all of the different lovely teas that this world has to offer in only three minutes! I am one happy camper with this product. It is a bit larger than I expected but it's sleek design blends in well on my countertop & will be a permanent fixture in my kitchen. (I don't even leave the toaster out on the counter, so that is saying something when I like a product enough to leave it out all of the time)!

Dog Conditioner & Detangler by Healthy Clean Pet. I have two Extra Large fur kids & they require quite a bit of product, so I was happy with the generous size of this bottle. The product smells nice but isn't a heavy scent & the results are fantastic! The shampoo that we recently got left my boy looking super frizzy, so I was happy to purchase this product at a discount in exchange for my honest opinion. My husband mixed this with their shampoo because he didn't want to wash, rinse &repeat with conditioner on two huge dogs, so I wasn't sure how this would turn out. Well, it worked great! My dogs are so sleek & soft! They look & feel pretty & I like using products on them that have natural ingredients. For now, everyone in our house is happy. Now, we will have to see how baths on the kittens goes!

PROLOSO 9.8"x9.8" Ultra Soft Bamboo Fiber Baby Washcloths 6-Pack. I L-O-V-E these! I never knew what I was missing until I recently purchased a gift set of bamboo washcloths for a friend who had a baby. Oh my goodness, they are so soft! I really wanted to keep them for myself, so when I was offered the opportunity to review these complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion, I was thrilled! The bamboo fibers make the washcloths so much softer than regular cotton or polyester. It is really quite a challenge to describe, you just need to feel the difference for yourself. I love to use these to wash my face & it makes it difficult to ever want to use a regular cotton washcloth. I am in heaven with this fabric! (So, if anyone else has bamboo cloths for review, please feel free to let me know)! The pack that I received arrived inside of a plastic, zippered pouch & the colors are different than pictured in the stock photo. Instead of two each in yellow, green & pink I received one each of light pink, dark pink, light green, light blue, light purple & white. This is fine with me but I thought it worth mentioning in case anyone is after a particular color scheme. My bathroom is mostly white & blue, so I was pleasantly surprised by these colors. At any rate, these are the best, whether they are being used for face, body, baby or adult. If I had enough of them, I would even share them with my fur kids but they get my old cotton ones! (I have Mastiffs, so they drool a lot & require frequent wiping in order for me to avoid getting slobber showers)! I am positively smitten with these bamboo washcloths & I would recommend them to anyone & everyone. Try them, you will love them!

RFID Blocking Leather Wallet for Women from Leopardd. This is a nicely made, compact wallet that holds a lot of essentials in less space. It is much smaller than my previous wallet, so I am still getting used to the difference in size. (I took photos showing this wallet next to my old wallet, as well as a $10 bill for size reference).  It is packaged nicely & appears to be a quality made product. The double zippers function smoothly & reveal sides with ample room for money, credit cards, identification & so on. This is not a wallet to use if you like to carry large amounts of change, though. In this age of technology, it seems less necessary to lug around things that can add to the weight of one's purse, (such as a pile of coins) even though that is what I have always done in the past. I have a shoulder injury, which makes it all the more necessary to lighten the load that I carry. I mean, there aren't even pay phones anymore, so what do I really need like $8 in change for? I cannot speak for certain of the efficacy of the RFID blocking of this wallet but I feel better with the added layer of protection that it claims to give. Identity theft is a huge problem, so why shouldn't one take as many precautions as possible to minimize the risk? While I do always keep a few spare dollars in my wallet, it is true that credit cards have become the norm for payment of most things. It's safer that way & my shoulder is thanking me for switching to this wallet. I purchased this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review. I would recommend it as a gift, or for one's self. There are several colors to choose from, so there is something for everyone.

LARABAR Fruit & Nut Food Bar, Apple Pie. These are delicious! For a healthy snack, (that is gluten free, soy free, non GMO, etc) They taste fantastic. I love that these have simple ingredients that I can pronounce. I first tried these in the mini version, in a mixed case & found that this was my favorite flavor of the three. The others weren't bad, either. I like them cold, so I keep them in the fridge. They are so good that I put them on auto-ship so that I never run out! If you are gluten free, these are a must have!

Lace Babydoll Lingerie Sleepwear Dress with G-string from TaiPo. This is an adorable babydoll with soft lace & satin trim. The color that I received is a gorgeous shade of deep mulberry, as pictured. It said, "Purple" but there was also a Dark Purple to choose from, so I wasn't sure what I was going to get. Luckily, I got the color that is more of a rich plum, as opposed to a traditional, amethyst purple. This is what I was hoping for. The material itself is softer than a lot of lingerie that I have, including the very expensive kind. The design of it is really comfortable because there are no underwires, the cups are padded & there is elastic around the ribcage area, as well as in the adjustable straps. However, it is sewn a little crooked & it runs super small, even compared to the given size chart. I ordered an XL, figuring that I would have a little breathing room but it just barely fits around my 31" ribcage. I am a 34/36B & the cups cover but are small. It does fit me but anyone larger should size up. The problem really lies in how close together the cups are sewn. Unless someone is extremely slim, their breasts are just not that close together, thus so many reviews of 'the girls' spilling out. It's a bummer because this is such a soft & pretty nightie but it seems built for a very small person. I am usually only a size 6 or maybe an 8 but it is still ill fitting on me. They need to take into account that when someone is larger than an XS, their breasts are going to be larger & give a bit more space in between, too. If you are thin & not large chested, you may be able to scoop these up in several colors. The price point that these are offered at is a great value if you are the correct size. If they fit me better, I would get one in every color. I hope that this helps others to choose the correct size, as I often refer to other reviews to help decide which size to order when shopping online.  I received this product in exchange for my honest opinion. *Photos coming soon.

Blue Wind 7ft/2m 20  Warm White Copper LED String Lights. This little string of lights is so beautiful & delicate looking! I played around with it & filled a few different clear jar/vases with different colors of iridescent marbles, along with this strand of lights. It was not as easy as I had expected to make it look as good as the stock photos in the listing, (they are really quite amazing) but I think that after some practice, I got the hang of it. I will definitely be adding several photos of my creations. This light set is bright for such tiny lights & all you need is a few AA batteries. There are so many different ways that I can think of to use these! They would look stunning as centerpieces for dinner parties, on tables at a wedding reception or just to jazz up a mirror or vase at home. One only has to use their imagination & the possibilities are endless! It's really cool how the lights are on a wire, which allows it to be bent or wound to suit the shape or size of whatever is being decorated. I had initially thought that I would string these across my antique mirror that is hanging in my bedroom but now that I have them in a jar with some iridescent marbles, I will likely leave them as they are & arrange my candles around it. I burn candles daily & I like to decorate the area where I light them. This strand of lights would look glorious strung around a garland or flowers, or pretty much anything else! I may get some more to wind around my glass grape clusters that we are going to hang from the ceiling in our kitchen, inside the opening of our skylight. I think that this string of lights is a wonderful product & I am happy that I received it complimentary for testing & review.

VertX Mens Polarized Sunglasses Sport Cycling Running Free Microfiber Pouch - Black Soft Rubber Coating. I ordered these sunglasses as a gift for my husband. I had purchased a pair of the same brand that I meant to give to him but upon first look, we both knew that they were totally my style. So, I had to try again & I was super excited when I found these because he is really rough on his sunglasses & these have a rubberized coating, which helps to keep them from breaking as easily as plastic does in it's own. These don't look or feel at all cheap, (which I was a little afraid of when choosing the rubberized coating) & the included drawstring pouch is cool, too. I am really impressed with the quality of this brand of sunglasses & I am admittedly picky when it comes to my shades. I used to save up for the really expensive kind, only to be devastated when they would they become scratched or broken. I don't have the luxury of spending a great deal of money anymore but I still have a taste for nice things. So, I was very happy to purchase this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review. They are lightweight, comfortable & the lenses are clear. They are rated for heavy sunlight, which is perfect for my husband since he works outside in the sun a lot & also spends several hours every day driving in the daylight. I should mention that he is picky about his sunglasses as well but I know that he will love these. They aren't quite as large from top to bottom as some of the photos suggested & I am quite happy about that. They wrap around & block out light on the sides, which is great & if they fit my large head comfortably, I know that they will fit my hubby, too. I would recommend VertX sunglasses both for the comfort & the quality. For the low retail price point they are at, it would be difficult to find anything that compares.

Blooming Jelly Women's Sexy Bandage Plain Deep V Neck Lace Up Long Sleeve Blouse Tops. This is a super cute top with an adjustable lace-up front. The material is soft & stretchy, just like my favorite t-shirt. When I first took it out of the package, I was a little worried that it wouldn't fit & that I had made a mistake in getting this. It looked crooked at the lace-up part & I was afraid that it would look like a bad Halloween costume. However, once I put it on & adjusted the lace-up cord, I was pleasantly surprised. It looked great! It is form fitting but not at all too small as I had worried. It doesn't cling to the body in the wrong places like it appeared that it would, it lays smooth & once the lace-up neckline was adjusted to my liking it looked really cute! (it could be adjusted more for a sexy look but we'll keep it G-rated). The arms are a little long on me but I am super short & have short arms, so that is to be expected. I can scrunch them & it looks cute. It's not as low cut as it seems in the stock photo, so I expect that the model is wearing a smaller size & has it pulled down really far to show more cleavage. I am not sure that it would easily stay in that position, due to the stretch in the fabric. I ordered an XL according to the size chart & I would say that it is pretty accurate. For reference, my measurements are 36 - 30 -36 & the XL fits me well. It's not baggy like I wear a lot of my shirts but the fabric lays nicely. Overall, I am happy that I purchased this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review.

Utopia Wear Men's Jersey Lounge Pants - size XL, color Black. I ordered these pants for my husband after reading many reviews from other customers. The general consensus seemed to be that they fit slim in the legs, so I was expecting that. I'm not sure why but the pair that I received is a loose fitting pair that is exactly like the women's pair that I got for myself a few weeks ago. They are very nicely made with a good quality fabric that is not thin or flimsy. The pockets are a such a nice touch, too. My husband cannot stand to wear pants without pockets! These fit him ok because there is a functional drawstring in addition to the elastic waist but the pair that I received is definitely loose fitting in the legs, not slim as pictured. That is just fine with the Mr. though, because he isn't looking for skinny pants. Even though the leg are a bit baggy, I think that I chose the correct size because a size down would have been too small in the waist. For reference, he has a 34" waist & is 5'11" tall.  These are soft, comfortable lounge pants that are perfect for lazy Sundays around the house, or to use as pj's when it's too cold for him to sleep in his birthday suit! I purchased this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review. I would definitely recommend them, as well as the Utopia women's pants which I have & love.

7 Chakra Crystal Healing Tumbled Stones Set. These arrived yesterday & I could not open the package fast enough! They were wrapped well & inside of a nice little keepsake velvet pouch with a drawstring. The first thing that I did before touching them with my bare hands was to clear them with a stick of selenite. All gemstones carry energy & it is important to me to clear anything that I bring into my home, especially something like this that I will be using to work with my own energy. (Not to say that there is anything wrong with who or where they came from, this is just what I have learned to do). The stones are close in size to what is shown in the stock photo, although a few of the ones that I received are a little less colorful. I debated on whether I should give this product five stars or four but after reading over the product description again, it states that you may receive stones 'like'  Amethyst, Fluorite, Aventurine, Jasper, Tourmaline etc. So, technically, they don't all have to be what is listed. I am not a gemologist, although I have been studying gemstones for some time & I am pretty good at identifying them, (with the help of books on this subject when needed). I am not positive on a few of the types of stones that I received & when doing chakra work, this can be extremely important. Again, since it is not specific in the description, I cannot fault the product that I did receive because they are nicely polished stones. I do intend on having them looked at, to identify for sure what stones I do have, (before doing any chakra work with them) just to be on the safe side. Dabbling with the chakras should definitely not be taken lightly, rather extreme caution & care should be taken. Overall, I am satisfied with this product, which I purchased at a discount in exchange for my honest opinion. They are nicely polished gemstones, I just want to know for certain exactly what I have. I am still learning about chakra work & I intend on being as safe as I can when working with my own energy, as I am with any other healing work.

Hair Guard Headband - Clear Water color. This product was an absolute joy to test & review! From the moment that I opened up the package, I was pleasantly surprised. The seller had taken the time to wrap it in tissue paper & add a pink ribbon, (which looks to be a breast cancer awareness ribbon) with a logo sticker & an adorable keepsake magnet attached to it! the magnet reads; 'When you go through deep waters, I will be with you" - Isaiah 43:2. There was also a very nice card included with one of my favorite quotes on it, that says, " For beautiful eyes, look for the good in others; for beautiful lips, speak only words of kindness; and for poise, walk with the knowledge that you are never alone. - Audrey Hepburn.  I cannot express just how thoughtful this seller is & how great it made me feel to open this package & find these little gifts! They went out of their way to make customers feel special & I really appreciate that. The product itself is really cool, too! I got this silicone headband to wear when I sit in our spa because I have colored hair & the chlorine is not a good thing to expose it to. I must admit that although the headband looks really nice, I was scared that I might rip it. It is tougher than it looks, though. It is super stretchy, it fits snugly & does a great job of keeping the water out. I was a little confused about the shape of it/which way to wear it but I found it easy to adjust to my liking. It is much lighter in color than the stock photo, (which is just fine with me) & other than being snug it is pretty comfortable. I chose to wear it behind my ears since I am not actually swimming with mine. It's perfect for keeping the spa water from getting the hair on the back of my neck & head wet. The outside is smooth, while the inside has an almost terrycloth texture, which enables it to stay securely in place, It stretched quite a bit to fit my rather large head but went right back to it's original shape when I took it off. I think that this is a great product & I was happy to purchase it at a discount during a promotion for testing & review. I would definitely recommend this product, as well as this seller.The little extras meant so much & were such a nice surprise!  *(I will add photos soon).

TheraFlow Dual Foot Wooden Massager Roller (Large). I must say, this is a pretty amazing product! Not only does it feel great on my sore feet, it works wonders when I lay on it & slowly roll across it with it under my back! Of course, I am not making any medical claims, I'm only sharing my personal experience. I have a chronic pain condition, so it can be tricky to find things that help to relieve the pain. One thing that also helps me is adjustments from the Chiropractor but I don't get in there nearly enough as I would like to. Sometimes I find myself home alone & I get this pain between my shoulder blades, which is nearly impossible to reach for myself. This wooden massage roller from TheraFlow works great for me when I lay myself across it & gently roll. It's rollers are slightly raised, so my spine fits comfortably down the middle. Before I got this, I tried everything to relieve that back pain, including bending over the arm of the couch backwards & upside down, sometimes making it worse! This makes it feel better when I have nobody else here to massage it & did I mention that it feels pretty incredible on my feet, too? The only reason that I gave it four stars instead of five is that one of the rollers with the large nubs hits the roller after it, so it does not roll smoothly as it should. I am hoping that my husband might be able to fi this, as I'm sure that it is a slight defect & not how all of them are made. Other than that, I am really happy with this product, which I received complimentary in exchange for my honest review. I think that this would make a very nice gift & I do recommend it. It may look a little strange but it is totally awesome!

HOVEOX Tattoo Arm Sleeves - 10 pieces, random. I was super excited to test & review these complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion. I have been looking for a good tattoo artist & I have wanted to do real tattoo sleeves on my arms for a long time. These are a great way for people who are considering tattoos to see what it might look like, as well as to see the reactions that they may get from other people. It's a trip but even in this day & age, there are still some people who get weird when they see tattoos! I am not gong to go as far as to say that these look completely lifelike but they are pretty cool & they certainly fool people at first glance. From a distance, many of them look pretty real. I think that they should sell these in tattoo shops because it really helps to see what it would look like to gaze down & see permanent ink on one's arm. They are also nice if you like to cover your arms but don't want to wear full sleeves due to hot weather. These are nylon sleeves, which allow the skin to breathe better than a long sleeve shirt.  As for the quality & fit, The quality of them is pretty good, especially the prints. I did have an issue with one of them having a snag already when I opened the package, (which was a little bit of a bummer) but I can turn it so that part is not on top. These sleeves fit me well but I am a small person & I did find them snug at the end of the upper arm, after a while. I suppose that this is necessary in order for them to stay on, though. I read another review from a man who was only able to fit them on his forearm, rather than all the way up to his shoulder & I agree that is pretty accurate for larger people. I am a small female, so I was able to pull them all the way up close to my shoulders but again, it felt snug after a while. These are a fun item & I appreciate them for the ability to consider & think about the real tattoos that I want to get. these would also be quite fun for people who just want to experience having tattoos temporarily. Of course, one could use them for part of a costume or kids could use them just for fun, although some of the prints may be questionable to certain parents, depending upon how strict they are with things such as skulls, weapons, etc. Overall, I am pleased with this product & I would recommend it. I am actually going to recommend these to the tattoo parlor, as I feel that they should sell them there.

iTinte Compatible Ink Cartridges for Canon Printer. I have a Canon Pixma printer, which is a few years old but was expensive at the time & still works quite well. The only problem that I sometimes have is finding replacement ink cartridges for it. They are often not available in-store & they are also very expensive! Naturally, I was very excited to purchase this product at a discount during a promotion in exchange for my honest review. These fit & work great, just like the expensive, brand name ink cartridges! I tend to print coupons to save money whenever I can. In addition to saving me money with the coupons that these will allow me to print, they are saving me a lot much money on replacement ink. I do not notice any difference at all so far in the quality or color of these, as opposed to the brand name cartridges. I don't know if they will last as long, (only time will tell on that) but I am quite pleased with this purchase.

Lay It All On Me (feat. Ed Sheeran) I found this song by chance, while browsing music to use up some MP3 credits. I instantly liked it, just from hearing the 20 second clip that amazon lets you listen to. I think that just about anything that has Ed Sheeran sounds heavenly to me. I only recently discovered him but I seem to like anything & everything that he is involved with, musically. Give it a listen & hear for yourself.

Kitchen Maestro Collapsible Over the Sink Silicone Colander / Strainer. This is such a wonderful product to have in the kitchen! I have wanted an over the sink colander for some time but I had never seen a collapsible, silicone one before this. Of course, I jumped at the opportunity to purchase this one at a discount in exchange for my honest review. I am so thrilled with this product! It has exceeded my expectations. Even though it folds flat for easy storage, I have mine sitting across my second sink in my kitchen because I have been using it so often! It's super handy for washing fruit, which I do a lot of. It also is much easier to drain pasta with this, as opposed to a conventional strainer. Before I got this, I had a difficult time juggling hot pots & pans & straining the water without dropping anything. Now, I have an extra hand free for holding onto the hot pan, while the strainer safely rests across the sink. I don't have to worry about anything falling into the sink or burning my hands. The adjustable arms fit perfectly across my sink & are very sturdy. I had a little bit of trouble getting them all the way open the first time but that just showed me that this product is not at all flimsy. I have nothing but great things to say about this strainer & it is even safe to put in the dishwasher! The only thing I can even think of improving would be different color choices but that is just aesthetic. I highly recommend this product to everyone, whether you are someone who loves to cook, a vegan or a raw foodie who cuts up lots of fruits & veggies every day.

Totalohan Mx7 Handheld Flashlight. It is no secret that I collect flashlights! I live in the mountains & we experience frequent power outages. I never want to be without a light, so I strategically place both motion lights & flashlights all around the house, so that they are always within reach. This flashlight is really impressive for several reasons. It is incredibly bright, especially for how compact it is. I absolutely love that because I like a bright flashlight for going outside at night with my fur kids but I don't want to lug around a bulky, heavy light. With this one, I don't have to! It is probably brighter than our largest flashlight, (which is a pain for me to carry) plus this guy has a wrist strap, several settings to choose from & is even adjustable with it's zoom. It comes with a rechargeable battery, (which I prefer) a charger & an insert which allows you to use regular batteries, if needed. This is awesome to have around the house & I will use it often. It would also make a great gift for just about anyone. It would be ideal to keep in the car in case of emergency, since it has an SOS blinking feature. I already have an emergency light in my vehicle, so this one is staying by my door, where it is easily accessible for nightly poodie walks with my dogs. I purchased this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review. I would highly recommend this flashlight.

Utopia Bedding Printed Duvet Cover Set - King, Navy. I ordered this set because I had been wanting it for quite some time. Even though I am a top reviewer on amazon & it had been on a review site, it was not in the size that I needed so I paid full price for it & I'm very pleased with my purchase. The fabric is soft & is indeed wrinkle resistant. I was afraid at first when I opened the package to find that the white parts of the duvet cover had blue on them but it appears that this happened when it was ironed before packaging & it looks to have washed out. I have many items from Utopia & all of them are of excellent quality. I love duvet covers because I have large fur kids, (who of course, lay on my bed) & it is difficult to frequently wash king sized comforters without ruining them. It is much easier to frequently launder duvet covers & this one is so soft & pretty! I am impressed with the quality & I love the fact that the king size comes with king size pillow shams! I have lots of pillows on my bed but none of them are small, so I really appreciate large pillow shams. This duvet is a great value, even if it were on it's own, so the added large shams are like a bonus to me! I would highly recommend this set & the only reason that I haven't purchased the matching sheets is because I haven't seen them in California King size & that is what my bed is. I do, however have some utopia sheets in a solid color & they are terrific as well. As soon as I get this duvet set on my bed, I will update with photos. I can't wait to see this on my bed! it is so pretty & it goes nicely with my blue bedroom furniture.

Dead Sea Magnesium Oil from Magnum Solace. I have been using similar products with much success, so I was happy to receive this product complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion. I gave the bottle to my father, to try out. I thought that it would help him with his muscle aches, as well as with his sleep as it does for me. Well, he called me to tell me that he put it on the bottoms of his feet before bed, (as I suggested) only to have to jump out of bed ten minutes later & wash it off, finding his feet itching, swollen & red! He is not a sickly man & other than the aches that come with getting older, I have rarely seen him have health issues. This reaction is definitely strange & not what I expected, so I got the bottle from him & tried it on myself. I am a person who suffers with multiple chemical sensitivities & allergies, so if anyone should react to something, it would be me. I am able to use it just fine, so I would say that it is a good magnesium product but as with anything use with caution, especially upon the first use. Individual results may vary. I use magnesium daily to help with a number of issues, including muscle pain, cramps, etc. I also find that it works well to aid in falling asleep when I spray it on the bottoms of my feet at bedtime.

Tidy Cats Litter, Clumping 24/7 Performance 27 lb. This litter is pretty good, as far as clumping & such. I have found some that I like more than others, some that have way more dust, some that seem to clump too much or not enough, etc. This one does seem to have a fair amount of dust in it, as my male cat has sinus issues & has been sneezing & getting plugged up nostrils. The scent is strong & reminds me exactly of the scent of liquid Tide. That may be a good thing, or a bad thing depending upon one's personal preference. I ordered this because it was a great value & I thought that this was what we had been using recently, only to find out that I was wrong! (My husband had a large bucket of this, which he had re-filled with another kind of cat litter without telling me). At any rate, this is not bad except that the dust is an issue for my boy & the scent is a little more than I would like. I prefer my house to be scented by nice candles or sprays, not the cat litter or the toilet cleaner. That's just my opinion, though. I scoop daily & don't really need a strongly scented litter. This might be preferable for someone who isn't able to scoop at least once daily, to help with odors.

SunLabz Solar Charger Backpack (7w) INCLUDING 10,000 mAh Power Bank and 1.8L Hydration Pack. My husband originally wanted this but since he isn't a hiker, he decided to hold out for another, more basic backpack. This has so many cool features & I thought that it would make a great gift for my cousin, who is an avid hiker, camper, hunter, etc. In addition to being one of the most intelligent people that I know, he works in the medical profession & he has even hiked the Pacific Crest Trail. (Does this sound like a personal ad for a relative)? LOL! Although I'm sure that one would need a larger pack if hiking such a distance, this is an ideal pack for a day hike, camping, fishing, mountain biking & all other sorts of off road activities. It has the hydration pack built in, (although it can be removed if needed but I don't know why one would do that) & the ability to charge up a low battery is awesome! That could be a real life saver. It is a very well made backpack, stitching is done nicely & it is comfortable to wear. The straps are nicely placed, adjustable & it's an all around awesome pack. It has reflective elements all over for safety, so that while wearing it one is easily visible to motorists, other hikers, hunters, etc. If you are looking for a lightweight pack loaded with extras, this one is pretty cool. I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest review. I added photos with & without flash, to better show the details & so that people can see how reflective it is.

Hyperikon PAR20 LED Bulb, 8W (50W equivalent), 3000K (Soft White Glow), Flood Light Bulb. So far, this light bulb is working out great for me. I have so many different shapes & sizes of light fixtures in my house, I really don't know what they people who built it were thinking! There are several recessed lighting fixtures around my house that take this size of bulb, so I was excited to try this one complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion. I had my husband place it in the ceiling of the master bathroom, where even though there are several lights, it never seems bright enough at night. This light makes it so much brighter in there! Now, I can actually see in my dimly lit shower. The money saving feature of this low watt bulb is a nice plus & the super long life of 45,000 + hours is awesome! I need to get a few more of these little guys for my house! I am thrilled with this light bulb, as it blows away what I had in there before. The light doesn't give me a headache, yet it's bright & I would recommend it for the value, as well as it's performance.

eVogues Plus Size Lace Zipper Front Hoodie. I purchased this lace hoodie in the teal color in size 1X. I love hoodies & I also love to be girlie, so a lace hoodie is the perfect combination for me! I don't like to show my arms, so in the summertime that can be problematic. This hoodie helped me quite a bit because it allows the skin to breathe. It is very pretty & I love that they took the time to add the front pockets! It is super long, though & the zipper is difficult to zip up & down, which is the only reason that I didn't give it five stars. The color is a little less blue & more of a lighter teal than shown in the stock photo. Mine looks closer to the color of my photos without the flash but I included both, as you can see how it appears brighter when the flash is on. It does have a slimmer fit, so do go by the size chart of Junior's rather than women's as suggested. For reference, my measurements are 36-30-36 & the 1X is a pretty good size for me. It perhaps has an inch or two of room & falls way down past my hips, so I have to pull up the waistband & fold it over, or I suppose that I could tuck it in. I do like it a lot, I just wish that it were shorter. The arms are long on me as well, so I have to roll up the sleeves but I am a small person, so that is to be expected with many clothing items. I like it enough to want it in other colors.

Thunder Amazing Singing Birthday Candle. Oh my goodness, we had so much fun with this candle! I saved this candle for several weeks, (which I received complimentary for testing & review) to use for my recent birthday. I spent a quiet night at home with my husband, watching movies, eating goodies & such. I was super excited to finally get to light this birthday candle & my husband could not understand my excitement...That is, until he saw it lit! You see, I am a person who does not like the whole 'singing' before blowing out the candles thing & my birthday isn't something that we usually celebrate. This time, though it was a milestone birthday & this candle made it so much fun! My husband made me a gluten-free birthday cake, (because I am gluten intolerant) & I don't like frosting so when I add photos, please excuse the strange looking cake. When he lit the candle, he finally saw what all of my excitement was about! It went off like a screaming firework for about 20 seconds, shooting sparks over a foot high, (so please be very careful when first lighting this little guy) before it begun to open up, spin & play a lovely. "Happy Birthday" melody. It was just a tune, no singing, so for me, it was perfect. The show of the sparklers, spinning & such entertained us so much that we both could not stop laughing! It was great! I had to gather myself to blow out the candles because they were melting down to the bottom. Once I blew out all of the candles, (in one breath, thank you very much)! my hubby cut the wire as instructed but the tune continued to play! This just made us laugh even harder & he actually had to take it apart to get the tune to quit playing! Apparently, it had melted something inside, which prevented the wire from losing power when cut. I had originally thought that these were re-usable, (that you just had to add new little birthday candles to the petals) but I was wrong. It is a one-time use only candle. However, we were talking & laughing about it for the rest of the evening & it was totally worth it! We have decided that we will get these for each & every birthday of our own, or anyone else's that we attend from now on. They are THAT much fun! I highly recommend this candle, just be cautious not to get it too close to anyone or anything flammable when first lit. I will add photos of it lit when I load them from my camera.

Woodstock Chakra Wind chime with 7 Stones, 24.5-Inch. So, last month my husband took a trip back east for work & he brought back a gift for me from the Woodstock Chakra Wind chime store. We hung it on our front porch & it sounds absolutely heavenly whenever the wind blows. So much so, that I wanted another to hang outside of my bedroom! I decided on this one because I was able to play a sample of the sound on here, in addition to the fact that it symbolizes all of the chakras, which I am studying right now. The wind chime itself is very well made & it sounds good, although it is a little smaller than I expected & the Om symbol that is shown in the stock photos on the wind catcher is not really on there. That was kind of a bummer, as it looked perfect & finished off the product so well but I will either find some Om symbol stickers to put on there, or engrave the wooden wind catcher piece with Om symbols, myself. I am very impressed with this particular brand & although I wish it were larger, (I may attempt to lengthen the wind catcher string) I am pretty happy with this purchase. I believe that I am hooked & I am sure that I will be a repeat customer of Woodstock wind chimes, both for myself as well as for special gifts.

Airtight Food Storage Containers With Lids. I have purchased numerous plastic storage containers over the years, of all different shapes, styles & brands. Some were better than others & some lasted longer, held up better in the dishwasher, etc. One thing that seemed to be a common theme around my house was that when I would go looking for a lid to a container, it would be missing, or vice versa! I often found the missing containers in my husband's car or garage, so I have identified the likely culprit. At any rate, after 19 years of marriage, I was desperately in need of some good storage containers with lids that fit! These containers are really nice, generously sized & I like them a lot. The lids aren't difficult for me to take off, which is important to someone like myself & they seal well. The size is just perfect for many things, such as a dozen cookies or leftovers from dinner. I don't cook every day, due to health issues so when I do, I tend to make double amounts. That is to say, I make enough for at least two meals. These containers are perfect for that because I can fit the second day's meal for two in them. They are safe to use in the microwave & top rack of the dishwasher, so they help me out quite a bit. I also like that they are BPA free. Time will tell just how well they hold up to frequent use but so far, I am pleased with this product. I purchased this set at a discount during a promotion for testing & review.

Deluxe Lingerie Laundry Bags. I use mesh laundry bags constantly, as I have a lot of delicate clothing. This type of bag has become a staple in my house & I am really happy with the improved design of these new bags, as opposed to the bags that I used just a few years ago. They now have elastic zipper covers, which hold the zippers securely in place while going through the washer or dryer. That is so nice to not have to worry about them coming open in the middle of a cycle! These bags from Simple Classix are different than any others that I have tried because they are stretchy. I'm not sure if that is a bad thing, it's just different than any I have used before. I suppose if one wanted to fit a lot of items inside, it would be a plus but I don't over-stuff the bags because I don't feel that things would get as clean if there are too many items in one bag. They can be used to hold wet bathing suits, shorts, towels, etc. after a day at the beach or pool. This is a great way to transport your wet items in the car without getting a musty smell, as long as you remember to take them out of the car & put them in the wash when you get home! These are also great for travel. One thing that I found odd about this particular set was that the two smaller bags have loops to hang them with but the large bag does not. Other than that, so far I am finding them to be a welcome addition to my laundry room. I purchased this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review.

PurpleRain Baby Washcloths. This looked like a really cute set to give as a gift to a family member who has a new baby, so I was happy to review this product at a discount in exchange for my honest opinion. The set arrived inside of a plastic bag & tied with a ribbon, which had come loose. The ribbon was not at all as pictured either. Rather than a large tied polka dot bow, it is a small bright pink bow, which wouldn't do for a baby boy gift. The photo made it look more unisex than it actually is. So, I removed the two pink colored washcloths & re-tied the rest the way that they were supposed to be, going by the photo. I also added a yellow ribbon to match the color scheme. They cloths themselves are pretty thin material & feel like a fine terrycloth. They are not quite as soft as I had expected but perhaps they will soften up after washing. I think that this would make a cute addition to a gift basket, (which is what I intend to do) but I wouldn't give it as a stand-alone gift. Also, be prepared for getting a different color of ribbon than shown in the stock photos.

MintCell 12 Pack Ink tank Cartridges. So far, so good! These fit in my printer & so far, they are working just as well as the name brand ink cartridges. Only time will tell how long they last, so I will update my review if I have any problems such as running out of ink very quickly. I think overall, this is a great value. This set has two of each color, as well as four of the large black ink cartridges at a fraction of the price of the kind that we usually buy in-store & that is IF we can find them in stock! So far, I am extremely pleased with this value pack set of ink cartridges from MintCell. I was happy to purchase this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review. I would definitely recommend this set if you have a printer listed in the specifications.

Reese's Cup Men's Licensed T-shirt. I ordered this T-shirt for my husband because Reese's Peanut Butter Cups are probably his favorite candy in the world. Originally, I was going to give the shirt to him to wear but then I thought about it. Wait a minute! If I wear this shirt around him, it will subconsciously tell him that I am his favorite candy in the whole world! LOL! So, my master plan has begun & I must say, it works great! Now, for the technical aspects of my review; The shirt appears to be well made & is appropriate in size according to the given size chart. It measures 24" pit to pit, laying flat, for a total of 48". The label states that it is 52% cotton & 48% polyester. It says to wash in warm water with like colors. I always wash new garments in cold water the first time, to prevent shrinkage & that is what I recommend for all clothing, unless you want something to shrink a bit. I like the heathered orange color of this shirt & they fun effect that it has on my husband. I am happy that I purchased this product at a discount for testing & review.

Aria Starr Argan Oil Restorative Mask Repair Hair Treatment. Ok, upon first inspection this hair mask reminded me a lot of the last hair mask that I tested. It is very similar in scent, consistency & such. I wondered if it was the same mask packaged under a different brand name. (That other mask was pretty darn good, by the way). Well, I used this mask on my hair tonight & the results were amazing! I usually use a leave-in detangler spray but when I test a new product, (such as this mask) I refrain from adding any other products so that I can gauge how this product worked. It has a nice, light scent & it detangled my hair pretty well in the shower. I left it on for about 20 minutes before rinsing. It left my hair soft & detangled but what really impressed me was how my hair acted after it started to dry. I have naturally curly hair but the more that I color it, the more it has relaxed & the less natural curl it has. This mask seemed to bring the life back to my hair. When I looked in the mirror about 30 minutes after my shower, I had amazing waves in my hair! The kind that you get from lots of work with a beach waves spray & often times, the addition of a curling iron! Oh, my goodness! This stuff is awesome! I always love a good hair mask but this one is supernatural. It gave me awesome, beachy waves without any other styling or products. This one is a keeper for sure! I am so glad that I purchased this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review. I will definitely purchase this again! I love it!

RFID Blocking Leather Wallet for Men. I gave this to my husband as a gift for our anniversary & so far, it's great. Only time will tell how it holds up but it looks nice & appears to be well made. It came in a gift box & is soft leather. He usually buys tri-fold wallets but the one that my husband was carrying was very worn out, so I jumped at the chance to review this one at a discount. He likes it, although I have no idea how effective the RFID blocking is. He put all of his cards & such into it right after I gave it to him, so I believe that he is pleased with it. I am happy to have received a discount on this product in exchange for my honest opinion.

Easyology Premium Cat litter Mat -XL. I got this the other day & I was surprised not only by the size but also the weight of this mat. It is very well made. It's much larger than I expected, which is a good thing! It's so nice, in fact that I am using it as a welcome mat in the front entry way of my house. I tested it out & it does well to trap cat litter, as well as crumbs & such, in addition to dirt & debris. If you choose to use this in front of your litter box, it should work quite well. If you place it under your kitchen sink, it will trap all of the crumbs. (I have a similar one in front of my kitchen sink). This one is just so nice & large that it is going to be perfect for wiping off dirty, snowy wet boots at the front door. We live in the mountains where snow is a virtual certainty in the winter. Along with that comes mud & muck. Thank goodness that I was given the opportunity to test & review this product at a discount. It came just in time for the rainy, snowy season! With a husband who works outside a lot, in addition to having two extra large dogs, I really needed this kind of work horse floor mat by the front door. I think that it's great & I am very pleased with it.

eBoot Marshmallow Roasting Sticks. I received this marshmallow roasting sticks pack of four complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion. I was excited to try these because even though I hate camping, I love roasted marshmallows! I opened up the individually wrapped packages to find that one of the four was broken off at the end, so I was only able to use three of them. (Thus, the four stars rather than five). I informed the seller of this but they didn't offer a replacement. No big deal, we were still able to use three of the sticks, which allowed us to roast six marshmallows at once. We used the leftover coals from our BBQ & the low heat as the coals were winding down was perfect to roast some tasty marshmallows. We will continue to use this method until we are able to afford a fire pit for our back patio. The telescoping design of these sticks extends to a little over 2.5 feet long, keeping your hands a safe distance from the flames while allowing you to perfectly roast your treat of choice. I prefer marshmallows but you can also do hot dogs, or whatever else you desire. We made S'Mores with our roasted marshmallows & they were delish! I will add photos showing the sticks in use, as well as the final treats. One thing that I want to note is that you are supposed to remove the protective end caps before use. They are not meant to be left on when roasting food.

Petmate Chuckit! Indoor Fumbler. I just ordered these for the first time, so I wasn't sure how they would hold up to my extra large fur kids aggressive play. Usually, if a toy makes it past the first hour, (the golden hour) then it's pretty durable & worth the money spent. These held up ok & two days later, they are each still in one piece. However, they are showing major signs of wear. The dogs love them but they are pretty easy to rip up. They are a nice toy to have indoors because they are soft & don't dent or chip the furniture & they are also much more lightweight than most other large dog toys. The fuzzy, mop like cover has a foam, Nerf-type ball inside. It's nice & squishy, which makes my boy who loves to chew want to chew on it endlessly. My girl has decided to try & rip off the outer cover, when she isn't chasing it. My dogs are pretty careful with their toys, given their sheer size & strong bite but these aren't the most chew-proof toys & they probably won't last more than a month. That is only because we put them up when not playing fetch with them. Otherwise, they would likely be shredded in a day or two. For the price, they were totally worth it for us. Since we have introduced kittens into the household, it's nice to have some soft dog toys that won't knock out the cats if they roll into them! My dogs love to get new toys & after a few days when the newness wears off, they settle down & are easier on them. If you have a dog that is careful with their toys & isn't a chewer, I would recommend these. If your dog likes to chew, be warned that these are not going to take aggressive chewing & probably need to be put up after fetch time is over. I added photos to show the size of these, (which is pretty big considering the price). I hope this helps some pet parents decide on some great toys. If your dogs are aggressive chewers or rough on their toys, I highly suggest the ChuckIt! Large ball on a tug strap or West Paw Design Zogoflex toys.

Amariver Leopard Print Floor Mat. This is a nice little floor mat which can be used in several different locations. It could be used at the front door as a welcome mat for wiping shoes, in the kitchen in front of the sink, under a doggie dish or in front of a litter box, to name a few. I was originally going to place it under our kitten's food & water dishes but my husband finally assembled the cat condo that I ordered a while back & I placed it underneath the bottom ladder, so that the cats have a soft place to land when they come down from their kitty tower. It is nice & soft on the top & it has an anti-slip backing. The only thing that surprised me was that the print is a bit different than the one pictured in the stock photo. It's not a big deal for me, though. It is a nice, well made floor mat & I think that the kittens like it just fine! I purchased this product at a discount for testing & review.

Handmade Glass Jar Wax Candle 7oz. Lavender. This candle is ok, I guess. Honestly, I was expecting a lot more from it. It was originally listed as a scented candle but after my order was on the way, the seller emailed me, stating that they had changed it to the category of decorative candles, due to the lack of scent. I wish that I had known that BEFORE I ordered it! They were correct, as there is absolutely no scent on cold sniff. It comes boxed & the little jar is pretty. There is a matching ribbon tied to the top of the lid with a label, which makes it look a bit more generic to me. My husband asked me if I got it from the dollar store! I was going to give it as a gift but not after seeing it in person, due to it's lack of scent & the fact that another person thought that it was a dollar store item. Other than the lack of scent, my main complaint is that it is only about halfway filled with wax. They could have made it a much longer lasting candle by adding more wax & since it is a 3-wick, it is likely to burn down very quickly. I burn a lot of candles, (at least two every day) so I am a bit picky & I know what I like in a candle. For what it is, it's ok. It's a decorative candle with no scent. That's fine but I prefer scented candles & that is what I was expecting to receive. I would probably have given it another star if it had been originally marketed as such when I placed my order but I was expecting a scented candle. The glass vessel is nice & will make a nice votive holder when the original candle is spent. Some people may choose to use it as a candy dish or for something such as a soap or potpourri holder in a guest bathroom. I received this product complimentary for testing & review.

IRIS CLH Hooded Litter Box w Scoop and Cleaning Grate 15" W x 18 7/8" L x 15 7/16" H  - Navy. Well, I purchased this as a backup litter box for when we are washing out the main one. This one is not as large as I expected it to be & unfortunately, it's not very well made. For all of the shopping around that I did, I expected this to be better. It has a flimsy top piece, which doesn't stay properly attached. The grate part that is supposed to reduce the amount of litter doesn't seem to help at all in that regard & it further shortens the space of the litter box. The included scoop is ok, it's slats are too large just as others that I have purchased & I have trouble with large pieces slipping through. However, it is convenient to have the scoop right there, where it rests on the side of the grate. I was sure that it wouldn't work to keep it there, (that the cats would dislodge it) but it goes in there firmly & does indeed stay in place. Overall, this is ok as a backup box but we much prefer our larger, sturdier litter box from another brand.

Deluxury Fine Accessories Premium Mesh Washing Bag Set. These mesh wash bags are a staple in my household. I have a lot of delicate clothing & I like my things to last, so I use these wash bags & line dry my clothing to prolong the life of my garments. This set of mesh washing bags is great because all three are extra large. Measured flat, they are 18" wide X 22" long. This means that I can easily toss things into the washer, (such as my favorite sweatshirts that are embellished with rhinestones) without having to worry. These bags are well made & include elastic zipper covers which hold zippers securely closed during the wash cycle.These bags can also double duty as a place to store wet items such as bathing suits & towels on the way home from a day at the beach. These bags help wet items to dry out because they are ventilated, reducing the musty, moldy odors that can occur. Just don't forget to take wet items out when you get home! I think that these are a great product & I do recommend them. I purchased this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review. This is my honest opinion.

Beckham Luxury Linens 4 piece Sheet Set. I ordered this sheet set in the navy color in California King size. I recently switched from a waterbed to a memory foam mattress & it is 14" deep, (not including the mattress topper) & I needed some sheets that would fit. These sheets claimed to fit a mattress up to 17" deep, so I was sold on that feature alone. What I received was a sheet set that is so soft & scrumptious, I can hardly find the words! I definitely like microfiber sheets but I usually reserve them for the warmer months. However, these are so soft & cozy that I can see myself using them well into fall & in the spring, too! This is a quality set. The color is vibrant & the stitching is nicely done. I love the fact that the pillow cases are king size, too. I have large pillows & I need the extra long pillowcases to fit them, so it's great when the pillowcases included with a sheet set actually fit & I don't have to purchase them separately. Also worth mentioning is that I have two extra large dogs who sleep on my bed & this fabric doesn't seem to attract the dog hair like some other microfibers do. I purchased this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review. I will update soon with photos.

Oatmeal and Neem Oil Shampoo Plus Conditioner 17oz. I am picky when it comes to products that I purchase for my fur kids & I am very impressed with this shampoo! I love the fact that it contains all natural, organic ingredients. I was a little afraid that this would smell funky, due to the neem oil but the scent is pleasant & mild. It reminds me a bit of an orange & peach smoothie. The neem oil is said to help to prevent fleas & ticks, which is a huge plus! Both of my extra large fur kids had a bath with this shampoo & at first, I wasn't sure what to think. They both have short, rather sleek coats, (although my boy has much thicker hair). When they first dried, my boy was super fluffy & frizzy. Oh, no! What had I done? However, within an hour or so, his coat settled down & looked sleek & shiny once again. This shampoo left both of them clean & soft. They don't seem to be itchy at all, so I am giving this shampoo a thumbs up. It is quite a generous sized bottle for the price, too. I purchased this product at a discount for testing & review. I will happily purchase it again, at full price when I run out of it.

Thunder Chalkboard Stick-on Labels and White Color Liquid Chalk Pen. These labels are great for crafters & neat freaks alike! I am someone who fits into both of those categories, so when I was given the opportunity to test this product complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion, it was a match made in heaven! I like these particular labels a lot because they are pre-cut into attractive shapes that are perfect for any style of dcor. They are great to use in the kitchen, office, laundry room, etc. for labeling jars, containers, miscellaneous boxes, folders, & so on. They are also really pretty & you can dress them up even further in creative writing & designs with the included liquid chalk pen. I have a bunch of different colored liquid chalk pens, which work really well on these labels. You can even make custom gift tags, or greeting cards with these fun little labels! I like to save my candle jars after the candles are spent & after removing the labels & washing them, I use these labels to re-purpose them. Whatever you choose to do, I'm sure that you will find a creative way to use these chalkboard labels. They are just wonderful to have around the house & I would highly recommend them.

Aprince Solid Brass Shut Off /Bidet Control Valve with Short Switch. This shut off valve is exactly what we needed! We were looking for something like this, which allows us to shut off the flow of water while shampooing our dogs, without having to turn the water off & on. This does the job with a quick flip of a switch. It has a left to right switch that you just press with your thumb. Attached in between the shower head & hose, this allows one to control the flow of water. It would be great for those who like to turn off the water while shaving their legs, applying a hair mask, etc. It also helps to conserve water, so you can fee good about using this. I like the fact that it allows you to maintain the correct water temperature, too. I was happy to receive this product complimentary for testing & review.

Door Stopper - 5 Pack. These door stoppers are of average size & length. They work well on most doors, to keep them open, (or closed) as needed when you wedge them underneath. I got these because I have two large dogs who often open & close doors that I wish to be left open, (or closed) & these seem to solve the problem for the most part. However, my laundry room door, (which is the main one that tends to slam shut) goes right over the top of these, completely clearing them. So, if you have a higher set door, these may not be effective. I was shocked when I put one down & the door went right over the top! Darn it! I guess that door is hung higher than the rest. Oh, well. This handy pack of door stoppers has solved other problems for me. My master bedroom has double doors leading into it & even though one of the doors has a lock in the top of the frame which enables it to stay closed while the other is functioning, in my opinion it is on the wrong side & it cannot be switched. If that door is shut & the other is open, people can see straight into my bedroom from the front door. Not good! So, I always have that door cracked open & the other shut, which in the past I was having to find creative ways to prop the doors shut & open to the desired place. Now, I can keep the door shut that I want & prop the other door open to my liking. With these door stoppers wedged under there, even my big dogs aren't accidentally pushing the doors where I don't want them to be. Excellent! They are also great for propping open doors on breezy days, allowing fresh air to come in without having doors slamming shut. I was happy to purchase this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review.

Set of 2 Trimmers - Nose Hair Trimmer & Beard Trimmer Kit. I have mixed feelings about this set, so I averaged the stars out based on my experience with the two trimmers. First, the nose hair trimmer is excellent & I would give it five stars for sure. It not only trimmed my nose hair, it shaved it clean & works better than any other nose hair trimmer that I have ever tried. It got to the hard to reach places easily & didn't leave any stray hairs behind. With my previous trimmers, I would have to use scissors to get the hairs that were left, which is kind of scary & I am glad to not have to stick scissors in my nose anymore! This is a fantastic nose hair trimmer & I would highly recommend it. However, the beard trimmer set is less than wonderful. The included comb is an average comb but the scissors are so flimsy that they bend when opening & closing them, making it impossible to cut any hair with them. They are probably not effective to use on anything but perhaps paper, in my opinion. The beard trimmer has even more issues. While I kept the nose hair trimmer for myself, I gave the beard trimmer to my husband. He is less than thrilled, to say the least. After we inserted the required batteries, (which were not included) the back of the battery case fell off & does not properly fit back on. It tries to come open every time it is touched, making it difficult to use the trimmer. The trimmer itself is not effective. My husband has a moustache & chin hair but not a full beard by any means. He tried to use it to trim his face, (on the shortest setting) but it would not cut a single hair! It even got stuck repeatedly as he attempted to get the trimmer to cut any whiskers. He was not happy about this, especially since I was standing there taking pictures as this occurred.  If this won't work on his small amount of facial hair, I don't see how it would work on someone with a full beard. Of course, we didn't expect it to shave his face, since it is only meant to trim but since it didn't cut a single hair & it got stuck, I would call this one a fail. We put brand new batteries in it, so I know that was not the problem. So, overall I had to average this set to three stars. I purchased this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review.

Cenoire Eluo Sonic Toothbrush. I ordered this toothbrush in the pink camo color. I'm not sure why I chose this color, as it doesn't match any of my handbags but I just thought that it was super cute! It comes packaged, along with instructions, two extra brush heads, (which are a great bonus) & the required battery. I always appreciate it when a product includes the necessary batteries. The case is long & slim, making it super portable & easy to fit into a purse or gym bag. I like the fact that it has an enclosed case, (which keeps the toothbrush sanitary & protected). I think that it looks like a fancy tampon holder or perhaps a personal massager. I asked my husband what he thought that it looked like & he said, "a lipstick case". LOL! That would be one long lipstick case! Anyway, besides being totally adorable, this toothbrush is very handy to have in my purse. I have had braces twice in my life, as well as a retainer & I then I had to wear an oral splint for several years to correct a jaw problem. With all of that going on, I was constantly brushing my teeth & it got me into the habit of brushing each time that I eat, which I still do to this day. This product would have been a great thing to have back then & I would recommend it to anyone who has dental work. It would also make an excellent, practical gift to someone such as a teen who has braces. It comes in many different colors & patterns, so there is sure to be something for everyone. The toothbrush itself seems to work pretty well. Although the head doesn't spin like my other electric toothbrush, it is quite powerful & leaves my mouth feeling nice & clean. I love the fact that the head has a tongue cleaner on the back of it. The fact that it comes with two additional refill brush heads is just awesome! I would highly recommend this whether it is for yourself or as a gift. I am happy to keep this in my purse so that I can brush my teeth when I eat away from home. I purchased this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review.
