I added photos to show the pretty color, pattern & size of it, as well as different angles so that you can see all of the parts & the tongue cleaner on the back of the brush heads. I hope that this review is helpful!

Zebest TM House Wall Adapter Charger Cord for DVD Players. This little guy totally made my day, yesterday! Heck, it made my year! It's really the little things in life, that make a big difference. I have a medical condition which causes wicked dizziness, (especially when I'm in the shower) & I found that having a DVD player in the bathroom makes a big difference for me. Having the tv screen to look at seems to help me greatly. So, I have a portable DVD player on the other side of the glass wall of my shower. (Hey, whatever works)! Well, the other day the DVD player quit working. I mean, it just DIED! I was not a happy camper, to say the least. I had my husband test the power supply & sure enough, it was the plug that had gone bad. (Probably my bad for having it near steam but I need it in there). I can't afford to purchase another DVD player, so I was super bummed. I have been through several months at a time where I had to sit in the shower & it was not fun, especially when trying to wash my long hair. So, I found a wall adapter & ordered it, thinking that I had solved the problem but it was the wrong size. (Long sigh)... Then, this baby popped up & I knew as soon as I saw the plug end that it was the correct size that I needed for this off-brand DVD player that I love so much but cannot easily find parts for. It shipped quickly & I opened that box like a little kid on their birthday! It fits my DVD player & I did a happy dance when it turned on once again. Now, I can wash my hair! Woot! Small victories, I tell you. I purchased this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review.

Wastar Creative Square 2pcs LED Wall Lamp Bedroom Night Light for Kids with Sensor - Blue. I love these little night lights! They put off just the right amount of blue ambient light. They have a nifty built-in sensor, which allows them to know when when it is light in the room & they turn off on their own. This saves energy, money & prolongs the life of the lights. These are smaller than I expected but that is only because I first tried the clover light from the same company & I was expecting these to be similar. They also came in a two-pack, which I was grateful to have. These are really neat because they plug directly into the wall & don't require any batteries. I have one plugged in where I walk into my master bathroom, (which has all blue tile) & the other plugged in outside of the bathroom door in my bedroom. I love the blue glow that they put off at night. It isn't too bright to distract my sleep, (although I am a person who does like night lights) & they give off enough light to enable me to walk to the bathroom & back without having to turn on a lamp in the middle of the night. I am very pleased with this product, which I received complimentary for testing & review. I took several photos of the light in daylight, as well as with the flash on in the dark & then with the lights off so that you could see how it looks at all times of night & day. If you found this review helpful, please click the, 'Yes' button below.

HAMIST Finger Clips Slim-Line Gray(Pack of 20). These are wonderful, multi-purpose clips. They are strong & sturdy, especially compared to other clips that I have tried. They are such a nice thing to have around the house because they are so functional. I used them last night as a chip clip, to close a package of expensive cookies that have bad packaging but taste oh so yummy, to hang wet delicates to dry in the laundry room, to hang leggings up for photos & to hang my pants with a top to have an outfit ready in my closet. I'm sure that they will come in handy for all kinds of other things, too! I love how they pop onto hangers, giving me the ability to double the space in my closet & put an outfit together without wrinkling anything. I have the flocked hangers from a shopping channel in my closet but these clips are also big enough to attach to the cheap, plastic hangers that you get at the big box stores. I clipped them on last night to a plastic hanger in the laundry room & it worked just fine. I am quite happy with this product, (which I purchased at a discount during a promotion for testing & review) & I would recommend them as a great, multi-purpose accessory to have around the house. I plan on keeping a few in the kitchen, a few in the laundry room & the rest in my closet.

J.TOMSON Women's Active Workout Athletic Running Yoga Leggings. I ordered these leggings in the navy color in size Large. According to the size chart, they should have fit me but they seem a bit large in the waist, so they pucker out in the back like some jeans do. Other than that, I really like them a lot. They are well made & thicker than most leggings. They are not at all too sheer or flimsy to wear in public. Although a tad bit stiffer & less stretchy than your average leggings & they are a better quality, in my opinion. For reference, my measurements are 36 - 30 - 36 but since these seem to be low-waisted, (which I love & is a difficult feature for me to find in leggings) they are just too wide in the waist for me.(I measured the waist & laying flat, they are 31.5").  I would have given them five stars for sure, if they fit me in the waist.. I am really glad that I didn't order an Extra Large, (which I am always tempted to do when it comes to shopping for clothing on amazon) as most items seem to run small but these definitely don't appear to be junior's in size. I would say that they are of average length, (I had to scrunch them a few inches at the ankles as I usually do because I am under five feet tall). I didn't measure the inseam but I would guess it to be around 30-31". I hope that this helps other shoppers to choose their correct size, as I often rely on other reviews with sizing information to find my proper size.  They are very flattering to my curvy figure & I will be totally comfortable wearing them in public, as opposed to most leggings which I only reserve for lounging around the house. I would love to have a pair in every color, I'm just not sure which size to go for, as I am afraid that a Medium would be too tight in the rear. I have many pairs of leggings that range in price from $70 to $7 or less & I tend to be picky about them. I look for a comfortable fit & nice fabric as well as those which flatter my figure, rather than accentuating any lumpy bits. I am a little person but the wrong cut or fabric can make a huge difference.  Overall, I am very impressed with these & I would recommend them. I purchased this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review.

Solar Outdoor String Lights. These lights charged up well after two days in the sun & so far they work just fine. The string that I received seems to be more of a yellow color, rather than a warm white, (which I also have). They are a dainty size but put out a pretty decent glow, especially for solar lights. I have a strand that just quit working for no apparent reason, which is strung along one of my deck bannisters, so we are going to take them down & replace them with this set. They last for several hours each night, on the constant setting. I was expecting a lighter/warm white color but other than that, they seem like a good set of lights. Only time will tell, as some others have held up under rain & wind, while others have quit working for no apparent reason at all. I purchased this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review.

The Mighty Bald Eagle 3-D Kite. This kite looks really cool! It has a huge wing span & is much larger than any kite that I had as a kid. I always wanted a large kite, so I was very excited to test this product at a reduced price in exchange for my honest opinion. It seems well made & was easy to assemble in less than five minutes. We have had zero wind since it arrived, so we finally decided to assemble it & play with it in the driveway, without the string. My husband was like a kid in a candy store, running around the driveway with this thing! I was able to get some great photos, (which I will add later). As soon as we get some decent wind, we will hop into the car & head down to the nearby lake, so that we can see how this guy flies. It has been impossible, so far due to the total lack of wind but I will update after we have had a chance for him to get some air. If you are a kid at heart, or you have a child who loves kites, I would suggest picking up this one. It looks really cool & would make an impressive gift for a little kid!

Wastar 3pcs Creative Double Mesh Bra Lingerie Bag Portable Folding Wash Bag Laundry Bag for Delicates. This is a must-have set of wash bags for delicate items. I have many articles of clothing that I will only wash in these mesh laundry bags. Otherwise, I would have to hand wash them & that would take me forever! These come in a set of three & have a cool design that pops up & has a wire around the top & bottom that helps to protect the garment inside & keep the shape in tact. These are perfect for washing bras, bathing suits, sports bras & any other lingerie that you don't want flattened in the wash. They work really well & finally, bras will come out of the washing machine in the same shape that they went in! I am just thrilled with these & I am so happy that I received this product complimentary for testing & review. I would highly recommend picking up a set, if you have any delicates that you want to protect in the wash.

RockBirds DC 12V 2 Amp Power Adapter. This is a nice, well made product that works fine & I have no complaints about it. It seems well made & even comes with an extra adapter that can be attached at the end to fit different plugs. I had ordered it in hoopes that it would replace the power supply on my portable DVD player that recently quit working but the end is the wrong size. That is my fault, though. The good news is that I have plenty of electronics around the hose that this does fit, so should any of their power supplies go out, I have an extra backup that will work, already on hand! I purchased this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review.

Catit Carbon Replacement Filter. Well, I had high hopes for this product when I first purchased these filters, along with the littler 'house' that they refill. However, I don't think at this point that they do much in the way of controlling odors. I scoop the litter box every day, (at least once, if not more) & it still smells. I've tried different types of litter & some are definitely much better than others but the bottom line is that it does smell & litter boxes require a lot of cleaning. If they are not scooped daily & cleaned out & filled with fresh litter weekly, they just stink! Even with the above average cleaning of the litter box that we do, it still smells. This is why I don't feel that these filters are doing very much. I sure do wish that they were & that I could report good results but I just don't notice any difference between this one & the other, plain litter box that we rotate it with when the other is being cleaned.

AYL 3-in-1 LED Vehicle Emergency Flashlight. This is such a must-have item to keep in your vehicle! You never know when you might need a flashlight, emergency signal, or work light & this has all of those built into one amazing product! I have a similar one that I keep in my vehicle & my Dad really wanted one when he saw it. So, I was super excited when I had the opportunity to test & review this one complimentary, in exchange for my honest opinion. This is nearly the same as mine. It has a regular flashlight at one end, a bright LED work light with a magnet at the end, which enables one to hang in from the inside of the hood of a car, if repairs are needed. It also has an emergency blinking feature in red. This is a product that I think that everyone should have in their car! It would make a great gift for teens who just got their first cars, for elderly relatives & anyone in-between! It is super easy to use. You just need to add 3 AAA batteries & it's ready to go. I would highly recommend this product. I took several photos to show the different light settings. I hope that this helps others to make an informed decision when choosing to purchase this item.

MAESTRO GEAR 4 LED Clip On Music Stand Light / Reading Lamp. This is another superb product from Maestro Gear! These little clip-on lights are so versatile. You can use them for a reading light in bed, by your computer, or even in the car! They are great for a person who wants to read at night without disturbing their spouse. They are perfect for a student sharing a dorm with a roommate or a bedroom with a sibling, who needs to study late while the other is sleeping. The compact size & portability also allows one to take this along in the car without hassle. It comes ready to go, straight out of the box. No need to add batteries or anything! I love that! There is also an included adapter plug, if you wish to plug it in. I am so pleased with this product & I would highly recommend it to just about anyone. I am sure that there is someone in every household that could use this great little gadget! I purchased this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review. I took photos showing the light in all of it's settings; off, with one left & one right light on & then with all four lights on. If you found this review helpful, please click the, 'Yes' button below. Thanks!

VertX Polarized Sport Sunglasses. I ordered these sunglasses for my husband. He has over an hour commute to work, (each way) & he often works outside in the sun, so he needs good eye protection. However, when I opened the package to inspect them for my review, I found that they are perfect for me! I showed them to my husband & told him that I got them for him but he instantly said that I should keep them, because they are, "So you"! (His words, but I agree)! It is not often that I find such a great pair of sunglasses that I both like & that fit me so well. These are really comfortable & they definitely have the look that matches my style. They are clear, rather than white as they appear in the stock photos. The lenses are polarized blue, yet when you look through them when wearing them, they have not a blue tint but more of an amber color. They have a crisp, clear view, comfortable frame & I like them a lot! I am super picky when it comes to sunglasses, so it was awesome that these worked out so well for me. I usually have to get very high end sunglasses, which are way out of my price range. For that reason, I was desperately in need of a new pair. These also came with a silky white carrying bag. I am thrilled that I was able to purchase this product at a discount during a promotion but I can tell you that they are worth every penny of the retail price! These may be marked as men's sunglasses but I am a woman & they fit me perfectly. I love these for the every day wear but they would also work well for skiing, sunbathing & other outdoor activitiess.

Women's Lightweight Open Front Long Sleeve Casual Cardigan. I ordered this in the charcoal color. It is a bit darker than I expected but I think that it is very pretty. It is super soft & comfortable! I would give it five stars except for the fact that it has a hole in the left pocket, making the pockets useless. I contacted the seller & they have sent an exchange. I am still giving the garment four stars for the overall comfort & style. I will still wear it but I will just tie it in the front, since the pockets are unusable. I have purchased several items from this seller & they seem to be in Junior's sizes. I got the large & it measures approximately 40" maximum at the bust, laying flat. It is difficult to give an exact measurement since it is an open front design. I am a 36 B & it fits me well, although I don't think that it would fit much more than one or two sizes up from that. The arms are a little snug but it is stretchy material, so it isn't uncomfortable. If you have thick upper arms & are self-conscious about them, I would size up due to the sheerness & the snug fitting arms. I am a small person, usually a size 6 or 8, depending upon the brand & the size Large fits me well. I think that these are Junior's sized but I see that they have added extended sizes now. I hope that this helps other shoppers to choose the correct size. I know that I depend greatly upon other reviews regarding sizing when I am shopping online. (If you found this review helpful, please click the 'Yes' button below). I like it a lot because the design is cute & the fabric is so soft. I purchased this product at a discount for testing & review. *The replacement garment arrived & it is perfect. The customer service of this seller is top notch & they go out of their way to make their customers feel special. I have purchased from them before & will continue to do so in the future. I highly recommend this product, as well as other products from Mall 24/7. Happy Shopping!

Majestic Pure Argan Oil Hair Mask. I am picky when it comes to hair products but I like this mask a lot. I grew up in a salon, so I have had the opportunity to try most of the high end products that are on the market. I have thick, coarse, curly hair that is also color-treated, so it tends to be quite dry & I have to baby it a bit. Using masks that are super hydrating is one of the best ways that I have found to keep my hair looking & feeling great. This mask really impressed me, the way that it made my hair feel after it dried. I used it in the shower & let it sit in my hair for about 20 minutes before I rinsed it out. The things that I look for in a holy grail hair treatment are; scent, (my favorite hair mask smells divine) although that should not be the deciding factor, how well it detangles my hair & how my hair feels after it dries. The smell was pleasant, yet not overwhelming. I find that refreshing because some hair products, (especially with treatments such as argan oil) can tend to be unpleasantly scented. This just reminds me of an average conditioner scent, like the kind you get when you stay at a hotel. It detangled my hair ok in the shower but not super easily, which is one thing I look for in a great hair product. However, by the time that I rinsed it out my hair was tangle-free. When I got out of the shower, my hair was not tangled at all & this really kept the frizz away. It made my hair feel soft & moisturized and this was just a few days after I had my hair colored, so it was especially stressed & dried out. I will take this end result any day! I am really impressed with this hair mask & I intend to purchase it again, when I run out. I purchased this product at a discount for testing & review & I would highly recommend it.

Shwizadle Flexible BBQ Skewers. What an amazing idea! Seriously, whomever invented this product was brilliant! I like a lot of fruit & veggies with my BBQ'd chicken but my husband is constantly complaining about how there isn't enough room for all of it on the BBQ grill. Well, these flexible skewers solved that problem! Not only do they make the most of the space on the grill, they are better at keeping the food on the skewer & not falling into the coals. You can do all sorts of things besides fruits & veggies, too. Fish, chicken or beef kebabs work well on these guys. It just makes using the grill that much easier when you have the flexibility that these give you. No more wasted space on the grill! Now, instead of using the dwindling coals for my pineapple & peppers, (& winding up with half-cooked kebabs) I can use the leftover coals for my dessert; Roasted marshmallows! Yes, please! I purchased this product at a discount for testing & review. I would happily purchase them again & I would recommend them to anyone who likes to BBQ.

Silicone Heat Resistant Grilling BBQ Gloves. These silicone, heat resistant gloves are an awesome accessory to have on=hand in the kitchen or when lighting up the BBQ grill. I have a similar pair in my kitchen, which totally save me from burning my hands on my gas stovetop, (the same exact pots & pans that I used on my old electric stove burned the heck out of my hands on my electric stovetop). A family member recently spotted a pair of these in my kitchen & for fear of mine going missing, I ordered this pair! (What can I say? I have cool stuff & my friends & family want what I have)! These gloves get the job done & are heat resistant up to 425 degrees, although I am not pushing it. I like that they provide protection from burns while I am able to maintain the dexterity in my fingers. They are textured but I can still feel what I am touching through the silicone material. I have also found these gloves quite useful in opening stubborn jars with ease. This is quite handy when I don't want to bother my husband, or when he isn't even around! I don't enjoy the helpless female feeling, or having to ask for help. I purchased this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review.

Electrode Pads 40 Reusable TENS Unit Pads from alegriaCare. These were just what I needed for my TENS unit & now I have plenty of refills on hand for when the others wear out. I love the fact that they are latex-free & FDA cleared. These fit perfectly with the TENS unit that I have, which I use for both muscle pain & strengthening. These are great & I am totally happy with this product. I received a discount during a promotion for testing & review but these are an excellent value at their regular price, too!

Funny Saying Beer Can Koozie 5 Pack Premium Polyurethane Coolers with 5 Unique Quotes. These are great! All of my life, I remember my dad having beer koozies, (I think he even used them when he was drinking soda). I mean, why not? They definitely keep drinks colder, longer. Those old school ones that he had, though were made of thick foam & all of them eventually split, broke apart or simply wore out. I was so happy to find these at a discount for testing & review because my dad will really appreciate some new ones! I am going to give these to him for Christmas with some new flavors of beer to try. The quotes are hilarious & the new, sleek material is sure to last longer than the first generation koozies did. I have been gluten-free for about four years, now & my did is trying it, too after years of intestinal issues. I am going to gift these with some different choices of gluten-free beers in hopes that he will find a new favorite.

Organic Yoga Mat Cleaner with Free Towel from Asutra. This mat cleaner works as great as it smells! It has a light, refreshing lavender scent that is not overpowering. I like that it has organic ingredients, too. I can use this to clean off my other equipment, such as my large inflatable stability balls & yoga blocks, as well. It doesn't leave a sticky residue & it makes me feel better to clean things right after I use them, rather than having any leftover sweat on things , later! The free towel that was included is a nice bonus item. It is larger than I expected, which is nice. It's not a body towel, (well, in a pinch, it would do the job) but it works great to wipe down the mat & other equipment. I suppose it would make a great sweat towel, too. At any rate, I am really happy that I had a chance to try this product at a discount for testing & review. It's just lovely!

Jolly Pets Toys Jolly Bounce-N-Play Dog Toy - Blueberry, 6 inch. My dogs LOVE these balls! I have two Cane Corso, (Italian Mastiff) & they love to play with these balls. Of course, we have the big, horse Jolly Balls, too. Those can be a bit much inside the house, though. This size was a great alternative. They can have their balls, without the huge size They are quite durable, although it depends upon how your dog treats his or her toys. If you don't pay any attention to them & give them this ball, they will likely shred it, even if it takes some time. On the other hand, if you play with them on a regular basis, toss the ball & let them herd or fetch it, they will likely develop a great affinity for this ball & be less likely to sit & destroy it. We have had these balls for several months now & they are still not ripped up. They do show signs of wear, chewing, etc. My boy likes to chew his ball, so I have to be sure to interact with him when he has it. My girl really loves to herd the ball, so she could play on her own for longer periods without supervision, if I didn't have to stop her from over exerting herself! At any rate, if your dogs have tried a Jolly Ball before, or if you are wondering about the strength, texture & longevity of them, this is a great place to start. I'm not sure if my dogs care much about the scent/flavor but it's a nice added touch to smell blueberries, rather than doggie breath.

Qing Outdoor Adult's Daily Stripe Beanie. This is a nice looking, well made beanie. It has an attractive pattern of stripes, which include black, blue, olive, aqua & bright green colors. It is 100% acrylic & is a larger gauge knit which makes it ideal for a warmer, wintertime hat. It is longer than others, so it easily accommodates thick or long hair & it allows you to scrunch it up for the slouchy look, which is always in style. I also like to wear a headband underneath, (to help to keep my hair out of my face) & that isn't a problem with this at all. This beanie definitely keeps my head warm on cold morning walks with my dogs. I live in the mountains, so I am confident that it will work well for those who ski or snowboard. It would be a great addition to any wardrobe, if you like to enjoy the outdoors when it's cold. I received this product complimentary for testing & review.

Clip on Book Light. This is a great little clip on light. It is lightweight & portable, doesn't take up much space & can be used just about anywhere. Since it is battery powered, it can even be used in the car, on a plane, train, camping or wherever else you may need a light. It is surprisingly bright for such a little light & I enjoy having these for reading, as well as using my computer at night when I don't want to disturb my sleeping husband. The only drawback that I can find so far, is that it doesn't have the option of a power cord. There is no way to re-charge it, so new batteries will be required frequently. Other than that, it seems great for occasional use. I think that I will tend to use my other, similar clip on lights that have a power supply cord because it is much more convenient than constantly buying & changing batteries. I received this product at a discount for testing & review.

Inspirational Silicone Wristbands. I love these! They are super funny & the saying is exactly what I needed. I am saving these to give to my husband as a gift. It is a gentle reminder to get his 'To do' list done. LOL! This seriously couldn't be more perfect. I think that most wives would agree that their husbands could benefit from having these on their wrists! I love that they are made from silicone, rather than latex, too. I am allergic to latex, (as are at least one in ten people) so it's great to see things being made from silicone instead. I am happy that I had the opportunity to purchase these at a reduced price for testing & review. They make me smile & hopefully they will help me with some gentle persuasion, as far as getting some help around the house.

VIRGIN ONLY Women's Denim Jeans Printed Elastic Waist Band Seamless Leggings. I chose color 157 in black. These are super cute, cotton/spandex leggings that look like jeans with the comfort of pajamas! They pattern is very pretty, the flowers look hand painted & the jean details, such as the pockets, crease lines & such look incredibly real. They fool the eye from a distance because they absolutely look like skinny jeans! I have some similar leggings that were advertised on tv, which are nowhere near as stretchy & comfortable as these are. When they first come out of the package, they look absolutely tiny but they stretch to fit. It is difficult to shop for clothing online, especially when it is a 'one size fits most' deal, such as this. I am happy to report that these leggings fit me with ease & I would expect that they can stretch to fit up to two sizes larger than me & still be very comfortable. (For reference, my measurements are; 36 - 30 - 36).  The material isn't thin or see-through in any area & they are a high quality item that I would gladly re-purchase. I will most likely order more at full price in other colors because they are so cute & comfortable! I purchased this product at a discount during a promotion but I would happily pay full price, (which is still quite a deal) & I would definitely recommend them to others.

Mic Mic Men's Marled Moisture Control Assorted Crew Socks, 2 Pack - Gray & Green. These are a nicely made, high quality sock. They are cushioned at the heel & foot bed and are quite soft & comfortable. I would definitely say that these are more of a Fall/Winter sock, due to their thickness. They are a quarter length sock with some funky stripes, as pictured. I received a pack of two, one gray pair & one green. My husband & I tried them on, in order to take some fun photos. They are really great socks, stretchy, comfortable & cozy. The only thing that I can caution is that they seem to run small, as they fit my women's size 8 feet perfectly & although they fit my husband's size 10 (men's) feet, they were a bit snug. Since they are being sold as men's, I would recommend them to men with a size 10 or smaller shoe size. After having tried them on myself, I think that women with size 7 & up feet would enjoy wearing these, too! I thought that they were quite comfy & if they had not fit my husband, I would gladly claim them as my own. I was happy to receive this product complimentary for testing & review.

Vaulia Lightweight Polyester microfiber Reversible Duvet Cover Set, Print Floral Design, King Size. I am absolutely loving this duvet set! I have a California King size bed & this duvet is generously sized, so that I still have several inches left on either side. It is so gorgeous that it's difficult to capture on film. You just have to see it for yourself! It is made really well & they even took the extra step to sew in a hidden zipper, so that you can easily stuff it with a comforter. I have tried different types of duvet covers before & it is difficult to find one that has a hidden zipper. Most companies just add a few buttons or Velcro, because it's easier. I prefer the hidden zipper because not only is it easier to insert the comforter, it is faster & it looks sleeker. The overall appearance is more polished when there are no buttons or gaps in-between buttons showing. I have my bedroom decorated in mostly blue, with a blue washed bed & dark blue furniture. This duvet set look so pretty in there & it picks up the other colors in the room & livens up the place. The only thing that I would have differently is the shams. They are red & I wish that they would have been blue, or at least reversed to blue but that is just my personal preference. Did I mention that this duvet is reversible? Yes! Both sides have a print on them & you can choose which one that you want face up, depending on your style preferences. I tried to photograph it to show how it looks but honestly, the stock photo is really great. The side with the blue at the bottom, (as shown) is how I have mine, (which looks like a Moroccan style print) & then the other side is busier print with more red & less blue. It reminds me a bit of a bandana print. I will attach photos to show for a better view. I washed on cold & threw it in the dryer on low & it came out great  wrinkle free. I am super happy with this duvet, which I received complimentary for testing & review. I would recommend it, as it is an excellent value for the price. It even includes the matching shams, which are nice & large for your king size pillows, (included with king size). There are different styles to choose from & then you get two patterns, (for when you feel like mixing it up) since it is reversible. The customer service was extremely helpful & friendly & I am totally satisfied with this product.

Food Should Taste Good Real Good Bar Macadamia Chai. Ok, these are so yummy that I would consider them one of the top five tastiest gluten-free snack bars that I have tried, (and I have tried ALOT of bars) since going totally gluten-free nearly 4 years ago. In addition to being gluten-free, they are Non-GMO, with no artificial colors, flavors or preservatives & they're made with fair trade cocoa! These low-sodium snack bars have healthy ingredients, that taste good, too! The ingredients are; almonds, sugar, honey, tapioca syrup, macadamia nuts, palm kernel oil, toasted coconut, cocoa powder, cashews, sunflower lecithin, allspice, vanilla extract, ginger, cinnamon sea salt & cardamom. (The box states that they may also contain traces of soy & pecan). They are dipped in chocolate & then drizzled with more over the top. The taste is out of this world! If you love nuts, chocolate & chai spice, you should give these a try! They aren't overly spicy but there is a nice balance between the nuttiness, slightly sweet flavor & the mellow spice is nicely balanced out by the chocolate flavor. Seriously yummy! They do contain a whopping 16 grams of fat per bar, but that's to be expected when eating several grams of nuts. It's certainly a better choice than a handful of fried potato chips!  I would compare them to Kind bars, although none of the Kind bars have this particular flavor mix. This is definitely a snack that I want in my cupboard! I dig them & I hope that they will continue to roll out more interesting flavor combinations. Products like this make it so much easier to stay gluten free without feeling  deprived.

InsideSmarts Waterproof Car Garbage Can & Storage Organizer. These things are so useful! We have a similar one that we strapped with velcro to the end table, in between our couches. We use it as a garbage there, since we have two large dogs who constantly need their faces wiped & are always chewing up toys & leaving chunks all over the floor. It's also handy to toss used tissues into, (since I have major allergies) until we can empty it into the large garbage can. It's perfect for keeping the living room tidy & clutter-free. When watching a movie, we can throw our snack wrappers & empty cans/bottles into it & later sort them into the recycle bin. Another really great function of these, (and what we plan on using this one for) is a portable snack & drink cooler! It makes the most convenient & handy little tote to take along drinks, snacks, dog treats & such when we load up the car. We always take our dogs with us, (no matter where we go) so it is essential that we have with us at all times things like extra water, treats, wipes, toys & snacks for ourselves. This organizer from InsideSmarts has great pockets all over it, which is perfect for stuffing in our necessities. There's plenty of room for extra things that we need with us like poop bags, anti-bacterial hand gel & such. The lining is awesome because it actually helps to insulate drinks & keep them cold. This is truly a multi-purpose organizer & it's awesome to take along every time we head out the door. It would be a good thing to keep in the car, take on picnics or wherever your adventures may take you. I am really glad to have received this complimentary for testing & review. (I enjoyed the treasure hunt, too)!

Utopia Wear Women's Jersey Lounge Pants. I ordered these in size Large, after reading other reviews stating that they run big. I like my pajama pants to be baggy, so I usually order XL but the Large is perfect. To help others order their correct fit, the measurements of my size Large pants are; 32" waist, (unstretched, with the ability to cinch them up as needed with the drawstring) 11" rise & 28" inseam. The first thing that I noticed was how well made these pants are. I am impressed with the quality & the material is thicker than I expected it to be. The waistband has elastic, as well as a functioning drawstring & they even have deep pockets! I guess for such a low price, I wasn't expecting them to be as nice as they are but I should have known better, as every product from Utopia that I have purchased has been excellent. I thought that these would just be an average  pair of pj pants but I would feel comfortable wearing them in public to a casual event, such as a football game, grocery shopping & such. They are comfortable, (for sure) but they are also pretty cute!. I am super happy with this purchase & I would definitely recommend this product. If they came in other colors, I would buy a pair in each one! I purchased this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review but that did not sway my opinion. If you found this review helpful, please click the 'Yes' button below. Happy shopping!

The Barn Decorative Wall Dcor Art, Inspirational and Motivational Message of Hope and New Beginnings, 12 by 16-Inch. I was so excited to receive this sign in the mail & I quickly opened up the box. IT was packed with some bubble packing but only on the back of it & the sign was face down! (I wish that the folks at the amazon warehouses would pay better attention). My heart skipped a beat as I inspected it, as I expected to find it scratched. It was fine, though. It was shrink wrapped with plastic, so I think that saved it. The sign has several inspirational quotes & is really quite lovely. I had expected to need to find a frame for it but once I got it in person, I realized that it would be a shame to put it behind glass. It is so nicely textured that it looks great just the way that it is. It even has the print wrapped around the edges on all four sides. The only thing that I found a bit weird was the back of it. I expected to find a metal hook or something with which to hang it but there is just a cutout. Not a big deal, according to my husband. It can be hung just fine, so I am happy as can be with this decorative sign. I can look at it each morning & when I'm feeling down for an instant pick me up! I purchased this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review. I would recommend it as a quality product to others.

Excell Women's Fuzzy Socks Crew Socks, Warm Butter Soft, 12 Pair Pack. I am a sock fanatic & I am so happy when the Fall comes, so that I can wear thick, fuzzy socks like these! I chose the striped pattern of these socks & they are so pretty! Yes, I do get really excited about socks! I am a home body & I live in them 24/7. I have hardwood floors as well as tile, so thick, fuzzy socks are a staple in my wardrobe. When they happen to be as beautiful as these socks are, it's a double bonus! These are like sock eye candy! LOL! The pink & blue ones remind me of the bubble gum ice cream that I used to get at a local ice cream shop after school, when I was a kid. These socks are indeed buttery soft & feel soothing on my feet. For reference, I wear a women's shoe size 6 & I think that these socks would easily fit up to a size 11, due to their stretch. I am super happy with these socks & even though I had a little problem with my order, the customer service was fantastic & the issue was resolved promptly. I purchased this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review.

Intex Ultra Daybed Inflatable Lounge. This thing is awesome! We bought it to lay on & watch a meteor shower that happened a while back. (We just laid out a blanket underneath, to protect it from being punctured on the asphalt).  In the past, we had always used lounge chairs but it is quite nice to have a giant, couch-like lounge that we can snuggle on. It is well made, has a soft, fuzzy texture on the top & the color is as vibrant & gorgeous as pictured.  The attached pillow is great to lay your head on, or you can sit up & have it support your back. I would imagine that this thing would be great for use at the lake, as well. It is large enough that it could be used as an extra bed if unexpected company arrives, or if you want to have a fun, sleepover in the middle of the family room! It's great that we can bring this out when we want to use it & then pack it away in a box, where it isn't taking up much space. We have purchased several air mattresses over the years & this is honestly just as comfortable, so I am really happy with this purchase.

Oxgord Jumbo Pooper Scooper Dog Waste Scoop Sanitary Pickup Remover. I tested out my new pooper scooper this morning & it is quite a help to someone such as myself, who has health issues & suffers from chronic pain. This is much easier to maneuver than a big, heavy shovel. I have two, extra large dogs who eat & therefore, poop three times per day. This scooper does a good job of picking up the poop, so that I don't have to carry the shovel all around the yard. However, I found that if I tried to pick up 'freshies' they stuck to it & were difficult to remove. This caused the teeth to become clogged & prevented the scoop from closing properly. It did a much better job of picking up piles that had time to harden, although separate pieces were difficult to get into the scoop without multiple attempts. We try to pick up the poop every day, so even though this will be a big help, I still think that a shovel will be necessary for follow up work. If you leave enough time in between pooping & scooping, then you may not have this issue. However, my dogs tend to get excited & run through poop piles during play, (if not picked up quickly) so I don't intend to leave them laying around, waiting for them to harden. If you have ever had to clean poop out of a dog paw, then you know what I mean! Also, I read some other reviews & it sounds like it works better on grass than on bare ground. At any rate, I am super happy to have received this product at a discount for testing & review.

Love by Matt White. I found this song after hearing a different song by this artist that I liked & decided to sample the rest of the songs on the album. I really liked this one as well & downloaded it. That same evening, I was watching a movie, (which must be at least 7 or 8 years old) & this song came on in the movie! I thought that was so weird but super cool! What are the chances that on the same day I downloaded a song, it just happened to come on during a DVD that I was watching? I don't know, I believe that things happen for a reason & it is up to us to pay attention & figure out what that reason is. So, I started out by finding a Matt White song that I liked at the end of a movie, went to download it & found a few other songs of his that I liked. Downloaded them & then heard one of them on a movie that same night! Cool? I think so! I have heard that when we encounter things in life that seem to be a coincidence, it means that we are on the right path. I like that a lot. The song is called, 'Love' & what are we here on earth for but to love & be loved?

eBoot Stainless Steel Straws Set with Cleaning Brush. These are such cool straws to have in the kitchen! It's like having the experience of an ice cream parlor in my own home. The stainless steel straws seem to keep the drinks colder when sipping & are much easier to stir with, especially if I'm drinking a smoothie or milkshake. This is an eco-friendly alternative to plastic straws, which would otherwise wind up in a landfill & they are dishwasher safe! I love that there is an included cleaning brush because sometimes it's necessary to get down in there, especially if a stray chunk of banana or something gets stuck! I think that this is a quality set & for the price, it's a great value. You get a pack of stainless steel straws plus a cleaning brush! They are a lot of fun to use. I love to indulge in a root beer float once in a while & these straws make it that much more enjoyable. The only thing that I would point out to perspective buyers is the length of them. They are a little short for some of my larger glasses but I have some short root beer float mugs which work perfectly with these! Also, it is supposed to be a pack of 8 straws but I only received 4. Maybe that is because I received a sample, I'm not sure? Or, maybe they had a pack of 4 but they sold out & now have a pack of 8? At any rate, I am pleased with the quality of this set & I am happy to have received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion.

6 Piece Of excell Fleece Hooded Winter Ski Hat, Unisex. I am so impressed with this set of balaclava/winter ski hoods. I purchased a some a few years back that were quite pricey & they were so tight that I never wear them. I felt absolutely claustrophobic in them but the design on these is genius! First of all, they are a very soft, lightweight fleece that is warm, yet breathable. They aren't sewn too tight but they will easily accommodate a range of different sized heads, thanks to the elastic bungee cord that is built in. It is adjustable on both sides for a customized fit. Another thing that is really cool about these is the various ways that they can be worn. You can have your face covered with just your eyes showing, you can pull down the inner piece so that your nose is exposed or you can pull it down under your chin so that your mouth is exposed as well. In addition, (as shown in the photos) it can be worn as a neck warmer, scarf, hood & so on. The front comes down in a v shape to cover more of the neck, which is just a nice added touch. I really can't say enough about how well made thee are! I am so happy that I had the opportunity to purchase these at a discount for testing & review. When I ordered them, I asked my husband if he wanted one & he told me, "No". He said that he would never wear them. (I really think that he based that opinion on the others that I had previously purchased that are so tight & uncomfortable). Well, as soon as we opened up this package, he exclaimed that he wanted at least one! I knew that he would & after trying them on & feeling just how soft & comfortable they are, I am really happy that I went ahead & ordered them. I had planned on keeping one for myself & giving the others as Christmas presents. Since they come in a pack of six, there are enough to share, if you can bear to part with them! The value on these is quite impressive, too. For the retail price of one balaclava, you get six! This pack comes with four in black, one in gray & one in dark blue. I would highly recommend these to anyone who lives where it is cold in the winter, works outside or enjoys winter sports. I know that my chilly mornings out with my fur kids just got a lot more comfortable!

Set of 20: HBY Solid Stretch Knot Pony Elastics Ponytail Holders. I absolutely love these pony tail elastics! They are the same, wavy material as my very favorite headbands that I cannot ever find in stores! I have been looking everywhere for more of those headbands & when I had the chance to review these complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion, I was super excited! They hold my long, thick hair up in a pony tail & keep it in place without pulling my hair. They keep it exactly where it is supposed to be with zero slipping. These are also great for making waves in your hair if you take sections of wet hair after a shower & twist, (or braid them) & then secure with these over night. The wavy pattern makes awesome waves in the hair, (which is why I love the headbands made from the same elastic so much)! There is no metal piece on these, which can cause damage & breakage to the hair, just a little plastic bead at the seam. I am so happy to have these elastics & I will get great use out of them. I would recommend them to anyone with long hair, especially those who have thick hair like I do.

Everbellus Full Length Solid Black Leggings Yoga Pants for Women (Large). This is an extremely comfortable pair of leggings, although I think that most people would consider them capri length. I measured the pair that I received, (complimentary for testing & review) laid out flat, so that people can have an accurate measurement, to assist in ordering the proper size. I ordered size Large & they measure at the waist; 27", have a  24" inseam & an 8" rise. Although the measurements may sound a bit small, the polyester/spandex blend is not a tight fabric & has plenty of room for stretch. Although they don't appear as matte as they may look in the stock photos, they don't seem too thin or sheer to me, which can be a problem with some leggings. They fit me comfortably & for reference, my measurements are 36 - 30 - 36. The 3" difference in the waist size would usually be too uncomfortable for me, as I am a person with Fibromyalgia & cannot handle tight clothing but these stretch nicely & don't feel constricting. They also hold their shape well. When I took them off, they did not look stretched out at all, even in the knees as some will. I am very short, about 4' 11" & the legs on these stretched the 3" difference to fit me as a full pair of leggings, even though my leg inseam is about 27" so I just want to convey that this fabric has quite a bit more stretch than one might think. They hit just below my belly button, which is awesome for me because I am so short-waisted that almost everything comes up way too high on me. I really like the separate, sewn on elastic waistband, too. Sometimes those can be tight, scratchy or just plain uncomfortable but this one is sewn well, is soft & seems to help to smooth the tummy out flat. They don't feel tight like many leggings do & are comfortable enough for me to sleep in. I would recommend them for someone looking for a comfortable pair of leggings to wear under a dress, with a long tunic or as a comfy loungewear piece. They may be more of a capri legging on anyone that is over 5'2" so keep that in mind if you are a tall person. I am really happy with them because I prefer a more relaxed fit. If you are looking for a compression style pair of leggings, these aren't it. However, if you are looking for something super comfortable, look no further!

Bamoer Snowflake Series 18k White Gold Plated AAA Clear Cubic Zirconia Pendant Necklace. This is a beautiful pendant with included chain. I received this necklace along with a matching ring complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion. The stones are cut incredibly well & they sparkle like crazy! I have a lot of diamond jewelry & very few simulants have ever impressed me. This set definitely does! The only thing that might give it away for me, (if I didn't already know that it was CZ) is the weight of the pieces. Other than that, I am totally blown away with the quality. I'm going to give this set to my mother for Christmas & I am betting that she will think that it is real diamonds until I tell her. I have purchased several diamond pieces for her over the years & she is always afraid to wear them. So, I think that this is a good set for her. It's absolutely beautiful & I don't think that anybody aside from a trained gemologist would ever suspect that this set wasn't genuine diamonds.

Bamoer Snowflake Series 18k White Gold Plated AAA Clear Cubic Zirconia Comfort Fit Band Ring. I was pleasantly surprised with just how real this jewelry looks. I received a ring & matching necklace complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion. The stones are clear but don't have that fake, plastic look that so many simulants have. It is a pet peeve of mine when diamond simulants are so unrealistic looking that someone clear across the room can tell that it's not real. I think that this will fool most people to the naked eye. The snowflake design is just darling & I am going to give this set to my mother for a Christmas gift. I have purchased several diamond pieces for her over the years & she is always afraid to wear them, (afraid of what, I'm not sure) so I thought that this would be a perfect alternative. She can wear this with confidence because it looks real & nobody besides myself & her will know.

Multi-function Headbands in butterfly print. I like to wear these headbands when I'm cleaning the house, to protect my hair from dirt & dust. They are a fashionable way to keep my hair covered in case someone shows up at the front door! I The material is a soft, lightweight cotton mix with just a hint of stretch. The print on the fabric is a cute, butterfly design that looks very much like a paisley print from a distance. There is also a heat-set butterfly design across the front for additional flair. I would highly recommend washing in cold water, either in a mesh delicates bag or on delicate cycle & then hang to dry. These are cool because they can be worn scrunched up, or they can be fanned out wide to cover more hair. Underneath, there is a sewn-in elastic piece, which helps to keep the headband securely in place. I find that they fit well & stay where they are supposed to be, without being too tight. It's a great value for a set of six & the assortment of colors gives ample choice to assure that there is one to go with every outfit. These look very much like a bandana, with the bonus feature of elastic already built-in. I don't ride a motorcycle but I think that these would be perfect for those who do, to keep hair out of the face when the wind is blowing. Anyone who likes the look of a bandana should try these, as there is no need to fold & tie them. Just slide over the head & you're ready to go! I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest opinion.

Best Days by Matt White. I turned on the tv the other day & this song was playing at the end of a movie, (I don't remember which one) which is often how I discover new favorite songs. I quickly scrolled through the movie credits & found the name of the artist & song & looked it up on amazon. I found the MP3 & purchased the song right away. I wound up ordering a few other songs from the same artist as well. I love it when the timing is just perfect & I find a song that I like on a movie or tv show, which I may have otherwise never heard!

Catit Jumbo Hooded Cat Litter Pan - Warm Gray. I have some mixed feelings about this litter box, although it is my very first one so I have nothing to compare it to, other than the disposable ones. For the first month or so, it worked really well & by that I mean that it did seem to help to control odors. The four kittens had bad aim, especially at first & I was so glad that I purchased this enclosed litter box because it saved my walls! I did opt to remove the door before use, as I am claustrophobic & I didn't feel that it would be very comfortable for them to go with a door on there. Plus, with four kittens, the door very likely would have been broken off. It seems well made, although I am a bit concerned that over time the plastic pieces which lock the top onto the bottom pan will break. The odor absorbing filter seemed to work fairly well at first but isn't doing so great now, (two months later). Perhaps it is time to replace the filter? I did purchase additional filters but I thought that they would last longer than that. Even though it is cleaned out every single day, it does smell. Overall, I am pretty happy with this purchase because I shopped around & read a lot of reviews. For the size, this was an excellent value & it has served it's purpose so far. *Update; a few months in & we recently purchased another litter box as a backup while this one is being cleaned & drying. We have been rotating them & I can say that this one is really superior in it's size, as well as it's design. The other one has a grate which is supposed to reduce the amount of litter tracked out of the box but that doesn't seem to work one bit. I would choose this one again over others with a grate simply for the sturdiness & the size. I'm still unsure just how well the filter at the top works but I am going to add a new replacement filter tonight, so we shall see if it smells any less funky. With the amount of times per day we scoop & the fact that we wash it out once per week, I am quite surprised at how much it still stinks! It is in another room with the door closed, windows open & an air purifier going, yet I am still acutely aware of the smell. This is the reason that I do not give it five stars. I guess litter boxes just stink! I am adding photos to try & show the size, although it still looks larger in person. The cats really seem to love it & I have caught one of them hanging out in there even when not doing any 'business!

De-shedding Tool by Pet Lover Co. This is an effective grooming tool that is suited for dogs, cats rabbits & other pets. I have tried a few different de-shedding brushes of a similar design & I have to recommend this type to anyone who has a pet with fur. They are just so efficient at removing hair. Even when the pet has recently been groomed with a standard brush, additional hair will come out with this tool! That is hair that would otherwise be all over the floor, furniture, car, etc. This helps to keep the house cleaner, the pets happier & is just a great tool to have in the house. I even keep one in my car for road trips! The ergonomic design of the handle is comfortable to use & the grip where your thumb rests helps to keep the brush from slipping. Please take my advice & do these two things; 1).do not press down while brushing your pet. There is no need to & it could be painful. Try it on your own arm & see how it feels, so you will see what I mean. Pressing down won't make it any more effective, just glide it along your pet's coat & clean out often. It is so easy to use! 2). Keep a garbage can or bag handy, as you will be amazed at just how much fur comes out with this brush! I was happy to purchase this product at a discount during a promotion for testing & review. I would definitely recommend this type of de-shedding brush to pet parents.

Professional Curling Iron - Spiral Hair Curler - Curlz (Pink). I love all of the products that I have from Xtava, so after reading a lot of great reviews on this particular curling iron I decided to go ahead & order it. I gifted this spiral hair curler to a friend who has some of the most gorgeous hair on the planet & I cannot wait to see her hair after it is styled with this cute, pink spiral curling iron. They come so well packaged that they make excellent gifts, even though it is difficult not to keep them for myself! I really like the fact that this one has an LED 'ON' button, as well as a 360 degree spinning cord. As someone who grew up in a hair salon, I have had access to just about every styling product & tool & I can tell you that one of the main pet peeves of professional stylists, (as well as clients who purchase styling tools from the salon) is a cord that doesn't spin because they get tangled up rather quickly & can become a hazard. Nobody wants to trip over the cord or have it fall off of the counter while the iron is hot, due to the fact that the cord was all tangled up. This curling iron is really cool because it allows people with long hair to easily obtain spiral curls. I am really looking forward to my friend's reaction to this gift & I will try to get her to send some photos of her hair curled, if she doesn't mind. Her hair is seriously to be envied & I cannot wait to see it after she has spiral curled it! I was happy to receive this product complimentary for testing & review. I am thrilled with my other Xtava curling iron & I think that my friend will be equally charmed with this one. I will update with photos if she agrees to it.

Challenging Fun using Mirror Reflectors to aim your light beem and pick up Stars for points.  Relaxing, casual play with soothing Music and neat Sound Effects.  Graphics are quite good and levelmof  detail is selectable from the settings Menu.  Sounds can be muted too.  Smooth controls and Physics challenges are varied and interesting.  Scoring is OK but not too important to me... I strive to  get all 3 Stars on each level though.  It is a pretty Engaging, Challenging, Fun and Satisfying game.  It does have In-app-purchasing, Analytic addons and Social network integrations that just detract from the quality of the app (in my opinion).  Paid apps should be void of this junk and why do Developers think we all need to share scores, comments, etc. with the world every time we play a game?  Just another way for people to SPY on us and target us for  more ADVERTISING.  I have to deduct a Star for this and because the app freezes ocassionally on my Tablet.  It plays fine with WiFi OFF (my preference) and Exits cleanly by using the Back Key too.  I like the gameplay but won't recommend it because of Addon and IAP issues!

Seems like a fun app but spoiled right off the bat with the Intrusive Addons.  Then it keeps CRASHING on my Motorola Xoom, 32gb Tablet soon after the DIKOBRAZ logo screen comes up.  This never happens with other apps.  So, it seems UNSAFE and sketchy... had to UNINSTALL it!  Better to be SAFE than sorry with sketchy Apps like this one that start off with adding negative, intrusive junk to your device.

Tesla's Mist is well designed with good Graphics and neat Puzzles that can get tricky at times.  Fortunately, it does have a Map and a HINT GUIDE to help you... go to the NOTEPAD in inventory to get a screen that has Icons for Map or Hints.  There is also a walkthrough available in YouTube if you want to go that route.  This is an Enjoyable game that is NOT Hidden Object style but true Point and Click Adventure.  Lots of moving around looking for clues but that neat Puzzles make it more Entertaining and Satisfying.  No Malware or Intrusive junk to spoil the fun either.  There are good options to adjust volumes and no annoying advertising or Pushy (rate me) tactics.  A decent game that is not terribly long but a bargain for the low price and good quality.  A little more like an Escape game style but nice and casual Fun.  I recoomend it.

This is a rather Neat game where you ram your Vehicle into Zombies and all kinds of obstacles on your route to the next Garage.  You earn game cash with every level you play.  Then you can buy numerous Auto Upgrades like Fuel, bigger Engine or Tires, Turbo Boosters, etc.  Each upgrade enhances your ability to make more Zombie kills and longer distances on the level.  It is nicely designed, easy to play and poses Fun Challenges and has good Graphics and Sound effects.  Controls work well and you can even upgrade to newer and larger vehicles.  Lots of Variety in choosing options and actual game play decisions.  I find it very Enjoyable and Satisfying.  It is SAFE with no Malware or nasty Addons.  Plays well with WiFi off also.  DISLIKES: FRANTIC sounding Music but it can be Muted.  Will EXIT with Back key but game still stays in memory so requires Task killing to shut down completely.  A great game so I only deduct 1 Star.

A new twist on H.O. style games; This one has a Storyline, Earning Money to purchase items, Mini-Games and variable search styles.  It has a Hint button, Mute option and lots of items to purchase after you get enough money to go shopping.  The Match 3 type game is different with items that need to be dropped to bottom (by correct matching below them) so you to aquire them.  Surprisingly Fun activity for an H.O. game.  Many people get bored with H.O.Games but this one keeps you engaged pretty well and requires more fun decision making to progress nicely.  It also has an optional Casual mode that eliminates Timer and makes playing easier.  Music is OK but can be Muted.  Graphics are good and there is a Pinch into ZOOM feature that helps for finding elusive items.  It has a little Advertising for other games but can be played with WiFi off so children will not be able to buy any.  Has Flurry Analytics and Game Circle but seems SAFE enough.  It also EXITS Cleanly if you use the Exit icon on bottom right of Main Screen.  Sadly, you have to be in the Decorating room screen before you can get to the Settings icon to get back to Main Menu so you can Exit properly.  This is a little TEDIOUS so I subtract 1 Star.  I still like it and it's worth the cost.

Engaging game play with wonderful Graphics, realistic physics challenges and neat Music and Sound effects.  Very relaxing, casual play with no Timers and pleasant, soothing music.  It has 120 Beautifully designed levels that pose some pretty difficult challenges.  You have to aim and shoot varying types of Bombs to destroy as much of each level objects as possible.  It requires at least 90% destruction to pass each level.  Controls work very well and I discovered that you can BANK YOUR SHOTS off the screen walls to get better placement of bombs.  Very Enjoyable though it gets very tough early on.  It takes some trial and error with differring strategies to get the hang of best ways to play.  App is SAFE with No Malware  or intrusive Addons.  It also plays fine with WiFi off and Exits cleanly with an EXIT prompt from a pop-up screen.Overall, one of the BEST apps I have seen in awhile from Amazon.  Addictive, challenging Fun that is Satisfying and pleasant (once you get used to changing strategies constantly).  Definitely a 5 STAR app that is SAFE, User Friendly (with casual play) and priced perfectly.  A WINNER!

This is one of the best and longest Mystery/Adventure games I have purchased.  The Puzzles are wonderfully Unique and challenging.  Gameplay works well on my 10" Tablet and it is Engaging, Enjoyable and Satisfying to play.However, it continually DELETED my Saved games.  I exited properly within the game and answered the prompt to Quite game but the Saved game was lost when I would come back to it.  Originally did this glitch off and on but now doing it every time so I can not continue game.  Big Fish (Developer) has known about this problem for at least 14 Months now according to REVIEW HISTORY.  A great number of users have reported the problem but they have not fixed it and still sell it new users (like me) who end up losing our money and getting FRUSTRATED!I though BIG FISH was a good developer with great App Quality but now know better.  This is not forgivable so they deserve less than 1 Star.

Nice Physics Puzzles to solve while moving your ROBOT through 100 levels in a Platform style design.  NO Instructions make it a little difficult to get started but it is totally INTUITIVE so you have to figure out how to interact with all objects.  By trial and error you find that Blocks can be moved by touching amd dragging them.  They are Magnetic and will stick together too.  Use Electric doors, ramps elevator platform vehicles, caterpillar-like critter, etc. to move your Robot Up-Down-Around towards the level exit goal.  Graphics are simple, physics are good, sounds are realistic and movements are smooth.  It has a REDO button on top right and Level select (X) on top left of screen.  Plays well with WiFi off and EXITS Cleanly with use of Back Key.  I like the challenges very much but had to deduct 1 STAR due to NO INSTRUCTIONS or MENUS, Settings, etc.  It also has an Analytic ADDON.  SAFE, Challenging Fun so I would recommend it.  Worth the price!

This app is well done with plenty of diversity and neat challenges.  Graphics are excellent and Puzzles are great.  Menus, Inventory and Options are all USER FRIENDLY and add greatly to a Fun and Engaging experience.  Controls work well, has a Zoom feature for Hidden Object scenes and a decent Map that can take you quickly to locations if you DOUBLE TAP on the desired spot of map.  It also play with WiFi off and EXITS Cleanly.The BAD NEWS:  It imposes (5) ANALYTIC ADDONS to keep track of what you do while playing the game.  It also has unnecessary Permissions to divulge your device ACCOUNTS, Retrieve Running apps and other private info to unknown parties.  TOO INTRUSIVE so I SUBTRACT 3 STARS!Without all the SPYING, this would be a 5 Star app that is reasonably priced for a well designed and lengthy game.  Too bad the GREED kicks in and they ruin it with all the ADDON intrusions to our desired PRIVACY.  I will play it with WiFi off and then Remove from my device.

Nicely designed Pipe Rotation puzzle app.  Similar to others but with it's own style.  Background can be changed to one of several available styles and colors to suite your preference.  Grids can be turned on or off,  music can be Muted and game EXITS CLEANLY.  The 220 challenging levels are cleverly designed to keep you engaged and satisfied with smooth, casual play and increasing difficulty as you progress.  Everything in the game works well and it has NO permissions, Adware, IAP's or Analytics to annoy us.  Totally FUN with addictive puzzles and completely safe.  It also plays well with no WiFi required so you can play anywhere and any time.  Kudos to the Developer for a refreshingly good game that keeps us engaged, entertained and Happy with no pressure or worries.  It does have a Timed mode if you prefer also.  Well worth the price.  5 STARS!

Nice Massager with 3 Globe lights that alternately change colors while vibration is turned on.  Comfortable in your hand and lightweight.  Massage effects are decent but certainly not as good as professional massagers.  Great for light Massaging of Muscles BT also a neat device to play with.  I use mine to entertain the Grandkids and calm them after wild their active play.  They Love it, Giggle and Laugh a lot while getting their Backs, Arms, Lags and even their Heads massaged.  A Cheap device that produces lots of Fun and Comfort.Overall, a handy Massage device that produces Enjoyment and Fun for the family.  Batteries last a reasonable amount if time.  Looks nice but is made of CHEAP MATERIALS (like many CHINA products) so not sure how long it will last.  I had one with IDENTICAL DESIGN for many years but it had a well known American company name on it.  The inside of this one is CHEAPLY MADE but outside is great.

ORBB is a nicely designed game with good Graphics, Soothing Music and realistic Physics results.  You launch an ORBB from rotating (planet-like) spheres that turn at different speeds and directions.  Levels are completed after you hit and remove all the strings of yellow (star-like) objects from the screen.  Total launches are displayed on a counter and you can replay levels o improve your score.  This is tougher than it sounds and gets progressively harder.  They also add Green Portals to shoot the ORBBs in different directions.  It is Fun and Challenging with no pressure or annoyances.  SAFE app but does have ANALYTICS addon and ADMOB according to Ad Detector app.  It will play with WiFi OFF though.  An ENJOYABLE game with casual play.  However, it does not EXIT cleanly with Back Key.  You have go use HOME KEY and it stays in device memory unless you USA an APP KILLER to stop it.  Had to deduct 1 Star for this!

The GRAPHICS are good and the PUP is adorable.  No Instructions except Visual, 1 page depictions (when you tap the ?). They are simple and Vague for young Kids.  Boring for Adults but may be OK for younger Kids if you help them learn what tasks need to be completed and how to accomplish them properly.  Takes a little while to figure it all out.  There are several ROOMS with different activities for the Pup.  There is also a YARD setting where the Pup searches for spots to Dig for items or do HIS BUSINESS and you can pick it up with scooper.  Picture bubbles float above the Pup to let you know what the Pup needs next.  You move to others scenes by touching the Doghouse on upper right corner of the screen.  Activities are OK but the controls are Sloppy and SLUGGISH when trying to move the Dog around.  Sound effects are Minimal and No Music.  Safe download but contains Flurry Analytics.  It plays well with WiFi off though and EXITS Cleanly with back key.Overall, somewhat disappointing but OK for younger Kids to kill some time and enjoy the Cute Pup.

These bulbs are pretty bright for a 4 Watt size and work fine for my purposes.  I bought the 2-Pack at a bargain price (compared to price of single build).  The price was better than any other source I cup find and delivery was very quick.  What more could I ask of an inexpensive purchase?  I would buy them again if needed and would recommend them.

The Graphics are great, Sound Effects are good and Puzzles are fun to solve.  You have to remember to use the Arrow buttons on bottom left and right to pan around in many if the rooms.  The Found Items are often tiny and you can not tell what they are.  There are no Labels or popup text to tell you what the item is either.  This can be frustrating at times when you struggle to determine how to use an UNKNOWN ITEM.  Some of the items have to be combined with others before you can use them also.  Challenging levels are fun but unnecessary frustration ruins the joy and degrades the REPLAY VALUE of this game.  I do like that it has a LINK to YouTube Walkthrough if you get stuck.Many of the needed actions do not make much sense so it is not terribly USER FRIENDLY.  Somewhat SAFE but does include ADMOB that CAN SHARE YOUR Device ID and Location with unknown  3rd parties.  I prefer PRIVACY!  App is Just OK, not great like many others Escape games.  It also does NOT EXIT cleanly but stays in device memory.  PAID APPS should not have these annoyances!

Very bright CREE Led flashlight with Beam Dimming or Flash mode included.  Reasonable weight and good size (not mini style) to fit your pocket.  Quality seems better than many others.  Battery usage seems to be good so far. Price is a little high but I got mine when it was on sale.

Realistic looking Candle style lights.  Excellent Remote options make these easy and enjoyable to use. Light brightness is good and Battery usage seems reasonable.  Good price and decent Quality make this a god buy for me.

Nice Theme, decent Graphics and Sound effects.  However, you have to complete required takes in a precise order (most of the time) so that forces you to do a much more CLICKING than necessary.  The constant panning around to look for items is annoying too because the view changes don't always make sense and create a need for more extra clicking to find your way around.  It does have a List of required tasks that can help you comply with needed steps.  There is a decent HINT system that is helpful by simply tapping on the task description in the Task list to bring up HINT options.  Constant requirement reminders to TAKE PICTURES is annoying because you have to do it to continue progress.  Game is just OK to me and has Hidden Ads for more apps.  They come up when you are clicking in search of needed items.Overall an OK app but not great.  Too many irrtitants degrade Replay Value.  It also installs questionable Addons like Chartboost and other advertising addons like ADMOD that can share your device Identity and Location info with other 3rd parties.  Very UNCOOL for a paid app!  Also does not EXIT completely but stays in device Memory unless stopped by a task killer.  I played full game to a Dull Finish.  Not as good as it sounds and too many annoyances to make it a keeper for me!

This is the 4th Montezuma puzzle app with a variation in puzzle piece shapes.  Everything else is the same as others.  They are all Excellent for Casual play with no pressure.  Music is nice and soothing but can be muted.  100 levels are well designed and get harder as you progress.  Graphics are top notch and the HINT System is wonderful if you need it... just tap on ( ? ) button and it shows proper puzzle piece placement.  You can undo piece placements any time and take as long as you wish to solve it.  SAFE app with NO Malware, Adware or Addons.  Not even a single Permission!  Works fine with WiFi off also.  EXITS Cleanly with the Back Key too.  The ( RATE ME ) prompts are not a serious issue since you can PERMANENTLY REMOVE this by pressing Rate button once and then Back Key to return to game without even rating it.Overall, another EXCELLENT, Fun, Challenging app from a Great Developer that never imposes Intrusive junk with their apps.  I love all 4 in this Puzzle app series with slightly different puzzle piece shape styles in each one.  Great Casual playing for endless hours with NO PRESSURE.  They are well designed, totally safe and a definite BARGAIN at $0.99 for 100 USER FRIENDLY levels.  I highly recommend this game to all!

King of Math helps you exercise Math skills in a pleasant manner with clothing Music playing in the background.  No Timers pressure so you can concentrate on Math problems only.  Well designed and organized app that builds from Easy to Difficult levels.  Easy to use and works effectively for Children or Adults alike.  A SAFE and Enjoyable app that does what they claim.  Good to help Kids learn or Adults to refresh math skills.Overall, a neat and useful app that helps anyone to hone math skills in a casual, challenging and enjoyable way.  It is SAFE with No Malware or Intrusive Addons.  Has No Advertising or Analytics data collecting either.  Works fine with WiFi off and Exits properly.  I recommend it to all.

Bring light with Zom feature to change from Narrow to Wide beam quickly and easily.  Good variety of beam modes.... dimmer beam saves batteries and Flashing beam provides Safety, etc.  Seems to be good quality but only takes 3 AAA batteries instead of 4 like most others.  Battery time will be much less because of this.  I like it but wish it had 4 cell design.  By the way...batteries NOT INCLUDED either.

Nice design with decent features but the BLACK LIGHT is too DIM!  Like most users have said, it needs to be Brighter to be more useful.  The small flashlight build is bright enough but not the Black Light.  You can only use it in extremely DARK settings for it to be of any real use.  It is inexpensive but also needs to be useful.  Sadly, this one is just OK and not worth it is you really need it for any serious use.  Mostly, OK for playing with only!

A great charger to SAFELY charge your batteries while monitoring the Voltage, MiliAmps and charge Time of each battery.  Has a good Digital display that is illuminated and you can scroll to any of 4 battery positions to monitor each status.  Use full to charge all my batteries while protecting them from Overheating, Overcharging, or improper charge rates.  It Detects battery type and charge level and then adjusts itself to accommodate needed settings.  This is much better than the CHEAP Chargers that end up RUINING your battery and are also FIRE Hazards!  This one works great on all my batteries and it can let me know if I have a bad one.  Only problem is CHEAP, STIFF, FLAT Power cord that has very poor flexibility so it gets in the way and can not be moved to where you want it to stay.  Minus 1 STAR for Cheap, irritating cord!

Great HeadLamp for the price.  Very Bright and relatively comfortable to wear.  Dependable tool to free up your hands when working on projects, etc.  Easy to position the beam angle.  Has a Red Light on back for added Safety too.  The varying beam modes give you a way to conserve battery power and even give added safety (if needed) with flashing beam.  Charger works fine but I prefer to use a good quality charger that monitors charging and prevents over-charging or Excess Heat ( I use a Nitecore D4) to charge  and protect all my batteries.

Works OK to charge batteries with circuit protection to prevent damage.  Seems well built except for the Power Cord which is a FLAT style that is very STIFF and irritating because it has poor flexibility.  Why would they ruin it with a CHEAP CORD?
