I also found that the 4th contact blade was very Stiff and would get stuck when I tried to slide in a battery.  I sent this one back for Refund and did not replace with same model.  I later bought the NEWEST model (Nitecore D4) which cost almost twice the price but has Digital Display to monitor Volts, MiliAmps and Time.  Same (CHEAP) FLAT CORD though.  ARGHH!  Not a very Practical decision on the Manufacturer's part... save a few pennies but IRRITATE your customers!

Works well and produces a decent flame.  It is lightweight and cost less than the other (name brand) options available.  Seems to be pretty good quality and not a Cheap immitation.  Some of the name brand alternative torches have a poor reputation so this one is better and safer for me.

Another GREAT Game from (10 Tons) who has earned my Respect and Admiration with previous good Quality apps.  This one has varying Octagonal shaped boards where you Match 3 or more like items until you clear the board of all pieces.  It starts off with good Instructions and each level is selected by tapping on a picture puzzle piece. NOTE: The ones with a STAR are tougher.  There are Compass pieces that act like a Wild Card and will match ANY other items.  Frozen pieces are more challenging and require adjacent matches to Thaw them out.  It has 12 selectable Packs with 12 or 24 Levels in each Pack.  There are 4 Difficulty levels from Easy to Extreme.  Music is soothing.  Volume for Music or Sound efffects can be adjusted.  Challenges are Fun and Satisfying.  Part of each Picture Puzzle is revealed when you complete each level.  Play is CASUAL with NO TIMER or pressure.  There is a useful REDO button too.  Plays with WiFi off.I find it Enjoyable and Satisfying as well as completely SAFE from Malware, Advertising or Intrusive Addons or questionable Permissions.  I TRUST this Developer and have enjoyed most of their apps.  It also EXITS Cleanly and completely.  I gladly recommend it for Fun, Casual play.

This Escape game starts off rather Simple and Easy and has very good graphics.  Most of the levels are Short and pretty simplistic.  However, some levels have Number combinations that get quite complicated... difficult to figure out but not impossible.  Luckily, they have a YouTube Link that will show you a Walkthrough video to help you.  Most required steps are logical but some are strange and require some ODD OUTSIDE THE BOX thinking to solve.  This can get somewhat aggregating to many users that are used to better quality apps.  This is a Fun game but lacks the Atmosphere and Polished Puzzle style of many other better designed, Highly polished Escape apps that give better Satisfaction and are longer.Overall, it is an OK app that is Safe with no Malware or intrusive Addons and offers a good Help option to users.  However, it lacks the Polish and sophistication of so many Better apps.  It is also way too short for a Paid app.  It does Exit properly with back key but stays in device memory unless you stop it with a Task Killer.  I find it somewhat dissatisfying and not enjoyable enough to have any REPLAY VALUE.  I wish the developer would improve this but realistically doubt it.  They have great potential. Too bad it let's you down!

Another ENJOYABLE puzzle game with Vibrant colors and nifty Sound Effects that can be muted with a single Tap on speaker Icon. Clean and simple to play. 100 levels for you to master. Very engaging and satisfying. Kudos to THE OAK TEAM for making another highly polished app with NO Permissions, intrusive adware or malware. It is rare to find such a totally SAFE app and it is bargain priced at $0.99 to boot. This app is suitable for all ages and parents don't need to worry about it trying trick your kids into spending your money through enticing Links.Overall, an Excellent app that keeps you entertained and challenged in a very CASUAL Manner with soothing Music and NEAT graphics. The only complaint most people have is the persistent nagging for an app Rating. However, this can easily be stopped by a one time tap on the RATE button and you can just go back to the app and the rating requests are STOPPED forever. I choose not to deduct any stars for the nagging because it is so easily resolved permanently. I enjoy it greatly and recommend it highly to all.

Nice game for Kids to learn and exercise many duties required to care for animals improperly.  Each Animal has a Clipboard that tells you what type of care is needed to keep it happy and healthy.  Even tells you what Ailments they have so you can decide what to use (from your care inventory) to treat them, like Injection, Pills, Bandage, etc.  You also have told keep their Pens clean, filled with straw and supplied with Food and Water.  All this is Fun and Challenging but gets very REPETITIVE after a short while since it is the same thing over and over.  The only break from the repetitious chores is when one of the animals gets Adopted.  Then, you clean his pen and start the same cycle over again.Overall, well designed to accomplish the tasks and has nice graphics and sound effects.  The controls are sometimes quirky and I had to repeatedly touch items before I could pick them up properly.  It also has a LINK to purchase more apps at Amazon app store and a Facebook link.  This is not appropriate for an app designed primarily for Kids.  At least it will play with WiFi OFF.  Also Exits cleanly.  It is Safe with no Malware or Intrusive Pertmissions but has Flurry Analytics.  It gets Boring and monotonous after a bit and makes you hurry to take Care of many animals as new ones keep arriving.  Even small Kids get tired of too much repetitioin so I expect little REPLAY VALUE.  Disappointing!

Not a standard JIGSAW puzzle... Pieces are all rectangular and a box is highlighted to show where the next piece should go.  Your task is to figure out which of the displayed pieces is the correct one to place next.  It will TIME OUT if you take too long.  The play is harder than it appears at first and your game ends if you pick too many wrong pieces also.  Quite challenging but fun to master after you get used to it.  It has good Sound effects and Music that can be adjusted.  Graphics are good and controls work well.  SAFE with No Malware or nasty Addons.Overall, a fun and engaging puzzle style that is different than most.  Enjoyable  and a little frustrating at same time.  Well worth a try.  Some will Love it and some will hate it but bit is pretty well designed and does keep you challenged and engaged.

Lots of challenging puzzles that are moderately challenging with Casual play make this app very Enjoyable.  The Graphics are neat and the Music and Sound effects are pleasant and appropriate for the atmosphere.  Sounds and/or Music can be turned off by the user.  It contains 18 levels and each has many clever puzzles to keep you engaged.  Some are quite tough to figure out.  However, there is a quick Link to a helpful YouTube Walkthrough if you get stuck.  I enjoy this game very much and it will play with WiFi off also.  It has NO Malware or Intrusive Addons.  Permissions are appropriate and no Advertising except a link for the Developer's other apps.  A pleasant playing atmosphere.Overall, a Fun app that keeps your Puzzle solving skills well exercised in a casual way.  No pressure by Timers but it does get harder as you play.  It does Exit with back key but only saves from the beginning of your level (not where you left off).  It also remains in memory after you exit so I had to deduct 1 Star for these two minor irritants.  A little shorter than I would like but still worth the price for good, clean fun.

Excellent Graphics, Charming Characters and interesting storyline make this very enjoyable.  Has many cute INTERACTIVE  creatures that make Sounds or perform Funny movements and tasks when you touch them.  This is quite entertaining for most children.  Yes, the theme is a little spooky because the WHINE villain steals that Turtle's Soul but it is done in a very simple and Gentle way that does not scare the kids.  Then, the whole story is about Friendship and bringing the Turtle back to life with a Happy and satisfying ending.  You have to Tap on almost everything to search for STARS that are hidden on all Interactive pages (that come up on every other page).  The Narration is good but necessarily a little slow so Kids can fully understand what is going on.  The Sound Effects are Entertaining with many Funny sounds that Kids love to hear.  Music is OK but a little too loud and could benefit by a Volume control.Overall, a mildly Challenging Adventure Storybook that has keeps Kids Engaged with neat tasks and interesting story.  Suitable for most Kids but some Parental guidance would help to keep some Sensitive children from getting Scared by the WHINE and Spooky theme.  Not a problem for most Kids though.  SAFE app with No Spyware or Malware.  My only complaint is that it does nit EXIT cleanly... Back button does not work to exit and no Exit options or Menu anywhere in the app.  Sadly, Requires using HOME key to Exit and it Stays in memory afterwords.  Enjoyable and Satisfying app that I recommend.

Basic concept is great but it has Control FLAWS.  Moving the Dog around to block the Main Character is often too slow and placement of items is very Inaccurate at times.  Very hard to adjust to the control Flaws.  The 3D Graphics are great and the challenges are well designed for what should be a neat, Casual playing experience.  However, it is nowhere near the FUN it could be.  It is too FRUSTRATING.  Seemed like a good PAID APP (similar to Monument Valley) but too Flawed.  I am Disappointed with it and it was not worth paying for to me.  It needs to be Fixed!  I deduct 2 Stars due to the Flaws and do not recommend it..

This game has great Graphics, good Music and neat Sound Effects.  The Mini-game puzzles are challenging and fun to master.  Sometimes you can get lost it stuck for what to do next but the HINT system is a good aid to get you going again.  Controls work well and sound levels can be adjusted.  The STORYLINE is pretty good but the End is rather abrupt and leaves you hanging.  Game seems too short for the price.Overall, I liked it until the Ending disappointed me.  I Aldo did not like all the Permissions (especially the READING MY ACCOUNTS one).  That seems unnecessary for game operation and suspicious to me.  I was able to play it with WiFi off though after initial startup.  I only deducted 1 Star because it is a polished app but should be longer and have less Permissions to be a 5 star app.  Not quite as good as some others.

Enjoyable puzzles with Vibrant colors and nifty Sound Effects (that can be muted).  Clean and simple to play.  It has 100 levels for you to master.  I find it very engaging and satisfying.  Kudos to THE OAK TEAM for making this a highly polished app with NO Permissions, intrusive adware or malware (like most other apps).  It is rare to find such a totally SAFE app and it is bargain priced at $0.99 to boot.  This app is suitable for all ages and parents don't need to worry about it trying trick your kids into spending your money through enticing Links.Overall, an Excellent app that keeps you entertained as well as challenged in a very CASUAL Manner with soothing Music and great graphics.  The only complaint most people have is the persistent nagging for an app Rating.  However, this can easily be stopped by a one time tap on the RATE button and you can just go back to the app and the rating requests are STOPPED entirely from that point on.  I choose not to deduct any stars for this tactic because it is so easily resolved permanently in a few seconds.  I enjoy it and recommend it highly to all.

Awesome Mystery/Adventure/Hidden Object style game that keeps you Challenged, Engaged and Entertained.  Excellent Graphics, great Sound Effects and good Narration.  The MOST POLISHED game of this style I have seen after playing many of them.  All Sound levels can be adjusted.  HINTS are available and the MAP helps you get around quickly.  You are also asked in beginning if you want INTERACTIVE HELP.  Hidden objects are not too tough to find (especially in CASUAL mode).  I also like the SPARKLES that help you find items that need to be interacted with. The MINI-GAMES are wonderful and satisfying.  It is more USER FRIENDLY than other Developer's games (of this style) that I have played.  It is very SAFE with NO Malware, Intrusive Addons or annoyances (other than asking for app Rating).  The BONUS Game is Awesome too.  Sadly, they both crashed on me periodically.Exceptionally Enjoyable and Satisfying game.  Storyline is AWESOME and keeps you very Engaged.  I have had some Crashing problems with others apps from Artifex Mundi on my Motorola XOOM Tablet and this one crashes on occasion too.  At least I can get most of my progress back though.  Truly a FUN app!

Very polished Mystery/Adventure/Hidden Object style game that keeps you Challenged, Engaged and Entertained.  Excellent Graphics, great Sound Effects and good Narration.  All Sound levels can be adjusted.  HINTS are available and the NOTEBOOK helps you get around quicker.  You are also asked in beginning if you want INTERACTIVE HELP.  Hidden objects are not too tough to find (especially in NORMAL mode) but some items do not resemble what their description says.  This forces you to use Hints more than you want.  I also like the SPARKLES that help you find items that need to be interacted with. The MINI-GAMES are wonderful and satisfying.  It seems more USER FRIENDLY than other Developer's games (of this style) that I have played.  This app is SAFE with NO Malware, Intrusive Addons or annoyances (other than asking for app Rating often ).Overall, Enjoyable and Satisfying game to play.  Only problem:  It tends to CRASH after I play awhile on my Motorola XOOM Tablet.  I don't know why it does that but it gets Frustrating after a bit.  I can always get it back with most progress saved though.  Therefore, I had to deduct 1 Star.

Very polished Mystery/Adventure/Hidden Object style game that keeps you Challenged, Engaged and Entertained.  Excellent Graphics, great Sound Effects and good Narration.  All Sound levels can be adjusted.  HINTS are available and the MAP helps you get around quicker.  Hidden objects are not too tough to find (especially in CASUAL mode).  I also like the SPARKLES that help you find items that need to be interacted with. The MINI-GAMES are wonderful and satisfying.  It seems more USER FRIENDLY than other Developer's games (of this style) that I have played.  Iis SAFE with NO Malware, Intrusive Addons or annoyances (other than asking for app Rating).Overall, Enjoyable and Satisfying game to play.  Only problem:  It tends to CRASH after I play awhile on my Motorola XOOM Tablet.  I don't know why it does that but it gets Frustrating after a bit.  I can always get it back with most progress saved though.  Sadly, I had to deduct 1 Star.

A great tool to keep track of Humidity so you can control it before damage occurs.  Very Accurate and easy to read.  I like that it records the HIGH and LOW levels of both Temperature  and Humidity for each day.  It tells you what is happening when you are not doing instantaneous checks.  It has helped me to keep better control of basement Humidity since the Dehumidifier displays are not very accurate.  Now I an set Humidity level to a SAFER level but not so low that it WASTES ELECTRICITY needlessly.  Well worth the cost with neat look. Also has a LEG Stand and a MAGNET on back if you want to attach to a steel surface.  Highly recommend it!

Nicely designed Physics based game with lots of obstacles and strategy challenges to engage your puzzle skills.  The controls are simply to stretch the rope perches with the Bird on it at different angles to aim at the next perch.  You pull back to adjust the power and distance to catapolt the bird and then let go.  The object is to navigate through the different mazes of perches without hitting the obstacles and ultimately find and join with his Girlfriend Bird on final perch.  Graphics are good, Music and Sound effects are OK but can be turned off.  Controls work well and the challenges are decent and lots of fun to beat.  Simple, Safe fun with No permissions, Addons, Malware, etc.  They do show large Links for More of the developers games and their is also a link for Facebook with NO PARENTAL CINTROL over kids using these links.  Not a huge problem ( since you can play with WiFi off) but not an acceptable scenario for a KID's App.  I have to deduct 1 Star for this mistake.  Otherwise a great app.  Very challenging and Enjoyable so I recommend it!

Any kind of CHECKLIST can be created for any purpose with this app.  Just modify or customize existing lists and Add or Subtract items.  Any list Name can be easily changed at any time also.  You can duplicate existing lists to work on modifications safely.  Navigation is easy to get used go and it allows for group item deletions after you have checked the ones to delete with single command.  A nicely designed app that is Useful and User Friendly.  Could have been called CHECKLIST CREATOR instead of Camping theme but the Developer has made other themed checklist apps that have pre-populated Titles and checklist Items. That explains the specific name.  Not limited to Camping though and uses are limitless.Overall, very useful and easy enough to use.  Also completely SAFE with No malware, adds, annoyances or intrusive Addons to worry about.  Your Lists can also be saved to backup files at locations you designate and can be shared also.  The only thing I found missing though is the option to DATE YOUR LISTS.  Sadly, it also restricts name entries by not allowing special characters (like slashes or dashes for dates).  We have been using written checklists for years and like to Date the lists for every trip.  Thanks to the Developer for a Useful, and totally Safe app.  I like it and recommend it highly.

Excellent Ineteractive activities with Fun tasks to complete.  Graphics are great and Sounds are delightful.  There is a speaker icon to turn sound off or on also.  It includes 6 different games, awards and a scrapbook feature that to make it very Enjoyable.  Well designed app with very Fun filled activities to keep children Engaged and Entertained.  Firemen theme is excellent and has great educational and replay value.  As Safe as an app can be  with No Malware, Adware or annoyances so I am very pleased with it.  It is Refreshing to see an app that is deliberately desigmed to be User Friendly and absolutely SAFE with no ulterier motives.  Thanks to the Developer for creating such a great Kid's app.  I like it as much as the Kids do so I Highly recommend it!

A neat little game that requires strategy to select stick sides to close more cubes than your opponent and try to get the highest score .  It also has Star bonuses and a Question mark (?) Bonus in some boxes to mix things up.  This adds nicely to your strategic play because you can get bonus points.  Tutorial Instructions are good and you can change settings for Difficulty, Size, Time, how many players, etc.  Well designed and very Safe with No Malware or any Permissions at all.  Music and sounds are very nice also and can be Muted in settings screen.  It has a simple design, concept and process but is challenging and satisfying to play.  A nice change of pace for leisure play with friends or against the CPU.  I appreciate that it is safe and user friendly so I recommend it.

The Lost Ship is nicely polished with plenty of good Puzzle and Strategy challenges. It is a worthy app for puzzle lovers. Graphics are excellent and Music is soothing and pleasant. INVENTORY system works well and so does the CAMERA that takes pictures of found puzzle guides to help you later. Lots of secret passages and interactive items usage makes it more enjoyable. It can get quite difficult to figure out sometimes but the Internet WALKTHROUGH Video is a great help if you need it. No actual instructions but you do get occasional Subtle Hints on needed actions. No Malware, Ads or other annoyances so is SAFE and USER FRIENDLY. You can play it with internet off also. It has a Guide MAP but so small on a 10 inch Tablet screen that it is pretty useless.Overall, a Quality app that is Enjoyable, Challenging and Satisfying to play. A bit short but worth the low price. Developer has done a good job at keeping it SAFE and Non-Intrusive for the user. Permissions are minimal and necessary. KUDOS to Developer for making it so USER FRIENDLY for. I appreciate that very much and look forward to trying new apps from them in the future. I like this game but wish they would improve the MAP and add an actual EXIT button in future updates. I highly recommend it though!

I am new to Gamebook RPG style of play but find this app well designed and Enjoyable even though it requires extensive Reading throughout the adventure.  You make decisions based on options presented to you in writing that will influence and adjust your individual strategy.  Nice to have options on getting food and supplies and how you interact with all the characters.  Basicly, you try to make the BEST CHOICES along the way like where to go, how to use items, which stratrgy to use for Fighting enemies,  etc.  Engaging and satisfying Fun that gives your brain a good workout.  It is rather large and seems to Drain Battery more than most apps though.Sorcery has good neat graphics and sounds.  It also has a good Map that let's you decide where to go and you can go back to places you have been before if you want to.  Success is mostly determined by a combination of player strategy and luck of the draw.  The monitors for Stamina, Money and Rations are also very helpful.  Mystical Spells are interesting and useful aids for you but do get a bit complicated to learn.Overall, a decent game for people like me that are new to this genre and enjoy a new style of challenge.  Well designed and Permissions seem Safe.  No Malware or Annoyances that I have detected.  Sadly, not much animation and tons of reading is required.  I find it Fun and nicely challenging in a relaxed style that let's you stop and start again later with no problems.  It also EXITS Cleanly.  Good game but a little Pricey!

Cute Dolphin game is actually a neat way to kill time with no pressure.  Graphics are great, the Music is soothing and Dolphin training is fun at first.  Then, it gets to be a tedious, laborious and repetitious.  Sadly, it requires endless trips back and forth to get more Fish. You constantly repeat the painfully slow process of Feeding and exercising the two Dolphins individually (taking turns) to fill up their bar graph guages that monitor Food, Health and Happiness levels for each of the 2 Dolphins.  If you don't perform these tedious chores adequately,  the people you speak with will just leave you hanging with little or no hints as to what is to be done next.  You also have to constantly get fuel for the Boat or you are left hanging again.  There are many complaints about difficulty in steering the Boat but it works OK for me if I TILT MY TABLET with SHORT, Quick movements.  Still a decent game if you can tolerate the Slow and Repetitious style.  If you read all the information given in conversations, it does give some direction on where to go and what to do but not as helpful as real instructions would be.A decent storyline and many tasks to complete help keep you engaged for a while.  Unfortunately, many players will get frustrated with the overly repetitious and slow nature of many required tasks.  If this was adjusted properly to make it more USER FRUENDLY, it would be a great game without the Boredom and Frustration that it creates in it's present state.  It is SAFE as far as  No Malware or Intrusive features but it has No Instructions, Does not EXIT with back key and has a few rough edges or glitches that need fixing too.  I will keep it since it really has much promise and may get fixed with future updates.  Just OK for now but HOPEFULLY THE DEVELOPER WILL FIX to satisfy users better.

Comfortable, lightweight and BREATHABLE material makes it more user friendly than many other types.  Works well to give light support to Thumb and Wrist without stiff metal braces.  However, not great for heavier stress loads that should be protected with stiff braces.  This works best to sooth and support your Thumb and/or Wrist while at rest or doing LIGHT WORK.  The Velcro fastening works well to adjust the level of pressure and support for painful areas also. One of the best supports out of many that I have used through the years.

Yet another Flagrant violator of our PRIVACY in disguise as a Soccer game that is a PAID APP no less!  Cartoon Network has produced a Slick Deal for you with this one:  You PAY for a game and they get Permission to force PUSH Notification ADS on you device, Spy on your device and Location and give your Kids access to Social Networking.  They also get access to your ACCOUNTS list while doing Analytics snooping as well.  Remember, this is supposed to be a CHILDRENs app by a developer called (CARTOON NETWORK) but is an undisclosed SPY TOOL!The game is mediocre but the Shameless, GREEDY, in your face Advertising and Privacy invasions are WORLD CLASS obnoxious INTRUSIONS.  This should not be tolerated by anyone who values their Privacy and Kids well being.  Cute games taking advantage of naive children is very Unethical and is not only objectionable but irresponsible marketing from a Children's app developer.  DON'T accept MALWARE like this!  Shifty tactics like this deserve NO STARS so I will have go give the minimal 1 that is required.  BE SMART - BE SAFE - Stay AWAY from this one.

An excellent Pipe Connection Puzzle game with great Graphics, good Music and Sound effects.  The music can also be Muted.  The Hint system is a good help if you get stuck.  It has a large variety of worthy piping challenges that get harder as you progress.  App is SAFE with No Malware, Addons or any Permissions at all.  However, there is a constant Popup message asking you to Rate the app after every few levels of play.  Many people are rightfully complaining because the constant interruptions are annoying.  There is a simple solution... NOTE: POPUP MESSAGE CAN BE EASILY STOPPED by pressing that RATE US button once. You can then rate it or just hit your return button after it connects.  I just pressed return button as soon as it connected with appstore and I now have NO MORE POPUPs after playing 20 levels so far.Overall, Excellent game that keeps you engaged, challenged and satisfied.  Well designed and works flawlessly for a fun user experience.  NO safety issues or annoyances (except popup that is easily stopped) so I have to give it a full 5 STARS that are well earned.  It also EXITS cleanly with Return button and completely clears from memory (unlike many ither apps).  Very USER FRIENDLY so I highly recommend it.

A very sweet point and click Adventure Puzzle experience with excellent Graphics and soothing background Music.  The Sound effects are great also and both Music or Sound effects can be Muted if you like.  This is a nicely designed and well polished game.  The endless searching is not painful but rather enjoyable with a few puzzles to figure out.  Mostly you just have to figure out how found items need to be used to open, access or operate something else.  There is a good HINT system of PICTURES only and can be accessed by tapping the (?) Symbol on options screen.  It shows sequencial pictures of where to find items to use on the level you are at.  Playing is refreshingly smooth, leisurely and enjoyable.  I finished the whole game in 2 hours and was challenged enough to make it Fun without frustration.  It has a nice, pleasant Story line too.Overall, a wonderful experience for adventure puzzle enthusiasts.  Making the machanical objects work is especially rewarding.  It is long enough but so cool that you want more.  Safe app with No Malware, Permissions or annoyances.  I did find that it includes FLURRY Analytics and it does not clear completely from memory afrer you Exit.  These may be there for a free version or for use with future Updates so I would stay away from any future Updates or scrutinize them closely if offered later.  I had to deduct 1 Star for this questionable stuff though I love the game.

The Storybook has awesome Graphics and good narration.  It will read to you and highlight words or read it by yourself.  Story is nice but the next page transition is painfully slow... the slowest I have ever seen in any app.  It has a neat Coloring book section with 6 pages and lots of tools and, coloring styles and stickers.  It has Save or Erase features too.  The Dragon Hunter game section requires quick reflexes to shoot Hunters as they pop up but you have to avoid shooting the Sheep.  Scores are calculated and saved.  High scores can be seen by tapping the Trophy button.  Lastly, there is a neat Dragon Racing game where you select your Dragon and race other dragons by flying past obstacles and picking up bonuses in the way.  It has whirlwinds to help speed you up you control movements by finger touch and tapping.  Lots of fun activities with plenty of variety to keep you engaged and prevent boredom.Overall, a nifty app that is actually equivalent to 4 apps.  The 4 in 1 variety makes it more appealing and entertaining.  Mostly well designed and works well except the Lagging page transitions in the storybook.  Safe app but Permissions are a little questionable so I deduct 1 Star for this and the silly Parental button that asked for your birth year to gain access.  Many kids can get past that easily.  I don't worry about the PUSH NOTIFICATIONS because I set my tablet to block them.  I have not seen any ads yet and it has No malware or Intrusive Addons. The app will play with WiFi off also.  It is Enjoyable and diversified enough to satisfy most users.  Worth the price for all that you get.

Pettson's Inventions opens up a Fun way of piecing together Inventions and watching them work. It first shows a picture of what they want to accomplish. You figure out how to use the various available items to achieve some Mechanical Movement to complete the goal. You then flip a Lever to start the movement (if it is put together correctly) and you are awarded a GEAR for every successful level. Graphics and animated Characters are very Cute and inviting. The Narration and Sound Effects are very nice also. The Music is soothing but can be muted if you wish. Some brief Instructions can be found by selecting the ( i ) on the settings page. It seems moderately challenging for children and can be very Delightful for them to get the Rube Goldberg type machines working properly and achieving the required goals.  Cute, Funny and nice Replay value.  Also Fun for Adults who enjoy Physics and Mechanical challenges.Overall, a Charming and Stimulating way to encourage Creative/Inventive thinking in a leisurely atmosphere. Very polished app works smoothly with no glitches, annoyances or safety issues of any kind. It has no Intrusive Addons or Malware either, thank goodness. It can be played with WiFi off too. There are 66 awesome levels.  It does what they advertise well and is a SAFE and Enjoyable experience for Kids or Adults. I recommend it highly.

A cute and vibrantly colorful Hidden Object game.  This takes Kids around the world to 12 countries in search of required items.  Each country has 3 Levels and child gets to select a souvenir from that country when completed.  There are 3 Difficulty categories to choose from so all totaled, you can play 108 levels.  The style of Clue and degree of hiding objects is different in each dificulty category to increase challenges.The player can play any level again by just selecting it.  When you replay a level, it changes the positions or locations of hidden objects so it is not too boring.  The Music is nice and the Narrator does  a great job.  Graphics are great and help keep Kids engaged and entertained.  NOTE: You need to Swipe screen left and right to see all objects.Overall, a SAFE and Entertaining Kids app that helps them with hand-eye coordination and analytical skills.  Good positive reinforcement and letting them choose Souvenir's is a great feature.  Suitable and appropriate for Kids ages 3-8.  It requires Network Permissions and installs Google Analytics (to track play).  It also has persistent Pop-Up Ads for other apps.  I have to deduct 1 Star for this annoyance in a PAID app for Kids.  Fortunately, they added a Parental block with a required number calculation.  But some Kids can easily get past that.  I found that it will play with WiFi off also.  Note: No sound control options either so you will have to adjust your device sound levels to adjust this.

I have had one of these for about 15 years and absolutely Love it.  Mine got damaged a couple of times so that is the only reason I am replacing it.  They are made of Durable plastic and a perfect size for small boxes and packages.  Many of the AMAZON boxes I receive fit in this box well (ha-ha).  Easier than having to pick up packages at the post office because the mailman could not fit it into your mailbox.  It also has a neat YELLOW FLAG that indicates your Mailman has left mail in your box.  Saves lots of wasted trips to check box and finding it empty.  I also like that the Plastic material resists Snow and Ice much better than Metal mailboxes.  The access door never freezes up and holds tight enough to keep weather out.  Better than MORE EXPENSIVE Metal boxes!HINT: If you get lots of ICE in your area, you can spray Silicone or WD-40 lubricant on the 2 Flag bases to keep then from freezing.  Also, you can use Armor-All polish on the entire box if you want to make it pretty much FREEZE PROOF in winter.If you attach it to a good wooden 3/4" base board of about 7" W x 17" L and attach through provided holes, it will stand strong and last many years (like mine).  Or you can attach it directly to 4"x4" post arms... see INSTRUCTIONS on bottom of shipping box..

A pleasant puzzle adventure with a nice storyline. Mostly a Search game finding objects to unlock or open other parts of game with Inventory items. Mini puzzles can get hard to figure out at times but the OWL Hints feature can help or Solve the puzzle for you. Good Graphics with neat artwork adds to the Fun. Adjustable Music and Sound Effects are decent. There is a MAP but it's not as helpful as we might like. Dialogue is mostly just reading simple declarations from a Lonely GUARD that adds little to game play. Some puzzles are too difficult with inadequate guidance to get you started in the right direction and some have GLITCHES.I like this Neat Adventure game that keeps you engaged. Enjoyable, Safe game with no Malware, Addons or Intrusive Permissions. However, I have some issues with it.  It needs initial directions on what to do on some of the more difficult tasks. I deducted 2 Stars because a broken Picture puzzle forced me to get help though it was clearly completed properly. Controls are horrible when putting broken picture pieces together (your finger is far from the object you select and placement is choppy) making it very hard to get decent accuracy. I also noticed that BATTERY drains quickly on my Xoom Tablat with this app. Lastly, NO EXIT BUTTON but it Exits with BACK KEY and stays in memory so I have to use a Task Killer to stop it completely. Nice app but NEEDS SOME TWEEKS for higher rating!

Fruit Drops II is much better than it appears at first.  It has more Variety with different Goals for each level.  Lots of neat Power-ups  are achieved by varying combinations of matches.  Instructions are excellent and the Music and Sound options are good and appreciated for comfortable play.  3 levels of GRAYED areas require more matches to clear the Darkened grid squares.  Also has Frozen and (netted) squares that require clearing adjacent squares to free the trapped Fruit or Pies.  Delightful Child Sounds and narration make it very entertaining as well.  I find this impressive version of March 3 style game to be more Engaging than most others.  It goes far beyond the normal repetitious match 3 gameplay.A TOP NOTCH version of this game style that is Delightfully Enjoyable.  It is SAFE with no Intrusive Malware, Addons, IAPs or Permissions to worry about.  It also EXITS cleanly and completely.  Gameplay is smooth with neat colorful HD Graphics and great positive reinforcement.  The VARIABLE Timing, Scoring and Maximum allowed moves keeps it from getting boring or too tedious.  Well designed and a definite KEEPER!

Cute and Colorful puzzles with 7 interesting themes that keep Small Kids engaged.  Simple puzzle piece placement in Shadowed areas is a great way to introduce puzzle skills and Entertain little kids.  Narrators voice is great and provides positive reinforcement when puzzles are completed correctly.  Music and Siund Effects are good and Lively.  They also have a bunch of BALLOONS flow up the screen (when puzzle is completed) and the child can POP them for fun.  It includes several Mini Games that are simple but sadly, have no instructions.  It is definitely geared towards Toddlers and Younger Kids.  It is Fun but does have a few negatives (see below).The Doctor game requires use of various items on a sick child.  Areas to be examined flash a bullseye on and off after you select an item or tool.  However, it does not seem to have an end after you do all the necessary tasks.  It also has a chart on wall with 2 pictures of a child.  One shows an X and other shows a Check mark next to pictures but NO INSTRUCTIONS or guidance of any kind.  It just stays the same with no narration, fanfare or closure.  Not good to leave users guessing like this!  It also installs the FLURRY Analytics addon onto your device so they can track your usage.  It does Exit with back button but Stays in memory so a Task Killer app will have to be used if you want to Clear it out of memory entirely.  It is a good game for Little Ones but I had to deduct 2 Stars for lack of instructions and undisclosed Analytics Tracking on our devices.  It also completely Froze my High-End Tablet forcing me to Cold Reboot the first time I used it.

A neat Word Search game where you first find the words in a grid of tiles and then rearrange the words to match a President's Quote correctly.  Itis well designed with a simple process that is easy to learn.  Some words go around corners on the grid or are spelled backwards.  This helps to increase the challenge appeal.  It has 3 difficulty levels to suite your preference and skill.  Great Sound Effects add to the Fun atmosphere.  GabySoft has created another great app like their Pix Art apps that are very popular, easy to play and are Satisfying to play.  It gets harder as you progress but is not tremendously difficult to master.  This is great for average people (like me) to enjoy without getting frustrated by difficulty.Overall, a great Word game style that keeps you Engaged, Challenged and Satisfied.  Good for most people and no annoyances.  It has only one reasonable Permission and No Malware, Intrusive Ads or Addons to Spy or irritate us.  One of the Best Word games I have seen.  Worth the price!

Triple A unleashes your creative side with variable Visual Effects that can get quite stunning after you practice for awhile.  Pleasing to the eye with endless Art shapes that are constantly in motion.  Colors randomly change and the Particle Number, Size and Length can be set by the user.  You can also change to 1 of 3 modes: Wave, Particle or Gravity for customizable effects.  Music is Soothing most of the time but there are some tracks that are actually Annoying and can not be changed.  There is an option to turn off music but it could be much better if you had control over which tracks play over and over to eliminate the Annoying ones.  It would also be better if we could select which Colors are used or not.  This would make the app more User Friendly and Customizable to suite every user by tailoring their unique experiences.Overall, a mostly Relaxing app that can be improved by giving the user control over Music tracks and Colors relatively easily.  I hope they Update to improve it.  It is SAFE with no Malware, Intrusive Addons or unreasonable Permissions.  Menu options are helpful to enhance user experience.  Potentially a 5 Star app but not without needed improvements.  Bye the way, Options menu is accessed by touching the tiny (i) symbol on lower right corner of screen that is also too close to the setting icons on my 10" Tablet.  This should be enlarged and moved away from other icons.

Nicely designed platform Runner style game with good controls and Awesome Graphics.  The Storyline is nice with a Global Water Conservation theme.  Finger swiping to make Maya climb or jump higher is a neat change from all the button pushing that most runner apps require.  Plenty of Collectable items and Power ups to keep you engaged, Entertained and Satisfied. An Enjoyable game if your Device handles the huge size without issues.Sadly, it causes problems on some devices like my 32gb Motorola Xoom Tablet that normally handles apps much larger than this with no issues.  Starts out a little Laggy and then shows floating Black Boxes on one  screen.  It also makes the Notification bar on bottom of screen FLICKER on and off constantly.  Then, it changes my devices background screen to Green pattern when I EXIT the game.  Problems reoccur even after I restart the Tablet and restart the game again.  I have to use another app to change my desktop screen back to original solid color every time.It seems likely that new AMAZON INSIGHTS Analytics addon and flaws in app code may be causing the problems for me and those encountered by other users also.  Too bad they FORCE THIS Analytics junk on our devices!  Unfortunately, our opinions go unheeded so only option is to UNINSTALL an otherwise good app.

This Hitch is well designed to keep most of the frame hidden.  It looks very good on my 2014 Honda Accord.  With the Ball Mount off and a Receiver Cap covering the hole,  you can hardly notice the car has a trailer hitch.  It is a strong and sturdy design also.  I had the same one on my previous 09 Accord and absolutely loved it for hauling my light utility trailer.  It has more of a Sporty look than most other styles.  The price was very reasonable too.I would have rated it 5 Stars but the one I received has some annoying Flaws :Not protected well enough in the packing so arrived with Scrapes and Gouges in Paint and Metal.Many raised dots all over from Welding Splatter that they did not scrape off before painting it.METAL SHIELD 3 step Paint process is not good since paint is very THIN and scapes off easily.  I discovered that when I had to sand off scrapes and gouges before REPAINTING IT MYSELF.I had to remove 11 Labels to make it look better and to allow for proper Re-Painting.  3 large inventory labels covering other inventory (barcode) labels.  Also, Name labels covering other Name labels since it was supposed to be a REESE hitch but had DRAWTITE label underneath and several other labels.The Instructions are not good and were not updated for 2014 cars.  I found that I not only had to trim the Heat Shield (that was OK) but I needed to Cut a Plastic UnderBody Panel with no guidance whatsoever.  It became a nightmare to figure out how to cut it correctly.  I finally removed the panel, installed the hitch and overlayed the plastic panel over the hitch to mark off 2 areas to cut off that would allow a good fit.  I used a chalk to mark cutout areas, a Multi cutting tool to cut plastic and had to do it twice.I chose not to exchange it because it is obvious that most of the damage came from the Factory, not shipping.  I would probably have gotten more Welding Splatter, Paint Scrapes, etc. and had my installation delayed longer.Thankfully, I got the hitch Painted properly for good corrosion protection and was able to get an adjustment on the purchase price to compensate for some of the added costs, wasted time and additional work.  I appreciate that but would have been happier if everything was right from the start.  BUYER BEWARE - it may happen to you.By the way, this is sold as and labeled REESE but is actually a DRAWTITE Hitch which is fine with me.

A Fun and Challenging app that keeps your Brain busy. You have to master the methodical steps needed to create a fancy Gelato (Ice Cream) that matches the sample while you are being Timed. The process can be quite challenging at times with 144 puzzles that get harder as you progress. A tutorial does a good job of getting you started. The Graphics are good with a cartoonish look. You simply select the necessary items from the provided Inventory and decide what sequence to use them in to create the needed design. If you make a wrong step, you can use the User Friendly tools to recover and continue. You can choose to use the REDO button, Start over with a new cone or just keep changing the Colors and Steps on top of what you have done. There us also a HINT button. If you go too slow you won't get the STAR at completion. Music is Cool and upbeat. There is positive reinforcement with CHEERING after you match the cone correctly. I like using the Bands and Sunglasses for special effects.A neat, Fun filled Puzzle app that is clean and well designed. Seems appropriate for most ages but can get difficult so youngsters may need adult help. I think it is great for Family Fun to play together. It is Safe with No Intrusive Malware or Ads but does have FLURRY Analytics that will track usage on your device. I deduct 1 Star because I don't like that. It can be played with WiFi off (my preference).

Pictures of Muscles (and Bones) are very good but can't be rotated much for better angle views (like other apps do). It also does not give detailed write-up on the muscles (like their Trigger Point app does).  The Quizzes are pretty good and would be a great tool for Students to brush up on Muscle terms and functions.  It is more of a REFRESHER than an actual TEACHING Tool for students.  So if you are not in the Medical field or a student, it is not a great way to start learning Muscles.  However, it does have a lot of good information if you can deal with the technical terms.Unfortunately, the VIDEOS do not play on my Motorola Xoom Tablet.  It gives a message (VIDEO CAN'T PLAY) every time I try a video.  I reported this in hopes that they can resolve this with a future Update.Overall, an Adequate Student Aid but not terrible great for Laypersons wanting to get easily understandable info on Muscles and Functions.  I had to deduct 2 Stars due to less User Friendly than others and the Video playback issues.

Anka is an Enjoyable and moderately challenging Adventure game with Point and Click style and a decent variety of Mini game Puzzles.  It is obviously more geared to children (though not stated).  Soft, soothing Music plays while you hear the Narration (that is good) but you have to tap screen to keep the dialogue going and message bubbles show the words on screen.  Remember, it is geared mostly for kids so adults must be patient with the slow moving, simpleness of the process that still produces an Enjoyable experience for most of us.  There are a large number of decent tasks and puzzles that keep you busy and Entertained.  The Storyline is Cute for Kids and naturally a little tedious for most adults.  I find it Enticing and Challenging enough to satisfy both Kids and Adults with Enjoyable activities that are great for casual play.Overall, a Good and Fun game that saves your progress and has decent Replay Value.  Not overly sophisticated but pretty well designed except it does not EXIT properly.  You have to use Home key to Exit game and it stays in memory.  It also has some Advertising (for their other games) but only at beginning of game.  Thankfully, it has NO Permissions at all, No Malware or Intrusive Addons and plays with WiFi off.  A Clean and SAFE game that deserves 4 Stars since it is Great for a variety of ages, SAFE and Non-intrusive.

ABC 123 is Fun for Kids while they learn to use and Write Letters and Numbers . Graphics are colorful and engaging. User learns Letters, Numbers and Objects. Graphics are colorful and engaging. Example: Pick a Letter and screen comes up with a picture of Animal or Object whose name starts with the selected letter. Touch Animal pictures to hear animal sounds. Touch a Letter to hear proper pronunciation.  Sounds and Narration are excellent. There is also a Writing feature that let's child trace the correct shapes of Letters and Numbers. Letters are done in both UPPER and lower case. Also has a fun Matching Game section with your choice of Letters, Numbers or Objects. There is also a nice SING-ALONG section that is very enjoyable and well done.Overall, a polished Educational, Entertaining Kids app that keeps kids engaged and satisfied while they learn in a Fun way. It has reasonable Permission and No Malware, Addons or Intrusive annoyances. I like it very much but have to Deduct 1Star because it has an animal icon on the main page that kids can touch to link to YouTube with no parental intervention. It also Exits well but does not shut down completely. Still a great app that is well worth the price.

FlipPix-Art with SPORTS Theme is a neat addition to this series of apps.Nicely designed to keep you engaged with challenging Nanogram puzzles. Pleasant HD Graphics and Excellent Sounds add to the soothing atmosphere. Easy to learn by following the well delivered Instructions and Tutorial. Lots of Fun even for beginners like me. Glad I decided to try it. A Nifty Flip-Art/Nanogram app that keeps your interest. Controls work smoothly and everything functions nicely. The Breakout feature lets you eliminate tiles that are obviously not needed, making it easier to continue your strategy. Also has good options to adjust Volume, get HINTS, Reset puzzle, DeSelect tiles, etc.Overall, a great Flip-Art app that is Engaging and Fun. Puzzles are addictive and seeing the Picture pop up after you solve them is a satisfying touch. You chose Puzzle sizes from 5x5, 10x10 or 15x15 according to your skill and comfort level. A SAFE app with No Data-Mining, Ads, IAP or other Intrusions and only 1 reasonable Permission. Plays well with WiFi off and has a Clean Exit function. Highly polished app that is quite Enjoyable with great Replay Value in a casual (no pressure) style. Well worth the Price!

These Ventshades are made by a division of LUND that had the best quality years ago so I purchased them.  Sadly, they are FLIMSY, came with Scuff marks on the plastic and were not cut accurately at the factory (apparent visual Flaws).  When I held them against the car, the fit was not exact from one end to the other.  To check accuracy, I held Left and Right side visors back to back and they DID NOT MATCH.  In other words, the Arch shape is slightly different between left and right side Visors (both Front and Rear pairs).  This would cause a sloppy looking fit.  Also, the Chrome part has cut off (unfinished) ends that makes them look very cheap and unsightly.  They do not live up to the advertised HYPE of good quality!  Not worth the price.Stay away if you value Good Quality, Solid construction and Proper Fit.  I returned for Refund and bought a different set (through Ebay for $85) with Sturdy construction, properly Finished ends and impressive OEM style, shape and fit.

Pet Doctor is another in a seres of cute and colorful apps for small children.  This one seems more appropriate for the 2-3 yr old kids though.  It has 15 Pets that need some CARE in the form of minor Interactive adjustments to be made by the player.  All of the critters are colorful, pleasant and make cute sounds.  After you make the necessary adjustments to cure their ailments, you feed them and they happily fall asleep.  The Graphics are vibrantly colorful (like all Toca Boca apps), the Music is pleasant and the Sound effects are very Enjoyable.Sadly, this is a very Basic app compared to the other Toca Boca apps.  No Interactive features with the surrounding areas or objects, just with the animal patients and the food.  Kids enjoy it more when they can touch other items on screen to get some kind of reaction.  There is also minimal movement of the Animals, nothing else interesting happens and no fanfare or positive reinforcement when the child completes a task properly.Overall, pleasant app with calming atmosphere and minor interactive tasks for smaller children.  However, it seems to be missing some of the Fun, Interactive features that made other Toca Boca apps outstanding.  Many kids will get bored quickly with this one.  I still gave 4 stars because it is ok for toddlers has NO Intrusive Malware or Addons, it plays with WiFi off and it Exits cleanly and completely.

PDF Max is a great tool for Viewing and Editing PDF Documents on Android devices.  Much faster loading of your files than other apps.  The Display is sharp and clear for most documents but some do come out a little fuzzy (similar to other apps).  It has many useful features that are helpful like the magnifier, highlighting, annotation tools, file saving/sharing, editing tools, etc.  It works well and fast (once you get more familiar with features).  Not full featured like commercial apps but great for averagee users.  Unfortunately, I could not find an easy REDO feature so I can erase changes I made and then want to start the edit over again.  I don't like being stuck with an edit that doesn't let me experiment more.  I have to deduct 1 Star because of this and the lack of more desired functions.  It is pretty impressive compared to most others though.Overall, much faster load speed makes it better than others.  It has enough common features to satisfy average users and works well with all the Editing tools and Saving functions.  It also has No Malware, Adware, etc. And works fine with WiFi off.  I recommend it!

Well I decided to go for this necklace to give my 9 year old daughter but was not real happy when I almost needed to use a magnifying glass just to see what is says on it. Would have been really nice if it were shown modeled on a person's neck to give refrence to it's actual size of very small. Non the less my daughter does love it because it is real gold and real jewelry. The length of the chain is about just right and maybe a bit too short to hang outside and be seen. I really did think my daughter would be upset because it is so small but she likes it. I did look it over and yes I had to use a magnifying glass but does look like it is made fairly well but not sure it is really worth the asking price. Just keep in mind that it is really small and if you keep that in mind then you probably would be pleased with it otherwise may want to look at some of Amazon's other jewelry since I have always been pleased in the past just not blown away this time. Thanks and hope this helps.

My kids love blankets and carry them around from room to room.  While I personally am not a big fan of animal prints, my daughters LOVE them.  This blanket is 100% polyester and is soooo soft.  Very comfy to snuggle on the sofa for family movie night.  The size is 50x60, so it would be more usable for adults if it were a little larger, but it is a nice throw blanket.  The kids and dogs fight over the softest blanket in the house and this one is the preferred pick of all that are left laying around.  The weight and density of this blanket is much more than your typical fleece or plush blankets, so be careful when laundering.  It is recommended that it be laundered in cold water and dried with low heat.  Fortunately, we have not had a need to wash it yet, but just a precautionary for when the time does arise.  Overall, my top recommendation would be different prints, or even just solids.  The function and feel is fantastic and we will definitely have this one around to fight over for a while.

I received this Nuface trainer kit and figured what the heck yes I am a man but I want to look as good for as long as I can! Makes my wife happy too! Now I am new to this and have never used and Microcurrent therapy before so did not know exactly what to expect.  When unpacking the unit I immediately noticed a very solid and comfortable feel to it and super nice build quality. I guess given the price this would be expected. Also I should mention the one bad reviewer that blasted it for the battery not staying fully charged and ready to go when it sat off the charge base for several days is silly. This device is no different than your electric shaver or battery operated toothbrush. They too need to stay on the charger when not in use to keep battery full and ready to use. Nothing new here.  I followed the directions and let charge on the dock overnight and next morning before I took a shower I decided to give it a try. I have wrinkles beginning under my eyes and above my cheek bones so that s where I focused but can also do forehead and chin or basically whole face. The conductive gel provided is cool and somewhat slimy feeling. I decided to to start with under my eyes first and immediately I could feel a tingle from the electrical current. I would rate it as feeling good and relaxing for me. Each area lasted for about 3 minutes before it beeped to let me know I need to move on to next area.  I did not have to use a lot of the gel so hopefully it will be enough for a month or so but is only about 12 for 2 oz here anyways. So I have been using it everyday now for about two weeks and no I don't see miracules overnight transformation but I can tell my face feels a little bit tighter and ever so slightly smoother so yes I do see improvement. Now lets talk about the cost factor. You can go to a clinic for about 90-120 a pop for 12 sessions for 1440.00 and have to take time to drive to clinic and wait. Or you could spend 400.00 and do it in the comfort of your own home at your leisure and have same professional results. So for me it is a no brainer. I choose to do in my free time and at home whenever I want to.  All in all I believe that within the 60 days mark I will see much more improvement and will continue to use and will update my review to reflect my findings. Thanks and hope this helps.

I received these Bose headphones about a week ago and have been using them like crazy. The first thing I noticed was that the boxing was very plain and minimal unlike other Brand names with super fancy packaging but really who cares. I placed the headphones in my ears just as the came out of the box and wow they are supper comfortable compared to any of my other high dollar ones I have had in the past. It did come with extra ear pieces.The ear buds fit very snug in my canal and surprising they do not sweat in my ear after an extended run. This is a plus because sweat is usually what ruins all my past headphones as it enters the voice coil and rust out.  Now for the sound. The highs are superb. The kids are superb. The lows are very good and natural but not super defined like some of my other high end headphones. I have used them long enough to break them in and all in all the sound is very good.  My only concern might be the cord. It is very slim round and not the flat tape type that seem to hold up better under abuse. Lets face it when you are running they are going to get abused. The controls work just fine with no issues at all and work with both my Samsung S4 and Blu Studio Energy phones. For the money these are very good headphones. They are not the best but they are Bose and just the name raises the price. I hope this helps. Thanks

Absolutely this Hayward filter was worth it to me. I have had a large oval above ground pool for about 3 years now and have struggled with cloudy water and algae the entire time. I have been using all the needed chemicals and back flushed my existing sand filter regularly and have also changed the sand and water each year. Still cannot get clear water even with the pump running 24-7. I finally decided that maybe it was the cheap sand filter that came with the pool and wow. Why did I wait 3 years to think of this is beyond me. I installed this new Hayward filter and within just 8hrs I notice the pool was getting much clearer. Then after 2 days it was sparkling clean and I am so happy now. I have back flushed it twice now and has been running for a month and also put the pool back on a timer so it only runs now for about 8hrs and the pool is still sparkling clear. I was so close to tearing the pool down but very happy that this Hayward sand filter saved the pool and now wife and kids are happy too! Thanks and hope this helps.
I try to get the newest update but it's not working. 8(

First, my wife was thrilled when I told her I got these labels for her to try.  She is always hosting baby showers and making treat bags for my kid's birthday parties, so I knew she would like to implement these into one of her projects.  First, the positives...typical great quality Avery product.  Adheres well to the foil on the kisses (as pictured on the cover), as well as plastic bags and paper products.  Printing to the edge was a nice feature to make use of the entire label. Now for the negatives, 1) the sheet size is not a standard 8.5x11.  Be prepared to feed this into the envelope settings on your printer for this to print properly.  2) The template for this product is not a standard template available from Microsoft, so you must download from Avery in order to use.  This process took about fifteen minutes to download, install, and locate the template to begin customizing, 3) The price for 120 labels (6 sheets) is excessive.  Spending $12.95 to make two or three bags of chocolates for a birthday party is a little over the top.Overall, the product itself is a neat addition to the Avery line of products.  Would I purchase again?  Probably not at the current asking price.

I decided to get this Pet air purifier for my house and BIG St.Bernard that loves to shed his fur and dander all over our living room. It has been a problem for some time and decided time to fight back. I decided to place this near his bed and was blown away that within less than one week the filter was already covered with dog fur and dander. I also did notice that the dog smell was slightly reduced. The air purifier is very nice to look at in terms of an appliance sitting on my floor in the living room. Now I had to run this on low setting because anything else is just too loud. Medium and Fast sounds like a hurricane is coming and cannot hear the TV over it's noise. The low setting seems to wrk just fine though so no big deal. I really don't know what they were thinking when they designed the blower portion of this system because of the noise from Medium and High speeds. I don't think anyone could realistically stand the noise. Next is the filter replacement cost and seems a little high but I noticed that all air purifier filters are kind of pricey. I think that if i clean the preflight regularly that I will not need to replace the main filter very often anyways. All in all I like the air purifier but only on low speed. Thanks and hope this helps.

My wife LOVES this grill.  She had one many years ago when they first came out, but the cleanup was horrible.  She used it anyway though since it was a quick and lower fat alternative to frying.  Note: we only fry things MAYBE twice a year so healthy eating is a big plus!First, straight out of the box, the unit is ready to use.  Remove the protective sealing and setup is complete.  The instruction booklet says to grease the plates before the first use.  I did not do this, although I probably should have.  I did remove the plates and wash them before cooking on them.  Secondly, the drip tray still seems a little awkward.  If you hit or bump it, then you're going to have a mess.  Would be nice if there was a way to hook it onto the unit to hold it in place.  Next, the temperature slide seems a little cheap.  Hopefully it will not break or fall off, but nonetheless, it does the job intended.  Now, as for the first time it was used, be prepared for the dust on the heating elements to smell HORRIBLE.  We left the unit on for about 20 minutes to burn off all of this residue before we started cooking.Now for the meal, we made grilled fish.  Tilapia and flounder to be exact.  The flounder took about 6 minutes to cook through.  The tilapia about 8 minutes.  We were able to get 6 pieces of meat on the grilling surface at one time.  With a family of 5, I made two rounds of meat, which still only took 15 minutes.  Literally, place the meat on the grill, sprinkled on some seasonings, and done.  The cleanup was a breeze.  The unit was unplugged after cooking.  We ate dinner.  Twenty minutes later it was still a little warm, so using potholders, the plates were removed and placed in the dishwasher along with the remaining supper dishes.  Came out perfect.  Granted, we only cooked fish so nothing to stick on or make a mess, but my opinion is that if the plates are washed immediately after use, the cleanup should be pretty painless.Summary - great product for quick and easy healthy meals!  Could use minor improvements, but nothing to keep me from purchasing.

I received this jack In The Box system for my boat that is a little old and never equipped with a jack or lug wrench. The Extreme Max system is a very good idea because no worries about did you remember to bring the jack or lug wrench in the truck? It is very heavy duty and mount's on most trailer frames as there is two size U-clamps and nuts supplied to mount it. I mounted mine on the right front and I was afraid it would look weird and stand out like a sore thumb but it actually look's nice. When mounted it is very secure and comes with a sliding bar that goes in front of the cover and can also use a lock to keep from being stolen. The jack and lug tools fit nice and snug in it's enclosure. I have it mounted far enough forward so that I do not think water will get into it while loading or unloading the boat in the lake.  For me this is a great tool and possible life saver because before this I did not have any tools incase of a flat tire so Im good now. I would for sure recommend this to anyone that does not have a jack solely with the boat. Thanks and hope this helps.

The look of rustic, handmade pottery without the expensive price tag!  This is a beautiful serving plate that is perfect for every day use.  A bit on the small side for large family gatherings, but just right for a weekday night at home.  The color is an antique creamy color, a slight tinge of yellow, with a darker edge to look more unique.  The color coordinates well with other colors of the Cucina line by Rachael Ray.  As a microwave and dishwasher safe product, I hope to have years of use from the product without the glaze wearing off.  A slightly weighted dish, which is nice, but not too heavy for every day use.  Overall, this is a quality serving dish (I wouldn't call it a platter since the size is far from what I would consider appropriate for a large serving) that compliments a rustic or French modern casual atmosphere.  The look of classic elegance appropriate for every night of the week.

Perfect!! This battery solved my problem with my Neato saying the battery needs charging and please remove dust bin and switch power off and on again. I had also noticed I was only getting about 45 minutes run time when it was charged fully. I thought my Neato was done for but this battery not only last for over two hours run time but solved my first problem I was having the the message to remove the dust bin and switch off and on again. I had tried several times to remove the old battery and let sit for about 20 minutes then plug in and hoped it would reset and fix but did't and that is why I decided to go ahead and give this battery a shot and so glad I did. It actually seems to run longer than it did with the original battery even when it was new. The original battery was 3600mAh and this new one is 3800mAh so maybe it really is as it states. At any rate this seems to be a very good battery for the price. Thanks

My back round is a I would guess Hobby electronics repair. I repair just about anything electronic and many times very very small. Such as an iPod or iPhone. The component are so small that almost can't tell what they are without magnification. And magnification is a must when replacing any of these components. In the past I have been using don't laugh but visor type magnifier and hold flash light in my mouth type equipment. Not very fun or practical. So without question when I was offered this I jumped on it. I am so glad I did too because I can see what I am doing very well and most important without a headache from straining my eyes. I was really surprised when I pulled this out of the box and it was so much larger than picture makes it look. It is very good size for professional use. My wife mentioned that it is the same size they use at here work Prettl Electronics.  I quickly mounted it to my work bench with no assembly or tools, plugged it in and flipped the switch on and wow it is so clear and bright! I am so happy now because I can clearly see what I am working on and can manuver the light in almost any needed position. Another thing I noticed is that I can be only maybe an inch away from the glass and the glass does not fog up at all in anyway. The viewing lens is huge at 5 inches and the magnification is just enough for most uses. There have been times that I had to use my electronic microscope for locating some very small poor solder joints. The build quality seems to be very good. It stays in place and does not budge. I would for sure recommend this for anyone that needs to view a clean and large image.Pros: Much larger than expected that of professional's  No assembly required.  Very nice clear image when magnified  Can manuvuer in almost any position desired  Made of very nice stainless steel  Light is very bright and clean- not so bright that it blinds you from the reflection  Lens does not fog up at all no matter how close I would get to itCons: I have not found any as of yet.

This is a factory BMW part that these sellers ground the BMW emblem off so they could resell with their name. This part is the same as the car originally came with and should keep on it. I have used non BMW manufactured resistors and final stages that maybe last 6 months to a year. I am a Master BMW tech with my own repair shop so I always try to use the best parts for my BMW customers at the best price. Thanks

0:51 Mins I have both a Neato Botvac 80 and now the Brand New D80. Just a little background I have been using robotic vacuums to clean my home since the old red Irobot Romba came out and have had Irobot vacs form the 4110, 530, 535, 650, and the 780. All were great at first but after six months they seemed to get loud and not clean as well. I still love them though. I have also had several of the Samsung, LG, Dirt Devil  and while they cleaned ok they would also get stuck a lot and not hold much debris. I currently also have 5 Bobsweep pet series and that is only because I buy them really cheap because they are always broken but when they are working they clean great.  Now back to the Neato. I was one of the first to wait in line online for the first XV11 to come out and have loved Neato Vacs ever since. The Neato vacs sound like a jet plane but the newer models such as the Botvac series are much quieter and clean even better.  Now for the difference between the Botvac 80 and D80 are few but I have noticed that the D80 is very slightly louder than the 80 but the D80 also seems to have more suction power too. It looks like the major change has been to the main brush. The Botvac 80 has a non sealed bearing on the end of the brush that sometimes has issues with hair getting entangled in the bearing. The Botvac D80 Has gone back to the brass bearing assy that is larger in diameter but is still super easy to clean when needed which is not very often. I am glad to see they have gone back to the good old brass type bearing. Other than the obviouscool black color it operates the same, has same side brush, same size debris bin. I am sure there are other minor improvements but I have noticed that none of the Botvac series have ever had a firmware upgrade so sounds like that have got it down now unlike the XV series that seemed to have a firmware upgrade about every month or two.  When comparing the size of the debris bin to other brands it is a no brainer. The Neato has by far a way larger bin and the Neato crams it in too. I have used many many robotic vacuums and for the long term I still prefer the Neato to any others at the moment. It is interesting to note that the Irobot Rombas that used to be cheaper than Neato are now more expensive. All in all I for sure recommend the Neato Botvac D80 for great all around cleaning especially if you have pets and dust bunnies. If you have found this review helpful please mark helpful at bottom. Thanks

Ok well I have a dog that like's to get into our garbage can when we are not looking. He will use his nose to open the lid and dive in. The garbage can had no lid lock and was really easy for him to open. Needless to say I needed to do something and this garbage can came just in perfect time. If you look at the picture you will see the the lid is flush with the outer ring and now he has no way of nudging it open anymore. Now if he were to knock it over then yeah he would be into it but fortunately that has never happened. Ok now onto the actual can itself. I like the size and wide opening but really wish the lid would open more than just 3/4 without having to force it up. Just using the foot pedal it opens 3/4 only. I have noticed that the can is very stable even when it is empty unlike my other one that when empty and you press the foot pedal the whole can would flip forward onto you. So it is refreshing to see this one is built and functions great.  I also like the fact that when changing the bag you simply lift the upper lid section off and pull the bag up and out. Next a really nice feature is the spare bag holder nicely out of view in a pocket behind the can. I did find that the K liners do work very well and are also very strong but at a price. The custom fit liners are a bit more money and I will probably just use regular ones when the sample pack that came with the can runs out.  All in all it seems to be well made and thought out with the exception of the lid only opening 3/4 with the foot pedal.Pros: Lid is flush and my dog cannot nudge it open to go dumpster diving.  Very easy to lift the upper ring up to remove full garbage bag.  Has built in pocket in rear of can and is out of site to hold spare bags.  Came with a sample pack of K-liner bags.  Very stable either empty or full.  Very well built.Cons: The lid only opens 3/4 way using the foot pedal but otherwise very nice wide opening.  K-liners are a bit expensive but can use standard bags.

I wasn't real sure how this would look in my bathroom but so glad I did! I decided to go for this style solinder faucet even though was unsure of how well it would look in my bathroom along with less than contemporary componets surrounding it. My counter top is an off white marble and a Kohler sink. I removed my chrome faucet and installed this one in place and wow! I really do like this look better. It is higher up and stands out nicely but not obnoxious. Unlike some other reviews I feel the white handle is very nice. Not a bright white but more of an off white and compliments my marble counter top perfectly.  The installation was very painless compared to my kitchen sink and faucet I replaced last weekend. Has an awesome system to secure it to the counter top with having figure how to tighten that jam nut or purchase a special basin wrench. Just spin the nut flush and the tighten two screws to secure it firmly.  This faucet is heavy and very substantial. Looks like the inners are mostly brass and comes with two braided stainless steel flex hoses to connect the hot and cold water conections. Nothing about this feels or looks cheap in my opinion. The faucet works very well and with no drips after shutting off.  All in all I am very glad I gave this style a chance. Hope this helps

One word...."Amazing!"  I love this device. At first thoughts when I opened the box it had a great non-slip rubber that surrounds the entire battery pack that seems to be nice and thick and should last for a while to come.  Another thing I noticed pretty fast was how heavy the thing is!  It probably weighs a good pound or so!  The features on the pack are a 1a output, and also a 2.4a output to plug a usb charger into. The one thing that I love the most is how long this battery pack last!  I was able to charge my iPhone 5, a decent 5-6 times before it completely died.  The charging time takes around 5-6 hours from what iv been able to tell. As far as drop proof, and waterproof goes I'm not going to out right test it, but as far as the build quality goes, it should hold up very well. Even though the product is a bit more pricy I still highly recommend the product to anyone looking for a good rugged portable  powerbank!

I use mainly robotic vacuums to clean my 90% hardwood floors in my house but even then sometime's I need a standalone vacuum specially when my St.Bernard is shedding which is almost year round. The robotic vacuums do a great job of picking up the dog hair but cannot get in all the nooks and such nor do they clean the throw rugs real well. This is where the Dyson V6 comes in to play. I love the fact that it is powered by a rechargeable battery so no cords to mess with. I absolutely despise corded products and hoses too!!  I am very impressed with the build quality of the vacuum and is by far better than most. The vacuum is not quite though. It sounds like a jet plane. Loud but not unbearable. The brush head uses carbon fibers for the brush and is motorized. It should be noted that the brush head will shut off on it's own if the carpet adds too much resistance and will restart upon releasing the power button and turing back on again. The vacuum is extremely powerful in the turbo mode but the battery life is pretty short and the handle gets warm near the battery but only when using it in the turbo mode.  When using it in the normal mode the vacuum suction is still very good and battery life is much better probably about 30 minutes and no warm handle either. The way that the Dyson pivots and turns around the corners is awesome and very natural. I do find that the dust bin fills very quickly but that is mostly because of the dog fur. Fortunately it only takes a second to empty. For hardwood floors this vacuum is just awesome. For throw rugs it just depends because if it has textures to it and does not do real well and if it is a very low profile it tends to pick it up and get stuck.  I tried to use it in my car and just decided that was not going to work unless you plan on only vacuuming the flat open areas of the floor. The crevice tool provided is good but really does not work in a car with a rigid tube that it attaches to. If you buy the optional tool pack that comes with the flexible suction hose I think it would work awesome in cars.
