Ive tried a number of cases lately this is one of the worst for tactile feeling of the buttons, even compared to a previous Defender. Another fit and finish issue is the hard plastic shell. On my other Defenders the hard shell snaps tight around the iPhone then you slip the silicone around to complete the protection. That included the Defender 5 which was available before I had my iPhone 5.>>>An improvement I have noted on the new version is the tight fit is back, I previously complained, but removed the text above, about a poor fit. That was fixed. It is properly tight. I just wish it was a bit smaller and still as strong. Its just big and heavy and very clunky. I carry it on my belt, the main reason for a Defender and it just pulls down on the belt too much. I cannot recommend it.

CeeOne Premium Micro USB Cables in Assorted LengthsIf youre like me theres never a cable around when you need one and when you finally find one its the wrong length. Well, too short is worse than too long but why not get a bunch instead of just one. For the price of one mid-length fancy cables, this CeeOne kit gets you a half dozen assorted basic cables. As you see from the offering you get two 1, three 3 and a 6. The Goldilocks of cable kits unless you need a really long run, then you have to keep looking. One of these sizes almost always will do well by me.The quality of construction is very good. There are your basic rubber cables, not fancy braided ones, but CeeOne has those too. The connectors are solid and the MicroUSB side is logoed. I think this is a must have and keep some 3 footers in your car for sure. This is an excellent value and highly recommended.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

CeeOne Quick Charge 2.0 42W 3-Port USB Car ChargerAs an iPhone user Im not able to enjoy the hi-speed Quick Charge, still this is a very good charger and when driving with my Samsung owning friends, I am now the cool guy with the quick charger. For me I can still get a 2.4 Amp charge going on my iPhone and thats pretty good too. The hi-speed port is noted with a green tab on the port. This charger comes with a MicroUSB cable which I will reserve for the QC port and us other color cables for the regular port. The quality of construction is excellent and the performance for me was fine. I am very satisfied with this charger and especially for Samsung owners it is highly recommended.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

Veepeak 48W/ 9.6A 4 Port USB Car Charger with Smart AmpThere isnt much to a good device. First, its reasonably priced, check. Next it should do what its supposed to do, check. Lastly it should overachieve, check. This Veepeak car USB charger is a four port device and all four ports put out full 2.4 Amps. It does all that and its smaller than other four port chargers Ive worked with. Its closer in size to a two port version. I love that all four ports are hot in that I dont have to look for the small print or a color code. The quality of construction is excellent and the no-hassle warranty is great. This is an excellent choice in chargers as put in some extra cables and you can easily offer charging to your friends devices. I do recommend this charger.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

BURBERRY Brit for Women Eau de Toilette, 3.3 fl. OzThis is a lovely scent for the lady in your life. It being an eau de toilette, it is not over-powering, for you. It has floral and citrus notes and a touch of vanilla. It is beautifully packaged for gift giving. The bottle with the gray white and red striping is quite elegant. I like it very much and am quite pleased with the effect. It is joyous to say the least. I know you will enjoy the effect. If you have any doubt try a smaller size first but I think you will be pleased.

Proactiv+ Redness Relief Serum, 1.7 OunceThis expensive little tube worked well for me. I did put it in the fridge as the instructions say. I used it the next day and had a bug bite that was all red and itchy. I dont think thats its main purpose but the cold steel roller and the serum felt so nice on my arm. I also used it on my face in a Rosacea area that gives me problems. It did feel nice and I left the serum on for the prescribed ten minutes. You are only supposed to use this three times a week, so I assume its pretty strong. I rinsed with warm water after the time and I did feel better and less itchy. I think I might be put off by the cost and use cold compresses and appropriate lotions. Still this is an easy solution to a problem and the tube is very easy to use with the rotating top assembly. On and off are clearly marked and theres an arrow to tell you which is which.  I see the TV commercials all the time and this is the first product Ive tried. I am impressed if not a little price shocked.

Stander Metro Car Handle Plus - 2 in 1 Automotive Standing Aid and Support Handle + Included FlashlightIf you are a driving senior or take care of a senior you want one of these in your car available for use. The metal end slips into the car door latch on the center post of the car. It then makes a strong leverage handle to push up against to help the senior or impaired person stand up or for that matter to balance and sit down. The surface is a very hard rubber and provides a good grip. The opposite end of this handle has a flashlight (batteries included) with a twist actuator. You tighten the lens cap to urn the LED light on and loosen to turn off. Its very handy if you drop things.The metal end can also be used to break a windows if you are trapped in the car. The only thing missing is a seat belt cutter but it probably was traded for the flashlight in the design stage. I would advise storing it in a center box or glove box as opposed to the little storage section at the bottom of many car doors. In a crash this could be a very dangerous projectile. Better keep it secured. If you are leaving the car then that door shelf is fine but upon reentering the car storage it securely. This makes a great stocking stuffer for the upcoming holiday season or really anytime for the person you care about.

Jack Link's Meat Snacks Beef Jerky, Peppered, 5.85 OunceIm a fan of jerky, mostly turkey and beef. I like the teriyaki sweet kind and the peppery salty kind. This Jack Links pepper beef version is delicious. It is a nice cut, not too thick or thin. I has a great peppery taste, without being overwhelming or too spicy. You do know its pepper but its enjoyable. The chew is good and its tender enough to be a bit juicy.I rank this jerky as one of the better I've had in quite a while. If this flavor sounds like one you would want to try, I recommend it highly. I love it.

Bestten 6-Outlet Power Strip Surge Protector with 6 USB Ports, 900Joules, 6ft CordThis surge protector and charger from Bestten is a very good performing unit. It can handle six A/C plugs of standard size, less if some are of the brick or wall wart large type. It also has six USB ports for charging, two of which are designated for tablets and large draw items.I set it up in my kitchen as my charging station and power plug expander for the items on my counter top. The white color goes very well for kitchen use. There is a back-lit red power switch which is also the reset in a surge event. The surge protection is rated at 900 Joules. I liked it but do wish it had off set the first and last plugs for larger plugs. See my pictures and youll understand. Still it is very good for what it is and having six USB ports is great, I do like it a lot.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

Oral ThermometerInfrared Digital Ear ThermometerBoth by ViveIve been using a digital thermometer for years. My favorite has been a Timex which is no longer made but still works. I tested this Vive oral against the Vive Infrared Ear thermometer, my trusty Timex oral and an Exergen temporal scanner. After all my testing Im not sure if Im sick or well. Here are my results all taken twice all within a couple of minutes it took me to do the test.Vive Oral = 99.7, 99.6Vive Ear = 98.2, 98.2Timex Oral = 99.3, 98.8Exergen = 97.4, 97.0In terms of speed, the Vive Ear is the fastest, then the Timex then the Exergen and finally the Vive Oral. None took more than about 10 seconds. Only the Vive Ear gave the same temp moments apart. The Vive Oral gave the highest readings and the bell rang the fastest on the result. I dont know which to believe, to tell you the truth. To me the Exergen is the most difficult to use, the Vive Ear the easiest and quickest both orals about the same with the Timex being quicker of those two. I dont have a doctors office thermometer to meter against. Both Vive products are rated as guaranteed accurate but I found the Ear the more so of the two and the Oral to be the highest reading. I love the display on the Vive Ear thermometer. It is large clear and backlit in blue, best of the bunch. The Vive Oral is a large clear display but not backlit. In low light conditions thats a problem. The Ear comes with hard clear plastic protective holder the Ear comes with a zippered protective pouch. Both Vive thermometers came with batteries and are easy to replace when needed.Of the two Vive products I like the Ear best of all and am worried that the Oral may be reading high. Either that or Im sicker than Im lead to believe by the rest.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

Either that or Im sicker than Im lead to believe by the rest.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

Coolife Door Stopper [Free Hook+ Rubber]This door stop works great, as you can imagine. It is made of steel and has replaceable rubber treads. It also come with a stick on hook to keep it near the door you want to stop it with. It also hare a set of replacement rubber treads, a nice inclusion. The only problem I ran into is my main front door. The gap at the bottom is just too big. It swung right over the stop. So I will wait for the XL version for my front door. All my other doors that can swing closed were held in place perfectly. Whether it was floor or carpet, not a problem at all. Overall this door stop does what it should and looks good doing it.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

Attmu Silicone Pastry Mat with Measurements, Pastry Rolling Mat, Reusable Non-Stick Silicone Baking Mat, Set of 2, 2 ColorsI like to protect my counter top when prepping food. My most difficult chore was rolling out pizza dough. This Attmu silicone mat helps with both. While not a cutting surface, use a cutting board for that, it can stay on my counter top and protect the surface and has useful measurement markings that come in very handy. I especially like the circle markings for expanding sizes when I roll the pizza dough. If you have a full sized sheet pan this can line that and go right to the oven. I only have a half sheet pan.The quality and design are quite good and pleasing. It is very attractive on the counter and adds functionality. For me the blue goes with my kitchen best and will have a place there. The pink will be my backup. The price point is excellent considering the size and function. Im sure you will enjoy using them.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

Aukey 3 in 1 Clip-on Cell Phone Camera Lens Kit, 180 Degree Fisheye Lens/ Wide Angle Lens/ 10 X Marco LensIve always bemoaned the fact that my iPhones have never had a good zoom lens. Now with this Aukey kit I can at least get some good wide shots and a really nice macro. You get two main lenses and two snap on holders and a cleaning cloth. Both main lenses have caps and there are very basic instructions. I wish the instructions were a bit clearer. It took me a bit to realize the macro lens had to be unscrewed from the wide lens. It was a Doh! moment for me.Once I had everything sorted out and the case removed from my iPhone 6+. Yes its a tight fit so most likely youll have to remove your case. A bumper may get away with staying on. It was very easy to snap on and position the lens, in the mount, to my iPhone. There is nothing to set just let the camera focus and take the shot. I am uploading a series of pictures. Most are outside shots just starting with the standard iPhone lens and then the fish eye and wide lens. I used the macro lens to shoot a penny. I need more practice but for a novice got decent to very good results. I see need for improvement in my shill level but I got some good results. I especially like my penny result.I think for the very reasonable cost and very good quality its a great choice. The only thing I wish was a soft carry bag so I can keep everything together in my pocket and protected. Ill just buy one in the usual places. Overall I like them and it adds to my photographic capability.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

JETech 42mm Apple Watch Protective Case for Apple Watch All Models 2015 (White)I recently received a Kartice White Ceramic Apple Watch Band,Kartice(TM) Luxury Ceramic Bracelet Watch Band Strap Replacement Wrist Band For Apple Watch & Sport & Edition iWatch 42/38mm With Adapter Butterfly Closure Retail Packaging-White,42mm watch band for my 42mm Sport in SG. I was using a chrome cover from Ozaki Plated Apple Watch Case - OZAKI O!coat Wardrobe+ 2 in 1 Ultra Slim & Light Weight Case Set for Him. Coat Your Apple Watch Daily / Full Access to All Functions / Compatible with Apple Watch Sport 42 mm and liked the look. I wanted to make a complete white look for the watch and found this JETech case for my watch. I bought this as it was a no-brainer price and looked like what I wanted. It does look great to me, on my watch and really completes the look. It matches the ceramic band very nicely the only thing different is the matte finish vs. the shine of the ceramic. That said its as perfect as I was able to find and the budget wasnt broken. I saw some reviews that said it came off easily? I havent experienced that and think maybe they hit the watch hard enough to knock it off and the case protected it. Overall Im thrilled with the case and have gotten compliments on the look. The combination does attract compliments.

Protectif RFID Blocking Leather Wallet for MenI have a dilemma. I really like this wallet and love the RFID blocking feature. My problem is my old Joseph Abboud wallet holds more than this one can. I tried moving everything from one wallet to the other. I also uploaded some photos showing my results. I stopped when I could no longer fold the Protectif wallet closed. I still had more to go. I now have a challenge I didnt want to face. I want the extra protection of RFID blocking, so Im going to have to trim back what I carry.The Protectif wallet is quite beautiful and smells great. I know the smell will go away with use but its nice now. It is a real leather wallet and is nicely packaged in a box suitable for gift giving. I like it enough and want the security that I really have a job ahead of me. Im sure you or the man in your life will enjoy this wallet. It carries plenty of stuff, Im just a special case.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

Fill N Save 2 Pack Reusable Carafe K-CupsI love how these smart companies are defeating the Green Mountain Evil Empire. I have a Keurig 2.0 machine that I got from the C warehouse membership store. I knew going in that there were compatibility issues but wanted C protection as I was more worried about the pump breaking as I was for compatibility. Well now thanks to EcoGreen Fill N Save I can make my carafe of coffee using any coffee I buy or grind. Orange (and purple) are the colors of freedom and these carafe cups are orange and take any coffee and fool the Keurig into brewing it.I love that they have a steel filter and are dishwasher safe. It is very easy to fill one with coffee, insert and brew. Now error messages and compatible with the favorites system too. I had some fine ground French Roast and used it for my testing. It worked perfectly and I found now grounds in my cup. Taste of the coffee is a function of the coffee and brewer so I wont rate that other than to say it was just fine. Im uploading some pictures to show that it worked with no errors. I cant recommend these orange cups highly enough. Im very happy with my freedom.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

EXCELLENT 3.7V 18650 Li-Ion Rechargeable Batteries (2-Pack)I have a couple of flashlights that use 18650 batteries. One a Cree LED and the other a UV LED. So being able to test out these EXCELLENT batteries was a good opportunity. They charged right up in my charger and I loaded them in my flashlights and they worked great. Do understand that 18650 is a standard and is not a variant of other battery sizes. You will need a proper charger, search for an 18650 charger. I had no issues using them and their construction was top notch. They are rated 2600mah which should last a good long time between charges. The price point is very good and the name of the product, says it all. Im very happy with them and do recommend them.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

I really thought the bristles would be much stiffer. This is more like a firm toothbrush with a big head. One of those would be way cheaper and about as effective, maybe even more effective than this one.

Philips Norelco Bg1026/60 Bodygroom 1100This is an OK Man-Groomer with the capability to trim lightly hairy guys. Its 1 AA battery powered so its not going to be that tough. It still works well for what it is. It is NOT for backs that are hairy. Well, not without someone to help you and if your back isnt too hairy. It will roll along your body in two directions so you dont have to flip it. It isnt too noisy so it isnt unpleasant to use. This product is guilty, though, of one of my top pet peeves. It is a device with little accessory parts but no case or bag to hold them in so you dont lose them. I do like the tether to secure it to your wrist. Overall its OK and works well but maybe a more hairy person should look to stronger units.

Lancaster Soft Cremes Assorted Tin, 2.25 PoundTo start these caramels taste very good, theyre soft, chewy and delicious. Then I read the ingredients list and thought I read this was from Milton Hersheys original recipe. I kept reading and caught the statement, it was the inspiration line. Oh I get it, take the milk butter vanilla starting place and add high fructose corn syrup and palm kernel oil as well as a bunch of unpronounceables. I get it, we made it cheaper and mass producible.Still, they do taste good and came well packaged so if you are shipping it during the holidays it will arrive in great shape. If you are bringing it to the office, I doubt anyone will flip the can to read the ingredients. Youll be a hit, they are very good. I just cant give it five stars based on whats in it.

IBRA - 3.5mm Male To 3.5mm Male Stereo Audio CableSo you have a Bluetooth speaker and you think it can sound better than it does. You are right, if you give up the wireless and connect a cable it will noticeably improve. If you use this cable it will markedly improve. I used this cable to connect my phone to a BT speaker and the sound quality jumped way up from what I was used to. The clarity and bass punch both improved. I am very happy with the result using this cable. Sure Ill go wireless when needed, its a compromise when you have to do it. When you dont have to go wireless, use this cable and your ears will thank you.The quality of the construction and connectors is just excellent. I think you will be most pleased with this cable, available in multiple lengths to suit your needs.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

IBRABasics 6 Feet HDMI CableThis is your basic top quality HDMI cable at a very low cost. This wont be as fancy as the Gold level from this same company but it costs less. If your needs are for basic HD capable connections this cable will do you fine and not break the bank. It comes in a variety of lengths and all are very reasonably priced. I used it connecting my Sony Blu-ray player to my AVR and it did a fine job. If I had more 4K devices Id look to the Pro-Gold series. This will serve you very well on all regular HD devices. It is also very well constructed but isnt meant to be a dazzler just a great service part. In my uploaded picture this is next to the Pro-Gold cable.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

IBRA 10 Feet High Speed PRO GOLD BLACK Range HDMI 2.0/1.4a HDMI CableIm using this 10 Pro Gold HDMI cable to replace my current, not premium cable, going from my AVR to my TV. I love the quality of construction and the absolute beauty if the shiny gold connectors. Oh my, this is a visual upgrade you dont get to see very often. On top of the physical beauty of the cable, it is slimmer by not having the ferrite filters on each end. The jacket of the cable is both smooth and rough so it wont catch or kink on anything. It flows very well as you position it. My previous cable was a thick rubber cable with ferrite so this one just works better.When all the connecting is done the picture produced on my TV is both rich and beautiful. It may be my imagination but it looks more color rich than before. I know, its just a cable but its a very good one with a lot of quality features and current standards. Im very happy with my upgrade and think you will have very good luck with this cable.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

Etekcity Intelligent 10W/2A Universal Dual USB Travel Car Vehicle Auto Charger for Apple and Android DevicesThis is a fine car charger for your devices. It is well constructed and worked well in my car, keeping my iPhone 6+ and dash-cam going just fine. I have tight quarters where the charger needs to plug in but fit and did the job. There are two red LEDs on this one and they are on the bright side. Its not my favorite feature but it wasnt terrible either. Just a note if your plug is at or near eye level. It might be a distraction at night. Still, it worked well and I was happy with it over all. Im uploading some photos with this review.>>Etekcity 5W/1A Two-in-one High-Output Travel Car Vehicle & Wall Outlet Charger Power Adapter, with IC Chip for Over-heat ProtectionThis one will only charge on device but the trick is it can come with you and plug into a wall socket. So for travel purposes it will multi-task. Use it in the rental car and bring it to your hotel room to charge your phone. Great all in one device. If it could do more than one it would be perfect. Still a five star device for what it actually does. There is a soft red light that will glow. I like this more than a bright LED light.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

Kartice(TM) Luxury Ceramic Bracelet Watch Band Strap Replacement Wrist Band For Apple Watch & Sport & Edition, White 42mmI knew this band for the Apple Watch was special on the very first day I wore it.  I was asked how I liked my Apple Watch and how beautiful the ceramic band was. They spotted it as a ceramic band and the white color caught the eye even faster than the watch. When I said it wasnt an Apple band for the watch that was even more of a conversation starter. If you want to start conversations, this will help. Ive always wanted a Junghans ceramic watch and this band was my way of getting close.When I received the band, it came in a nice cardboard box that protected it well. It also comes with two tools. One tightens the screws on the slide in mount, the other is to remove and replace links. Use this metal tool for the links, not the plastic pin pusher you may already have. All the pins are spring-loaded and can be pushed through an access hole and release a link. Then carefully remove the link and the mini link the same way. Use the flat side to depress a spring end to reposition the links to connect. It was very easy to do once I played with it carefully.After I took out two links, one on each side, it fit me perfectly. I love the beautiful look and color of the links and how smooth they feel. I have a Space Gray Sport model watch. I used a chromed face edge cover to complete the look I wanted. Im uploading a series of pictures of this beautiful bracelet band for the watch. To me its a stunner and very unique. I know you will enjoy this for your Apple Watch, highly recommended.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

Hershey's Caramels in Milk Chocolate Stand-Up Bags, 7.2 Ounce (Pack of 15)This is a delicious chocolate candy with a big but. The but is dont order it in the summer time. I was offered a sample bag and took it because, chocolate. I was hoping that there might be some insulation as the weather her in September has been in the 90s a lot lately. Well my fears came true as the Amazon pouch was delivered warm. It also wasnt as the 15 pack would be delivered in a box.I opened the pouch then the Hershey's bag. Yeah, they were all really soft and misshaped. Well hoping that it wasnt spoiled from the heat I put it in the fridge. The next day I found that the individually wrapped candies had hardened. So, I gave one a go. It was delicious and hard but chewy. I did like it but noticed in my mouth that it wasnt a formed shape anymore. Still, it tasted pretty good and started to melt and get soft where it was supposed to, in my mouth. This product is very tasty and milk chocolaty. It just, like Mallow Mars, not be offered in the warm weather.

Etekcity 50 Glow Glasses / Eyeglasses Sticks Lights Light up Toys Party Favors Supplies for Kid and Adults (Assorted Colors)If youre starting your New Years party planning, maybe you should check out these glowing glasses. They are made of a light weight plastic and the eye frames are circular with a liquid inside. You wiggle or curve them and the crack to release the fluid in the tubular frame. Shake it up and they start to glow. They are especially nice in a dark environment. They come in a bunch of colors, each in a tear open pouch. Then you can snap the pieces together to form eyeglasses.The glow factor is rated at eight hours, mine are going longer and still have a good glow, on. I think kids will love them too but probably need adult supervision. I know they are non-toxic but little kids maybe not. Overall they are fun, look cool and have the fun factor of the fancy glow.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

Poetic [Duo Lite] Apple Watch 42mm Case Gold/Dark BlueI was looking for a cover for my Apple Watch Sport in space Gray. I have a gold and stainless metal band I was looking to match or compliment. I think I came pretty close. I think this is an untapped market. Makers of the bracelets for the Apple Watch need to also make matching face covers in the exact color so the look is complete. Until then Im hunting for matches. This Poetic case is very nice looking, a lighter gold with a blue highlight, it looks snazzy and matches up to my band. See the pictures Im uploading. It is also a protective cover so thats good too, and came with two screen shields.  I like it a lot. That it also has a three year warranty, doesnt hurt on the plus factor.

BRI Nutrition L-Tryptophan - 1500mg Servings - 120 Count 500 mg per Veggie CapsulesWhen I first got the offer to review this bottle of L-Tryptophan, I did what I do with most of my pill offers, I trashed it. I am old enough to have remembered the name but generally, I dont like reviewing pills. I told a friend about it later that day. He told me the history of the supplement and what it was good for. I hadnt read the offer or description, pill -> trash. Well, when my friend told me about its use as a sleep aide, I perked up. Ive been very stressed out lately with family medical problems and havent been sleeping well. I was convinced I need to look at this again. Luckily, undelete worked and I was able to restore the email. I asked to try it and I received it and tried it.I took the dose of three capsules at night to help with sleep. I liked that it was a natural product, vegetarian and made in the USA. All in its favor. I also know that natural supplements may not be effective immediately and need to be used over time. Well, it took about three nights but I did notice I slept longer and better durations. I didnt keep waking up on the hour look at the clock and try to sleep again. I am very happy as having a strong cocktail or other pills wasnt what I really wanted to do and it was giving mixed results. I used the product of about a week in total and was very happy with the help it gave me during a very stressful time. My stress level has lowered and Im not taking it every night. I still dont like taking more pills than I need for anything except actual vitamins. I will be using this on nights that are more stressful than normal and am grateful for the opportunity to test it. I would recommend giving it a try and look into the history of the product.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

KDL Windshield Sun Protector A Powerful UV Ray Deflector Auto SunshadeI really liked a number of features of this KDL sun shield for your car. First, it folds down to a very small and this size that will most likely fit in the pocket behind most passenger seats. It also unfolds and becomes big enough to cover the inside of most windshields. My biggest problem is my rearview mirror has a very large mount because of sensors installed in it. I was able to get it to stay put and use the sun shades to hold the top in place.It did a great job of keeping the heat in the car minimized. It's been 90* and higher lately. It was perfect test weather. It did an admirable job. I was very happy with the car not being stiflingly hot. I also love the matching case that holds it closed when you fold it up. I also love the pop open effect and twist to shrink. Ive had other products that used this type pf material and technology. This is a wonderful use of it. All in all a very good sun shield and reasonably priced.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

Etekcity 300ml Ultrasonic Aromatherapy Essential Oil DiffuserThis diffuser is much larger than any previous one Ive tested. It is 300ml in capacity and can last about 10 hours. Thats about three times longer than the others or more. The first thing I noticed was that it took longer to get a head of steam on and get going. I think the larger water load took time to start to mist. Once it did get going it started to fill my living room with the lavender oil scent I was using.I first inserted the power adapter and routed the cord through the notch on the side. Then I added the water and drops of oil. Then I sealed on the lid until it clicked shut. This diffuser is different in that the control buttons are in the rear when everything is in place. While it makes for a cleaner presentation, just the pretty lights and mist, I like having control without turning it around filled with water. I plugged it in and pressed the mist button to start it going. Then turned the buttons to the rear and waited for it to get going. Those buttons control the duration and color mix. Like I said earlier it took a while, maybe fifteen minutes, until it had a good head of mist. It does look nice without the buttons showing, though. I tried to take a picture but in many attempts I only got one that showed the true color. About that color, generally its not as solid a block of color as others Ive used. Its more of a fade with lines. The pictures on the Amazon page are pretty accurate. I got one nice picture with a solid color, as it passes through the mix of colors. As I type this in the next room, the scent is catching up with me. So it does get that scent moving around, with my A/C on.I really like the long duration of the bigger tank and can forgive some of the nits Ive picked. While not perfect it is more featured than others at a similar price point. I do like it and its working its little ultrasonic heart out. I do recommend it if youre looking for an all-day unit.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

Sztrokia Portable Multi-Angle Adjustable Aluminum Phone & Tablet StandA few years ago I was looking for a stand to support my iPhone while viewing videos. It was about the same $6 and was totally made of thin plastic. While it did work, Id never have thought to use it with an iPad or now my iPhone 6+ is starting to overwhelm it. This mostly aluminum constructed stand from Sztrokia is so much more capable, it is not even a choice for the old one anymore. This is mostly made of aluminum with rubber bumpers at contact points and as feet. The switch on the side is also plastic. It has heft and feels very sturdy in how it moves and how well it supports my iPhone 6+ and iPad Air2, both in protective cases.The stand comes flat and you press the release button on the side of the hinge and swing it open. When you release the switch it locks in position and will do its stand function.  There are protective rubber pieces and feet. In the base there is a long piece of molded rubber that is removable in case you need a little more room there to cradle the tablet.There are a thousand uses for this stand. In the kitchen if you are using your tablet as a recipe book. In the bathroom to watch videos on your phone. The ideas are basically endless. The price for the quality level is amazing. When you receive it you will be amazed that it was six bucks! If Apple sold this, Jony Ive would make a video and it would cost $49. The look and feel is very Apple, in my opinion. I love it and you need one now.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

Karnotech Mini Monopod (Battery Free No Bluetooth) Selfie StickYes, you read that right, it doesnt need to be charged or paired with your phone. Just plug it in to your headphone jack and away you go. I tested this with my iPhone 6+ in a rugged case, which just barely fit in the spring loaded holder. A very special and unique feature of this stick is the little tiny mirror on the head of the stick. You can turn your phone around and use the good camera to take the shot. You use the mirror to get a decent frame up of yourself and then press the button. You can also use the flash with this reversing technique.It worked like a charm. You wind up with hi-res photos and thats a good thing. You also get with the stick a soft case and a tether for your wrist. It says that there is a mount for a GoPro and I cant find it. I dont want to try to unscrew anything that I shouldnt. Im thinking that description may be for another model. Maybe a rep will verify and correct me or the Amazon site. All in all this is a great selfie stick that is very pocketable as if collapses really small. Its easy to use as theres nothing to install on any modern phone. Some older phones and OS version may not work, look at the compatibility list. This is a great choice of selfie stick.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

Sztrokia 34W 6.8A USB Car Charger with 3-Port USBThis is a great car charger and heres why. First, it does the job. I plugged in my iPhone 6+, iPad Air2 and dash cam. All were powered or charging while I drove around. I love the matt rubbery coating (like on a TV remote) and no bright LED on it. The coating makes for no reflections, like some chrome covered chargers and the rubbery surface makes for a good grip when you need to unplug it. Not having a blindingly bright LED on it is also a blessing at night in a dark interior of your car.That it kept everything going and charging, quickly, is the best of it all. It worked perfectly for me and I couldnt be happier. Well maybe a four port? One can dream. I like this charger very much and do recommend it.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

Pomarks 42mm Stainless Steel Watch Band for Apple watch, Polishing Metal Watchband with Butterfly Buckle & Quality Connector (42mm-Black)The first thing you need to know is, if you havent read all the descriptions, is the watch band is not fully assembled. You will need to do the final assembly of attaching the connectors on each end. Pomarks does include the screwdriver youll need. They are really tiny screws and parts you are dealing with. If this doesnt put you off, you will wind up with a very nice band for your Apple Watch. I have a Sport in Gray. To finish the look, with this band, I suggest a color matching protective frame/case for the watch. I got a black one to match my black band.The band once assembled is quite nice and has good heft and the links move fairly freely. It belies the low cost. Im very happy with the look and feel of the band. I like big chronograph type watches and this band would be at home on one and works well with the Apple Watch too. Im uploading a bunch of pictures to show my process. I needed to also remove two links but have the tool I need. It is not provided with this band but if you want to do it just search for a watch link remover, you may want a small rubber hammer to reinsert the pins. There are little arrows on the underside to show which way to push the pins out. Keep the alignment and insert the pin in the direction you removed it to secure it.I think you will like this band if you don't mind the extra step of the final assembly. I do recommend it.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

Peak Reserve Premium Wine Bottle Opener Gift Set- Includes ULTRA Fast Corkscrew and Quad Blade Foil Cutter in a Luxurious BoxThis bunny-like wine bottle opener will indeed make a lovely gift. The presentation is beautiful and will impress the recipient. My only gripe is it was difficult to remove the actual tool as it is very tightly backed in the foam. Maybe a finger hole/notch would make a huge difference in using the lovely box for protective storage and to show it off. I previously used a now rare Vacuvin opener. It certainly was an impressive device but this Peak Reserve opener is both smaller and easier to use.The very easy to follow directions are printed on the back of the box. Follow them and you will be sipping wine very shortly. I previously reviewed the Peak Reserve foil cutter and noticed it has the logo printed on it and this kit does not. I dont think it matters that much but it looks cooler with the logo. Its very easy to prep the bottle with the foil cutter and get to the cork action. Once you position and hold tight to the opener while on top of the cork, its a swift down and up to remove the cork. Then repeat the action to release the cork. Now let the bottle breathe or decant it.If youve been using T-type openers or other more traditional cork screws this will change your life. Its so easy and fool-proof its amazing. You will enjoy this kit and hopefully enjoy your wine. Cheers!This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

Gogogu Portable Mini Bluetooth 4.1 Car Kit Audio Music ReceiverThis is the little adapter youve been looking for. You have a smartphone and want to connect it to an assortment of devices and play music on them. Yes, this is what you need. Your car has an Aux input on your dashboard this will let you play your music in your car. You have a stereo amplifier in your home and it doesnt have Bluetooth, yup, this will do it. Your favorite wired headphones, want to use them with your phone, wirelessly? Yes this is that adapter.You get in the package the adapter, a MicroUSB cable for charging it, a mini stereo cable and a mini stereo barrel connector. This should be all you need to connect to just about any device to make it Bluetooth. If you need a different cable, Amazon has plenty of conversion cables to help you. I used it to adapt my headphones as my car doesnt have an easy access mini plug. It helps that its on the dash so the buttons are accessible. I paired it with my iPhone and connected my Ultimate Ears headphones to the black box. The buttons on the box serve as the remote control and microphone. I was able to listen to music, which sounded great, and summon Siri to make phone calls and other Siri stuff. I was told by who I called that I sounded fine.All in all this a very handy device to have and you may want more than one for different purposes. It is a fine device and one that will serve you well.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

Aukey Leather Watch Band Strap with Stainless Metal Clasp for All Apple Watches 42mmIf you are looking to change up the look of your Apple Watch Sport this is a great way to do it. It will work with any of the Watches but I have a Sport and the rubber band gets tired after a while. Some of the fancier watches have fancier bands. Still, this is a change for most of them and at an affordable price. I like the nice leather on this band, it looks and smells like leather. It is very easy to remove your current strap and slide this into place. Just push the little button near each connector on the back and slide it off. Slide these pieces into place, buckle piece to the top of the watch, three dark buttons up.There you go you have a whole new look. It was so easy you are wondering why you didnt do this earlier. Now go out and show off your new elegant Apple Watch.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

HappyCell Milanese Loop Apple Watch Band, Stainless Steel Replacement Watchband Strap Wrist Band with Adapter for Apple Watch & Sport & Edition (42mm Silver)This Milanese Loop type band for my Apple Watch Sport looks great and is easy to adjust. Many of the link type bands need to be sized, this one is sized every time you loop it closed, so its easy. I love the way it looks and I added a chrome cover to the face of my Watch to complete the look. Im uploading some pictures. I see no issues in the construction and think its of very good quality at a great price. The magnet holds tight for me. As a point of reference when you attach it, place the loop at the top of the watch and on the connectors, the three dark bumps are up.  I see some reviewers have had issues and Ill update if I experience anything like that.It comes in a simple but nice cardboard box that holds it out-stretched. Its suitable for gift giving, Ive received some bands in a plastic bag, not this one. Overall its a very nice watch band and will look great on your wrist.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

Teikis [Set of 2 Glasses + 9 Whiskey Stones] , 10 Oz Double Wall Scotch Glasses/Whiskey Glass and Scotch RocksI like testing a product like this. I froze the rocks and washed the glasses. When the rocks were very cold, I placed five rocks in the glass and poured some bourbon over them. Its so nice to have the double walled glass combined with the rocks. The rocks give the drink a nice chill and never waters the drink down. The double walled construction also keeps the heat of your hand away from the drink. If you enjoy your beverage straight up but chilled, you will love this set.The quality of the glasses, and they are glass not plastic, it top notch. They have heft and are a pleasure to drink from with a nice deep rim. Just put the rocks in gently as they are capable of damaging the glass with excessive heavy use. It all comes in a very nice presentation box and the rocks are in a velvet bag. This will make a great gift for the person in your life who enjoys an adult beverage every so often. That person can be you too, if you are so inclined.This product was provided at or nearly no cost for the purpose of evaluation and review.

I adore sunflowers and this hat is just so feminine and pretty to look at and wear. When it first arrived it was laid flat, and like I do with all new articles of clothing, hats included, I washed this hat in cold water in the laundry then let it air dry on it's own. The colors on this hat stayed just as bright and didn't fade through the wash, nor did it bleed into my other laundry I washed it with.I am petite and this hat fits me the way I would expect it to, over the forehead somewhat but not past my eyebrows. I wore this hat out gardening and I like how it isn't a very heavy material so it leaves my head breathe while wearing it. The inside of the hat is white, and made of a silk material on inside where your head is, then cotton around the brim of the hat and on the outside. The brim of the hat is flexible so I can turn it up for a more cloudy day or wear it down on a more sunny day. This hat is easy to clean and looks great on me too. Love it!Purchased at a reduced cost for the purpose of inspection and honest, unbiased review.

I ordered this tablecloth in beige for a friend of mine that just purchased a new table. The color is on the lighter side of beige and I would describe it more of a cream color than beige color. It looks absolutely gorgeous on her new table and is long enough to also fit well when she adds the leaf in the middle to extend her table out for company.The stitching on the seams is very nicely done, and the rose and leaves throughout are just beautiful to look at as well. This goes great with her dining room area which is a medium gold color. She washes this tablecloth in cold water and then hung it up to air dry and I didn't notice any shrinking or fading in color as well. This will be look fabulous on her table for the upcoming holidays with some red flowers and cranberries as accents laid on top and around the table. My friend is thrilled with the look and feel of this tablecloth, as it's not a heavy material and not too lightweight either.Sample provided for the purpose of inspection and honest, unbiased review.

I absolutely love these ribbed tank tops! They are so soft, light weight and the colors are beautiful. I ordered the medium size in a 4 pk. I usually fit a small or medium depending on how the clothes are made, but since they are 100% cotton and my husband often helps with the laundry, I figured they would end up in the dryer eventually and may shrink.There are several different colors these tanks come in, but are random when sent out to you. The colors I received are hot pink, teal, orange, and purple. The colors are lively looking and remind a lot of spring time when all the flowers start to bloom. I tried these tanks on before washing, and they fit me just fine except a little long, which I expected they would be as I'm am 5ft 1 inch. These do say to hand wash them only, but I washed them in the washer in cold water, then put them in the dryer on low heat. They shrunk a little at the length, hence the tag saying hand wash only, but not anywhere else. The colors stayed just as lively after washing and did not fade at all. The pictures below are after washing/drying them all.I love how these fit under the armpits, as being petite, most tanks I own have too much material under the arms and leave that area looking saggy to show my bra, but that doesn't happen with these tanks. I think my favorite part about these tanks are they move with me and not against me. Usually when wearing a tank I have to be mindful of slouching when I sit, or bending over too far when gardening so I am not showing off more than I would like to with the neighbors. These tanks will show a little cleavage while bent over, but for the most part stay where they are suppose to so I'm not overly exposed. I would definitely recommend these comfortable ribbed tank tops!Purchased at a reduced cost for the purpose of inspection and honest, unbiased review.

My son in law loves Moscow Mule mugs and swears they are the best mugs to keep your drink cold and refreshing for hours. After hearing about these mugs for a while, I just had to try one for myself.This mug arrived safely and I liked that it had a recipe for a festive beverage that was included with the mug and also some information about Moscow Mule mugs themselves. I had no idea some were only copper plated, and was glad to read this one is solid copper. I decided to try the recipe drink that came with this mug, but added gin instead of vodka, as I'm not a huge fan of vodka, and it was delicious! Normally, the heat from the alcohol would melt the ice pretty quickly and I'd have to add a lot more ice, but this mug kept the drink cool for a long time without the need to add extra ice. Now, I finally see why my son in law enjoys these mugs so much!Sample provided for the purpose of inspection and honest, unbiased review.

This is an adorable set of tea infusers! There are 4 in the set in the shape of a pear, a strawberry, a lemon, and a gourd. All 4 tea infusers are made of a soft silicone, including the tops, which I like a lot as some other tea infusers have a stainless steel top and I can't stick them in the microwave with my cup full of water, but these I can without any problems.The top half of each comes off to be able to insert some loose leaf tea into, and I found if I squeeze the bottom half a little, the opening is wider to be able to fit a half of tea spoon full into the bottom of the infuser without making so much of a mess. Each one of these silicone tea infuser will hold between 1 1/2 - 2 1/2 teaspoons of loose leaf tea. I used these with both loose leaf tea and also flower buds tea. With the loose leaf tea I did see some of it come out into the water while steeping, but not a lot, and none of the flowering buds came out through the holes of the tea infusers while steeping.The pear shaped is my favorite one out of the bunch, as when put in my cup it stands tall and still is easy to get out of my cup when I'm done with it by the top part sticking out of the cup. The gourd, strawberry, and the lemon all have a top heavy silicone leaf at the end, and when placed inside the cup, if not placed well over the rim/handle part to balance it, will not allow the infuser part to sink too far into my cup, but rather stay floated at the top part. Just a note with these tea infusers, they do not come with a drip tray so when taking them out of the tea cup, they will make a mess dripping, but I set them on a plate when finished with them. These are really simple, easy to use tea infusers. They work well and look really cute in my tea cup!Purchased at a reduced cost for the purpose of inspection and honest, unbiased review.

My husband isn't an athlete, doesn't participate in organized sports, although does like to kick the soccer ball around some with our son, goes hiking, and enjoys a nice jog outside every so often. He has, what I call, swamp feet. His feet sweat in the summer, winter, with or without socks. His job has him on his feet and walking several miles during the work day, and when he comes home from work, he peels the socks off his feet like a second skin. Gross right? Yes, so is the smell and feel left behind in his shoes. I try to not go near them, or even touch them because they feel like a wet sponge. He is often telling me he needs new shoes because his start to smell and we can't get rid of the odor, and has (not kidding) 8 pair of sneakers just to trade off and on to let them air out for a good many days.We have tried shoe inserts, baking soda in his shoes, and various other types of sprays/powders in his shoes and on his feet as well as sticking his shoes in a plastic bag and in the freezer, to help with his swamp feet, and they either don't work to get rid of the moisture and odor left behind, or they just blend in with the moisture and odor to add yet, another smell to the shoes, but not a pleasing one.I was really skeptical these capsole order eliminator would work well, if at all. They're straight forward to use without needing to read directions, just twist the top half away from the bottom half to open them up. The smell of these capsoles when opened reminds me of a dryer sheet, and one that my husband doesn't seem to mind at all. When my husband got home from work, I put these opened capsoles right into his shoes after he took them off. Before I went to bed hours later, I took one of the capsoles out of his shoe and sniffed, and it had a faint smell of a dryer sheet, and nothing else. What impressed me the most wasn't that it only got rid of the odor, but that when picking up the shoe it wasn't moist and squishy feeling inside like it usually is, so it did a good job of sucking up his swamp feet moisture left behind as well. As the description says, they are suppose to last 5 years, so time will tell. Right now though, they work great getting rid of my husbands swamp feet in his shoes, and without the mess of a powder or need to cut out inserts to fit as well. I am very happy with this product, and would definitely recommend these!Sample provided for the purpose of inspection and honest, unbiased review.

I am a petite female, so ordering anything in a size large is rather different for me, but after looking at the site description decided a large would probably fit me best. I wear a 36B/34C bra, and this large size fit me very nicely. Not too tight where I can't breath, and not too loose where it would fall off of me either.The material is soft and breathable, and yes, I did notice it was on during the day, but it was rather comfortable the entire time wearing it until it was time to take it off before bed. The stitching is done rather well around the seams and didn't irritate my skin at all. There are two removable cup pad that come with this strapless bra, and slits on the left and ride side on the inside of the bra to take them out for washing and then to be able to put them back in.While I think the bra is comfortable, and I didn't have to adjust it or tug on it to keep it up at all while wearing it, the cup pads themselves aren't so comfortable and gave me a bit of a wonder women shape to the breast area. I thought that washing the cup pads while washing the strapless bra may help to not have such a stiff starch feel to them, but no they held their shape well even through washing. I did not stick either the cup pads or the strapless bra in the dryer, but aired dried them flat. Perhaps if one had sagging breasts, which I don't, it would give them a better shape underneath the clothing, but to me, it didn't look so good. I decided to use some cup pads that I already have from another bra to insert into this bra, and it looked and felt much better. The bra itself is nicely made, and I would have given this a 5 star rating had it not been for the overly stiff cup pads that come with this strapless bra.Sample provided for the purpose of inspection and honest, unbiased review.

This is a great medium thickness black tank top. The color isn't really dark black, and not faded black either, but somewhere in between. I love that there isn't a tag sewn into the back top of the seam, but printing on the inside instead, as tags can get bothersome and itchy after a bit of wearing.I am petite build and 5ft 1, this tank top didn't have different sizes when ordering, but fit me well at the top half, and was a bit long in length. Since it says 100% cotton on the printing on the inside of the tank, I washed it in cold water and hung it on the line to dry, and there wasn't any fade of color or shrinking. The material is soft and comfortable against my skin, and it does have some give to it, but not a lot, so I'm not feeling like I can't breath while wearing it and it still holds it's shape well after wearing it all day.When I washed it the second time, I did stick it in the dryer on low heat, and it did shrink up some on the length at the bottom, but not anywhere else. My advice would be, if you're tall not to stick this in the dryer as it may then be too short in length. The stitching is very tight around the seams, and nicely done on this tank. There weren't any lose threads after washing the second time, and the pictures below were taken after the second washing. The ribbed material is tightly woven on this tank, and when it arrived I expected to visually see the "ribbed" part sticking out like other ribbed tanks I own. It's there, but it blends nicely together and doesn't stand out so much as far as lines going vertically down the tank like other ribbed tanks do.Our weather is changing some here in the Northeast, and while it's warm during the day, it's been cooling off during the late afternoon/evening hours. This tank is perfect for these days as it's breathable enough in the warmer day hours, and when it cooled off added a nice layer underneath another top. In my opinion, it would be a bit too hot for me to wear in the 90+ degree weather of the summer, but would be alright in the low 80's or below. I really enjoy how this tank fits underneath the armpits too, as a lot of tanks I own are saggy with extra material, which doesn't look very nice either. This is a quality made tank top that I am truly happy with.Sample provided for the purpose of inspection and honest, unbiased review.

I have an evergreen bush that has been grown and shaped into looking like a basket. It was one of the things I loved the most when deciding to buy my house years ago. I've always wanted to put some hanging flowers inside this bush shaped like a basket, and have tried several ways, like hanging a string down tied to top underneath, but the weight of the flowers in the pot are too heavy, as the top part is held together by a cable and chicken wire inside to make the shape.When order this shepherd hook my intended use was to hang a flower pot along the rows of lilies growing close to my house and are fading now with the end of summer near. I happen to lean this 48 inch shepherd hook against the bush that looks like a basket, and found a different use for it instead. It was fairly easy to get this shepherd hook inside the bush, and the two prongs on the bottom are separated far enough apart where it can straddle the roots inside the bush to not harm it, yet, stand sturdy enough to hold a flowering pot. I carefully separated the top of the bush growth to fit the top half of the shepherd hook inside, and then hung my flower pot. It looks wonderful and I am so happy this worked out so well for me!! Since this shepherd hook is rust resistant and sturdy, I won't have to worry about taking it out in the winter time either, but can hang some evergreen plants when the pretty summer flowers are done blooming. Outstanding!Sample provided for the purpose of inspection and honest, unbiased review.

This shaking school bus is really adorable for toddlers, and I ordered one for my nephew who is 4 yrs old for a gift. He loves to sing and dance around to happy songs, yet being a boy he also enjoys toys that move with him and do something as well while he is moving around.The shaking school bus toy takes (3) AA batteries (not included with the toy) and the location of the battery compartment is underneath the bus. To take the lid off the battery compartment I needed a small Philips screw driver, which I couldn't find one handy at the time, but a small flat head works well and that is what I used to get the lid off. There are two buttons on the bottom, one to set the wheels down and turn the bus on to move, and then sliding it over to off and the wheels go up into the bus. The other button slides one way to turn the music off, or the other way to turn the music on.The song it plays is B I N G O, which is an all time favorite classic kids song, and my nephew knows it well. The music is clear while coming out of the bus, but unlike other kids toys that play music, it's not overly loud while playing. I like that the bus music has an off feature to it, as I can only handle hearing that song so many times in a day, however, after I was done testing out this toy, my son, who is 11 yrs old, went around the rest of the day humming the catchy tune, so my nephews parents will more than likely hear it even if the button is off as well. To me though, kids singing is a great sound and I enjoy hearing them so happy.When the wheels are down and the bus is set on our hardwood floors, it toggles from left to right side, and the parking lights on the front and back flash off and on. The bus senses when it hits an object as well, and will change direction once it does, which is a nice feature to have when little toes are around. Overall, this is a really cute toddler toy and I think my nephew will love his gift!Sample provided for the purpose of inspection and honest, unbiased review.

I want to start out by stating right away, this is a thin cooling towel, and yes, you can see through it somewhat too. However, after trying this item out for a few days now, I'm quite impressed by this cooling towel and it's ability to stay wet/cool even in extremely hot weather.I ordered this for my son's friend, who has started football practice recently for the season. He'll come over to play with my son at times, and when his parents come to pick him up for practice, I instantly feel for him being out in 90 degree weather, and not only running around in it, but with football gear on too! Before he used this towel, I wanted to test it out for a while to see how much it would be able to cool him down when he gets all hot and sweaty during practice and then eventually games. I have to admit, feeling how light weight this towel is, I didn't think it would do much of anything beyond being able to wipe the sweat off his face.There wasn't instructions that came with this towel when it arrived, so I just did what I thought should be done based on the description of the towel. I wet it in the sink under cold running water, then squeezed it a bit to get rid of the excess dripping water. Took it outside, and snapped it in the air. Ok, so I got a bit wet when I did that, it felt good, and I was impressed with the amount of water this towel absorbed. Then I hung it out on my clothes line to see how long it would dry next to a set of cotton sheets. After checking on the cooling towel a half hour later, some parts were dry, and some still wet and cool to the touch. One may think that isn't so impressive, however, it was 92 degrees outside with a slight breeze that day, and my sheets that I hung out at the same time, were completely dry.After this cooling towel fully dried on the clothes line, I wet it again, snapped it in the air, and tested it inside in the air conditioning leaving it in a pile on my kitchen counter. Four hours later, it was still completely wet, and really cool to the touch. I had honestly forgotten about it after that, until the next morning, and when waking up to get coffee noticed it, and it was still half wet. So, if using this towel in a gym or some place that is normally air conditioned, it would stay wet and cool longer than most people would stay to work out in a gym, without the need to get wet again. I also tested it in the same fashion, wet, in a pile, but outside on my porch, as my son's friend would probably be using it in this fashion, sitting on the bench and using it in between breaks and time outs. It stayed wet and cool for about 2 and a half hours before it needed to be wet again.This cooling towel is soft to the touch, and feels great and refreshing on my face. There is a one stitch seam all around that looks to be nicely done. My sons friend has used it twice now, once during practice, and once during a scrimmage. He absolutely loves this towel, and said it's really helped him cool down after running around playing football. Although he enjoys to use it to wipe the sweat off his face, he likes it best wrapped around the top of his head during time outs. Excellent product!Sample provided for the purpose of inspection and honest, unbiased review.

Water balloons are a fun and exciting for all ages in the warm summer months, and a great alternative way to cool off and get wet without having to get in the pool. I have purchased a lot of water balloons and was a bit confused when these balloons arrived as labeled "party balloons" and not water balloons. Compared to some water balloons I have on hand already, they're about the same size, but shaped a little different, and are a bit thinner. They're easier to blow up with air, and I can't blow up the water balloons with air, although I've tried, that I have that are labelled water balloons.That being said, my son, his friend, and I decided to give these a try to use as water balloons and compare them to the ones we have already. These party balloons filled up with water easily, they held the water well without breaking while filling them up with the outside hose, and like the water balloons I have, they also broke the same when throwing them at each other. Unlike the water balloons I have to compare to these, they stretched easier to be able to knot them off to hold the water, which to me is a plus. I thought these party balloons had a slight latex order to them, which after handling them for a while, the smell also transferred to my hands. They are labeled as non-toxic on the bags, and I appreciate knowing they are safe to use around myself as well as the kids.Regardless what these balloons are labelled as, what exactly is a water balloon? My definition would be a balloon that can expand and hold water successfully and then break while throwing to get another person/thing wet. To me, these balloons fit that definition regardless of what the bag is labelled. I've included a picture of these balloons and also the other balloons I had already both deflated and filled with water (the wooden blocks were used to keep them still and from rolling away). We all had a fantastic time filling up these balloons, chasing each other around, and throwing them at each other. I gave these a four star rating not because the balloons aren't functional as water balloons, as they are, but because of the slight odor and also that the label is a bit misleading, and also, I can't beat the price (currently $8.95) for 500 balloons.Purchased at a reduced cost for the purpose of inspection and honest, unbiased review.

1:36 MinsThis ocean wave night light projector is awesome! My son does swim competitions and he loves the water, he is also afraid of the dark at night. This projector gives off the most beautiful waves of light when on and is really soothing to him to look at.There are seven different settings to toggle through by just pushing the middle button to change each setting. The first is multi colored, and there are others that stay on a solid red, blue, or green, or flash between all the colors in different wave patterns. As I was recording the video, my son said it reminded him of water moving so much it made him want to swim, which can be seen at the end of the video as a shadow. The video was recorded in my living room, which is 23 ft by 18 ft wide and it covered the entire ceiling with the waves of light while this projector sat in the middle of the living room floor. In my sons room he likes it put on top of his dresser so the waves creep up the wall and onto the ceiling by his bed. Depending on how close you set it to a wall and distance to the ceiling will depend on how far the waves lights will go, much like you would see with a flashlight up close or at a distance.This projector can be plugged in using the provided usb and wall plug, which is how we used it, or by installing AA batteries in the bottom of the unit. I really like that it shuts off after an hour on it's own, and after my son has long fallen asleep and no longer has a need for the light. There is also an audio jack on the back of this projector that you can plug the provided audio cable into to connect to my phone or his galaxy tab, so he could listen to music or soothing sounds of the ocean while looking at the waves of light. While he does enjoy this feature off while sleeping, I think it sounded pretty good. We're really happy with this ocean wave projector and the beautiful dancing lights.Sample provided for the purpose of inspection and honest, unbiased review.

I ordered this set of ceramic mason jars by Vakalis as a gift for a friend. She always keeps her kitchen tidy and organized, and I thought this would make the perfect gift for her. They come in a set of four white ceramic jars, with a blue, purple, red, and green silicone lid. The lids also have ceramic in the center of them as well to give them a more cohesive look with the jars.Each jar holds 12 ounces, and is 4 1/4 inches tall with the lids on. The jars weigh about as much as a regular glass canning jar would, and each one has a smooth surface finish to them, both inside and out. I tested to see if they would leak when turned upside down holding liquids with the silicone lid on tight, and they did a little bit as I shook the jar up and down some. However, while taking the lid off and then on again, you can hear they have a good suction as there is a "pop" sound when taking the lids off.After filling up each jar with some of my friends favorite pantry items, I wrote the name of what's inside on each chalkboard label with a piece of chalk that is provided in each ceramic jar. I really like the chalkboard labels that are painted onto these jars, as they will save my friend money and trouble of purchasing labels to put on them when changing from one item to another. She can just wet a paper towel, erase what is written and use the chalk to write something else. Since these are ceramic jars, they can also go in the microwave and refrigerator depending on what she'd like to store in them. Overall, these are really a lovely set of ceramic mason jars that I think my friend will really enjoy!Sample provided for the purpose of inspection and honest, unbiased review.

My first thought when seeing these bluetooth headphones was wow, it didn't come in some hard type plastic container that I'd have to use scissors, a box cutter, and knife to get them opened.I was pretty eager to try these bluetooth headphones right away, as I don't care much to use earbuds. They came with a set of really nice and large print instructions, which, I was thrilled with, as most come with this tiny little booklet with such small print I feel I need a magnifying glass to see what it says. Most the controls to work these headphones are on the left ear cuff, a plus for me as I'm left handed, which include the bluetooth for pairing with my phone/on/off button, the up and down volume/skip buttons all along the back side. There is an LED light at the bottom on the left side that blinks from red to blue when pairing with my iphone 6, and then stays blue once paired. It was pretty easy to pair with my iphone 6 by just holding down the power button for 10 seconds. There is also a usb port to charge these headphones with the provided usb cable when the battery drains.When putting on these headphones, they fit me well, are soft and comfortable on my ears and at the top of my head, and although a little snug, they don't hurt my ears from wearing them for a few hours. I'm a petite female, and I enjoy that these headphones don't make me feel like they are just hanging on my head, but they do adjust on each side to also fit my husbands head comfortably as well. The sound while playing the music was crystal clear and sounded great. I was able to walk all through my house while leaving my iphone 6 sit on the coffee table, as well as about 40 -50 feet away from my iphone sitting on my porch while outside, without losing a connection to each other at all. I really love these headphones, they're easy to use, comfortable and work great!Sample provided for the purpose of inspection and honest, unbiased review.

I ordered this bamboo memory foam pillow for my son. He is 11 yrs old and it's important for him to have a pillow that has good support for his growing body, especially while sleeping. I have one similar to this pillow and he likes the feel of it. We have tried other pillows for him and although he likes a more semi flat than fluffy pillow, they usually end up going too flat over time and no longer offer good support for him then.When this pillow arrived it came in a cloth bag rolled up and flat. Upon opening, it did have an order to it like all memory foam pillows do, but dissipated after a day of airing out. Unlike mine, this memory foam pillow has a zipper at the end of the soft bamboo outside case, so I can wash the cover as needed. I really enjoy this feature as I can also stick a sachet of lavender or eucalyptus inside the cover for my son to breathe in while sleeping.This bamboo memory foam pillow allows my son to adjust it to his liking as far as how flat or fluffy he wants it, just by pressing down on it to flatten it some, or tugging on the sides a bit to fluff it up more. He's been sleeping on it a few days now, and he said it's the most comfortable pillow he has had yet. We are both very pleased with this bamboo memory foam pillow.Sample provided for the purpose of inspection and honest, unbiased review.

I ordered this Minions One Eye throw blanket by Ibeauti for my son who is in swim competitions. He is a huge fan of the Despicable Me movies and especially those lovable minions!After swimming sometimes he is a bit chilled in the vehicle on the way home, so we usually keep a blanket around for him to cover up with. Not only is the minion on the front adorable, but the blanket itself is soft, fluffy, and rather large in size when opened up. My son is 5 ft 7 and stretched out this blanket can cover him from shoulder to ankle in length, and wrap around him entirely in width. He said the blanket is really soft and keeps him toasty warm. I first washed this blanket in cold water inside a mesh laundry bag I have, and then hung it out on the clothes line to air dry. The blanket held up well in the washer and didn't shrink, no stray strings, or fade in color at all.I found it easy to roll the blanket back up by laying it flat, minion side down, then folded in sections until it was the size of the minion on the front. Once folded up, I just rolled it up, starting from the side that has the round yellow button, until it met the other side to secure it shut with the white elastic strap. When not using this blanket to cover himself and it's rolled up, my son enjoys sticking his hand up the center and turning it into a puppet to play with, and just hugging it while carry it around. This is a great quality blanket, we love it, and will purchase a few more of these as gifts for his friends and team mates! Sample provided for the purpose of inspection and honest, unbiased review.

My husband often travels a few hours away for work, and that usually means a lot of extra stops at convenience stores and take out food as he is traveling all day long. He is not much of a fast food person and takes fruits and veggies to work with him when he isn't traveling to eat.This cooler bag by Freddie and Sebbie is pretty awesome in size and the amount of compartments it has. I am really impressed with the inside cooler section of this bag that is located under the zipper flap in the center of the bag. Not only does it help keep his drinks, fruit, and veggies cold for hours, but it has velcro around the outside of the white lining that is attached to the inside of the bag to so I can remove the lining and clean it out easily, then once dried put it back in place. I have tried to wash other cooler bags that didn't have a removable lining, and it's quite a chore to do.This bag is black on the outside, it's made of sturdy nylon on the outside, which makes the outside easy to clean as well with a wet cloth. There is a zippered pouch and a mesh pouch on the outside of each side of this cooler bag, a zippered mesh pocket under the center flap, and inside the front zippered flap, are two large mesh zippered pockets. I really like the leather handles that is on top of this bag, it is stylish and makes it look professional enough for my husband to carry around for work. I'm quite impressed with the thoughts that were put into making this bag. The look, and over all functionality are excellent!Sample provided for the purpose of inspection and honest, unbiased review.

These Fabric Christmas gift bags are really cute! I ordered these in a size medium to take over seas with me to visit family for the holidays in a few months. TSA doesn't allow gifts to be wrapped while traveling on airplanes, so these are perfect to tuck in my suitcase and then add the gifts into them once I have arrived over seas.I have the medium sized gift bags that come in a pack of 12. They are roughly 16 inches tall and 11 inches wide, and made from a soft fabric that reminds me a lot of felt. They all are red in color for the over all bags, and then have various felt cut outs that are glued onto the front side of the bags, of a snowman, Santa Claus or a Christmas tree. Each bag has a white, nylon drawstring that weaves through some punched out holes in the fabric at the top and knotted at the side, that I can use to shut the bag closed once the gift is inside. The stitching is nicely done around the top and the seams of these gift bags, and I was able to fit a gallon of milk inside with room to spare.These are fairly sturdy bags as I could carry the gallon of milk around by the drawstring and the fabric did give some but didn't rip apart at all. I could not see through the bag to tell what was inside when closed up while having the milk jug inside of it. I really enjoy that these bags are light as a feather, so they won't add extra weight to my suitcase, and that they are reusable. These are perfect for my traveling over the holidays for the kids gifts!Sample provided for the purpose of inspection and honest, unbiased review.

We'll be traveling to Europe for the holidays in a few months to visit family. We usually go every other year, and packing suitcases for the limited amount of weight seems to be more and more of a challenge without having to pay over the weight limit fees, especially when they keep lowering the amount of weight we can have our luggage weigh. We also tend to buy things at the last minute as gifts for people back home, especially if we have lay overs in different countries. So, what our carry on bags weighed at the last check in the first airport, they may not weigh the same at the next check in at the second airport.I really like this digital luggage scale by aGreatLife. I tested this digital scale weighing items I had at home that I knew the weight of, and it was completely accurate. This scale allows to be weighed in pounds, kilograms, ounces, and grams, which is very helpful to us traveling overseas, as they use the metric system and it saves me from having to convert kg to lbs on the return flight home.
